analyzed: tarkapañcānana śrī siddhasena mahāmati viracitaḥ
a viyuta sāmānya viśeṣa deśinam vardhamānam ānamya
asya ca idam ādi vākyam
pramāṇa vyutpādana artham idam ārabhyate
pramāṇa ityādi anena ca tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇa saṃbandha vikala tayā dhvaneḥ
bahis artham prati prāmāṇya ayogāt abhidheya ādi sūcana dvara utpanna artha saṃśaya mukhena śrotāraḥ

original: śravaṇaṃ prati protsāhyanta iti dharmottaro manyate. tad ayuktam. yadi hi śabdasyārthaprakāśanaṃ
analyzed: śravaṇam prati protsāhyante iti dharma uttaraḥ manyate tat ayuktam yadi hi śabdasya artha prakāśanam
prati sāmarthyam na samasti

original: tat katham asāv abhidheyādisūcane 'pi paṭiṣṭhaḥ syāt?
analyzed: tat katham asau abhidheya ādi sūcane pi paṭiṣṭhaḥ syāt

original: na ca tasyāprāmāṇya etacchravaṇād arthasaṃśayaṃ kurvanti prekṣāvantaḥ,
analyzed: na ca tasya aprāmāṇye etad śravaṇāt artha saṃśayam kurvanti prekṣāvantaḥ

original: tadvattāhāner mithyājñānād api pravṛttyavirāmaprasaṅgāc ca. arcaṭas tv āha:
analyzed: tadvat tā hāneḥ mithyājñānāt api pravṛtti avirāma prasaṅgāt ca arcaṭaḥ tu āha
na śrāvaka utsāhakam etat
prāmāṇya abhāvāt
teṣām ca apramāṇāt apravṛtteḥ
anyathā prekṣāvat tā kṣateḥ
kim tarhi prakaraṇa artha kathana avasara upasthita para upanyasta hetu asiddha tā udbhāvana artham tathā hi
sambhavati evaṃvādī na ārabdhavyam idam abhidheya ādi śūnya tvāt
kākadanta parīkṣā ādi vat iti

original: tad anenāsya tadvattāprakāśakena vacasā taddhetūnām asiddhatodbhāvyata” iti. tad ayuktataram:
analyzed: tat anena asya tadvat tā prakāśakena vacasā tad hetūnām asiddha tā udbhāvyate iti tat ayuktataram

original: yato yadīdam apramāṇam iti nābhidheyādīni sākṣāl lakṣayat pravartayati,
analyzed: yatas yadi idam apramāṇam iti na abhidheya ādīni sākṣāt lakṣayat pravartayati
tatas para upanyasta hetu asiddha tām kathayati iti yukti riktam paśyāmaḥ
apramāṇasya akiñcitkara tvāt

original: anyathā pramāṇavicāraṇam ānarthakyam aśnuvīta. tasmād idaṃ pramāṇabhūtaṃ sadabhidheyādīni pratipādayat prekṣāvataḥ pravartayatīti prakaraṇādāv
analyzed: anyathā pramāṇa vicāraṇam ānarthakyam aśnuvīta tasmāt idam pramāṇa bhūtam sadabhidheya ādīni pratipādayat prekṣāvataḥ pravartayati iti prakaraṇa ādau

original: [NAV_0.2] sambandhaśūnyatvād asya katham arthe pramāṇateti cet,
analyzed: sambandha śūnya tvāt asya katham arthe pramāṇa tā iti ced

original: pratyakṣe 'pi kathaṃ tarhi seti vācyam. grāhyagrāhakabhāvasambandhabalād iti ced,
analyzed: pratyakṣe pi katham tarhi sā iti vācyam grāhya grāhaka bhāva sambandha balāt iti ced

original: atrāpi vācyavācakabhāvād iti brūmaḥ. sa eva katham iti ced,
analyzed: atrā api vācya vācaka bhāvāt iti brūmaḥ saḥ eva katham iti ced

original: adhyakṣe 'pi vedyavedakabhāvaḥ katham iti vācyam. tadutpattitadākāratābhyām iti cet,
analyzed: adhyakṣe pi vedya vedaka bhāvaḥ katham iti vācyam tad utpatti tad ākāra tābhyām iti ced
kā iyam tad utpattiḥ nāma
tad janya tā iti ced

original: pratikṣaṇabhaṅguratve sāiva durupapādety ācakṣmahe. tathā hi:
analyzed: prati kṣaṇa bhaṅgura tve sā eva durupapādā iti ācakṣmahe tathā hi

original: kṣaṇanaśvaro 'rthaḥ svakṣaṇe pūrvaṃ paścād vā kāryaṃ kuryād iti trayī gatiḥ. tatra na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkaraṇīyaḥ,
analyzed: kṣaṇa naśvaraḥ rthaḥ sva kṣaṇe pūrvam paścāt vā kāryam kuryāt iti trayī gatiḥ tatra na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkaraṇīyaḥ
sama kāla bhāvini vyāpāra abhāvāt
itarathā aika kṣaṇa vartinām samasta artha kṣaṇānām itaretaram kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ prasajyeta

original: tathā ca tatprayukto grāhyagrāhakabhāvaś cety asamañjasam āpanīpadyeta. atha svakṣaṇāt pūrvam -- acārv etad api,
analyzed: tathā ca tad prayuktaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ ca iti asamañjasam āpanīpadyeta atha sva kṣaṇāt pūrvam acāru etat api

original: svayam asato bhaviṣyacchaṅkhacakravartyāder iva pūrvakālavartini kārye vyāpārābhāvāt. atha svakṣaṇād ūrdhvaṃ kāryaṃ vidhatta iti manyethāḥ,
analyzed: svayam asataḥ bhaviṣyat śaṅkha cakravarti ādeḥ iva pūrva kāla vartini kārye vyāpāra abhāvāt atha sva kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam kāryam vidhatte iti manyethāḥ
etat api asādhīyaḥ
vinaṣṭasya kārya karaṇa akṣama tvāt

original: anyathā mṛtasya śikhinaḥ kekāyitaṃ syāt. tadākāratāpi kim arthākārasaṅkrāntyā?
analyzed: anyathā mṛtasya śikhinaḥ kekāyitam syāt tad ākāra tā api kim artha ākāra saṅkrāntyā
atha tad sadṛśa tayā utpatteḥ jñānasya iti
yadi ādyaḥ kalpaḥ tat ayuktam
jñāne sva ākāra arpaṇāt arthasya nirākāra tā anuṣaṅgāt
sva deha pṛthutara artha adarśana prasaṅgāt
śiraḥ sphoṭana plāvana ādi anartha prasakteḥ ca uta dvitīyaḥ

original: tathā sati sādṛśyavaśād arthavyavasthety āyātam. na ca sādṛśyaṃ bhavatāṃ darśane tāttvikam asti,
analyzed: tathā sati sādṛśya vaśāt artha vyavasthā iti āyātam na ca sādṛśyam bhavatām darśane tāttvikam asti

vivikta kṣaṇa kṣayi paramāṇu lakṣaṇa sva lakṣaṇānām pāramārthika tva abhyupagamāt anādi kāla ālīna vāsanā prabodha sampādita sattāka nirvikalpaka vivikta darśana uttara kāla bhāvi vikalpa vyavasthāpita sādṛśya vaśāt
artha grahaṇa niyame sati eka nīla sva lakṣaṇe kṣaṇe sakala kāla kalāpa vyāpi kāka kuvalaya ādi gata nīla tāyā
vyavasthitiḥ aviśeṣeṇa anuṣajeta

original: tathā ca pratiniyato grāhyagrāhakabhāvo na ghaṭāmaṭāṭyeta. aṅgulyagranirdiśyamānapurovartinīlasvalakṣaṇadarśanabalāyātatvān nailyavikalpasya  #
analyzed: tathā ca pratiniyataḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ na aṅguli agra nirdiśyamāna purovarti nīla sva lakṣaṇa darśana bala āyāta tvāt nailya vikalpasya
tat eva adhyavasyati

original: na bhūtaṃ bhāvi kākakuvalayādigataṃ veti cet,
analyzed: na bhūtam bhāvi kāka kuvalaya ādi gatam vā iti ced
tarhi vikalpaḥ sva lakṣaṇa niṣṭhaḥ
niyata deśa daśa avacchinna artha kriyā samartha artha grahaṇāt tathā hi
tad adhyavasāyaḥ kim tad vikalpanam uta tad grahaṇam
na tāvat tad vikalpanam
vikalpānām bhavat abhiprāyeṇa sva lakṣaṇa antar praveśa abhāvāt tat uktam
tena anya apoha viṣayāḥ proktāḥ sāmānya gocarāḥ

original: śabdāś ca buddhayaś cāiva vastuny eṣām asambhavāt” // NAV_0:1 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ ca buddhayaḥ vastuni eṣām asambhavāt
atha brūyāt

original: yady api vikalpāḥ sāmānyaṃ gocarayanti tattvatas,
analyzed: yadi api vikalpāḥ sāmānyam gocarayanti tattvatas

original: tathāpi pratyakṣavikalpayor yaugapadyena pravṛtter vimūḍhaḥ pratipattā vikalpasya svalakṣaṇaniṣṭhatāṃ vyavasyati,
analyzed: tathā api pratyakṣa vikalpayoḥ yaugapadyena pravṛtteḥ vimūḍhaḥ pratipattā vikalpasya sva lakṣaṇa niṣṭha tām vyavasyati
tathā ca uktam
manasoḥ yugapad vṛtteḥ sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ

original: vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyavasyati” // NAV_0:2 //
analyzed: vimūḍhaḥ laghu vṛtteḥ vā tayoḥ aikyam vyavasyati
tat kim idam śapathaiḥ pratyeyam

original: yad uta mohād vikalpena svalakṣaṇam adhyavasyati,
analyzed: yat uta mohāt vikalpena sva lakṣaṇam adhyavasyati
na punar viśada nirbhāsena sākṣātkaroti
evam ca adhyakṣam api sakala artha vyaktīḥ gocarayati

original: vikalpamohāt tu sannihitaviṣayaṃ lakṣyata iti paro 'nuṣañjayan durnivāraḥ syāt. uta tadgrahaṇam adhyavasāyaḥ,
analyzed: vikalpa mohāt tu sannihita viṣayam lakṣyate iti paraḥ nuṣañjayan durnivāraḥ syāt uta tad grahaṇam adhyavasāyaḥ

original: tadā svalakṣaṇaniṣṭhatā vikalpasya svavācā bhavadbhiḥ pratipannā syāt. evaṃ ca vikalpayugalake
analyzed: tadā sva lakṣaṇa niṣṭha tā vikalpasya sva vācā bhavadbhiḥ pratipannā syāt evam ca vikalpa yugalake
pi artha kriyā samartha artha paryavasita sattāka tā vikalpasya āḍhaukate yadā ca vikalpaḥ
sva lakṣaṇa saudha madhyam adhyāste iti

original: tathā sati dhvaner api tadantaḥpraveśo durnivāraḥ syāt,
analyzed: tathā sati dhvaneḥ api tad antar praveśaḥ durnivāraḥ syāt
tad sahacara tvāt yat āha bhavat ācāryaḥ

original: “sa eva śabdānāṃ viṣayo yo vikalpānām” iti. na ca vikalpaṃ vyatiricya sādṛśyavyavasthāpakam anyad asti,
analyzed: saḥ eva śabdānām viṣayaḥ yaḥ vikalpānām iti na ca vikalpam vyatiricya sādṛśya vyavasthāpakam anyat asti
pratyakṣasya sakala jagat vilakṣaṇa sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa pravaṇa tvāt tat yadi tad sadṛśa tayā utpattiḥ tad ākāra tā
tadā pratipādita nyāyāt vikalpasya sannihita artha gocara tā urarīkartavyā

original: tathā ca dhvanir api tadviṣayaḥ sidhyatīti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam. anyathā tadākāratā na samasti,
analyzed: tathā ca dhvaniḥ api tad viṣayaḥ sidhyati iti siddham naḥ samīhitam anyathā tad ākāra tā na samasti

original: gatyantarābhāvāt. tan na tadutpattitadākārate grāhyagrāhakabhāvahetū saṃstaḥ.
analyzed: gati antara abhāvāt tat na tad utpatti tad ākāra te grāhya grāhaka bhāva hetū saṃstaḥ

original: [NAV_0.4] saṃstāṃ vā, tathāpi vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyo bhavān:
analyzed: san tām vā tathā api vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyaḥ bhavān

original: kim ete grahaṇakāraṇaṃ pārthakyena uta sāmastyena?
analyzed: kim ete grahaṇa kāraṇam pārthakyena uta sāmastyena
tat yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ
kapāla lakṣaṇaḥ ghaṭa antya kṣaṇasya grāhakaḥ prāpnoti
tad janya tvāt
jala candraḥ vā nabhaḥ candrasya grāhakaḥ syāt
tad ākāra tvāt atha dvitīyaḥ

original: tathā sati ghaṭottarakṣaṇaḥ pūrvakṣaṇasya grāhakaḥ prasajati,
analyzed: tathā sati ghaṭa uttara kṣaṇaḥ pūrva kṣaṇasya grāhakaḥ prasajati

original: tadutpattes tadākāratvāc ca. jaḍatvād arthasya na grāhakatvam,
analyzed: tad utpatteḥ tad ākāra tvāt ca jaḍa tvāt arthasya na grāhaka tvam

original: api tu jñānasya tadutpattitadākāratayoḥ satyor iti ced,
analyzed: api tu jñānasya tad utpatti tad ākāra tayoḥ satyoḥ iti ced
idam idānīm viditam asmābhiḥ
etat api samāna artha grāhi prācīna saṃveda nakṣaṇa lakṣaṇa manaskāra utpādya jñāne grāhaka lakṣaṇam vyabhicarati
utpādaka prāktana kṣaṇa varti manaskāra a grāhaka tvāt tad adhyavasāya sāhityena tad utpatti tad ākāra tayoḥ grahaṇa kāraṇa tvam sampūrṇam
manaskāre tat na asti iti ced
kim idam bhinna gocareṇa saha sāhityam

original: tathā hy: “adhyavasāyo vāsanāprabodhavaśād utpannaḥ sāmānyam anartharūpaṃ vikalpayati,
analyzed: tathā hi adhyavasāyaḥ vāsanā prabodha vaśāt utpannaḥ sāmānyam anartha rūpam vikalpayati

original: pratyakṣaṃ bahirarthāl labdhātmalābhaṃ tadākāraṃ tam eva sākṣātkarotīti” bhavatāṃ
analyzed: pratyakṣam bahis arthāt labdha ātmalābham tad ākāram tam eva sākṣātkaroti iti bhavatām

original: darśanam. tan na vikalpasāhityaṃ pratyakṣasya kañcana viśeṣaṃ puṣṇāti. tad idam grāhyagrāhakabhāvakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: darśanam tat na vikalpa sāhityam pratyakṣasya kañcana viśeṣam puṣṇāti tat idam grāhya grāhaka bhāva kāraṇam
pratyakṣe pi yat bhavadbhiḥ abhyadhāyi

original: tad yathā yathā vicāryate tathā tathā viśīryata ity anapekṣaṇīyam. tad -- yathā kathañcit
analyzed: tat yathā yathā vicāryate tathā tathā viśīryate iti an apekṣaṇīyam tat yathā kathañcid
pratyakṣasya pratipādita grāhya grāhaka bhāva lakṣaṇa vaikalye pi grāhaka tvam arthasya grāhya tvam
tathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
anyathā nikhila vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt bhavadbhiḥ api pratyapādi

original: tathā śabdasya vācakatvam arthasya vācyatvaṃ pratipadyadhvaṃ yūyam;
analyzed: tathā śabdasya vācaka tvam arthasya vācya tvam pratipadyadhvam yūyam

original: atrāpi dṛṣṭahāner vyavahārocchedasya samānatvāt. athettham ācakṣīthāḥ:
analyzed: atrā api dṛṣṭa hāneḥ vyavahāra ucchedasya samāna tvāt atha ittham ācakṣīthāḥ
yathā nadyāḥ tīre guḍa śakaṭam paryastam

original: dhāvata dhāvataḍimbhakā” ityādivipratārakapuruṣavacanaśravaṇāt pravartamānā vipralambhabhājo jāyante,
analyzed: dhāvata dhāvata ḍimbhakāḥ ityādi vipratāraka puruṣa vacana śravaṇāt pravartamānāḥ vipralambha bhājaḥ jāyante

original: 'taḥ sakalavacaneṣv anāśvāsa iti -- evaṃ tarhi cikicikāyamānamarumarīcikācakracumbi yaj jalollekhi viśadadarśanam udayapadavīṃ samāsādayati  #
analyzed: taḥ sakala vacaneṣu anāśvāsaḥ iti evam tarhi cikicikāyamāna maru marīcikā cakra cumbi yat jala ullekhi viśada darśanam udaya padavīm samāsādayati
tat alīkam avalokitam iti

original: sakalādhyakṣeṣv anāśvāsa ity abhidadhmahe. pāścātyaviparītārthopasthāpakapramāṇabādhitatvād marumarīcikāsu jalajñānam apramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: sakala adhyakṣeṣu anāśvāsaḥ iti abhidadhmahe pāścātya viparīta artha upasthāpaka pramāṇa bādhita tvāt marumarīcikāsu jala jñānam apramāṇam
na śeṣa satya stambha ādi jñānāni
bādhā rahita tvāt iti ced

original: tarhi dhvanāv apy ayaṃ nyāyaḥ kiṃ kākair bhakṣitaḥ?
analyzed: tarhi dhvanau api ayam nyāyaḥ kim kākaiḥ bhakṣitaḥ

original: na hi vayaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pratipadyemahi;
analyzed: na hi vayam sarva śabdānām prāmāṇyam pratipadyemahi

original: kiṃ tarhi suniścitāptapraṇetṛkāṇām eva. tan na prāmāṇyaṃ prati pratyakṣaśabdayor viśeṣam upalabhāmahe. eṣa tu viśeṣaḥ syāt,
analyzed: kim tarhi su niścita āpta praṇetṛkāṇām eva tat na prāmāṇyam prati pratyakṣa śabdayoḥ viśeṣam upalabhāmahe eṣa tu viśeṣaḥ syāt
pratyakṣam cakṣuḥ ādi sāmagrī viśeṣa janya tvāt sannihita niyata artha grāhi spaṣṭa pratibhāsam

original: śābdaṃ tu tathāvidhakāraṇavikalatvān niyatāniyatārthagrāhy aspaṣṭapratibhāsam. na cāiṣa viśeṣaḥ prāmāṇyakṣatikārī,
analyzed: śābdam tu tathāvidha kāraṇa vikala tvāt niyata aniyata artha grāhi aspaṣṭa pratibhāsam na ca eṣa viśeṣaḥ prāmāṇya kṣati kārī
itarathā anumānasya api aprāmāṇyam āsajyeta

original: tasyāpy aviśadāniyatārthagrāhitvāt. paramārthatas tu trikālavyāpinaḥ sarvārthagrahaṇasvabhāvatve
analyzed: tasya api aviśada aniyata artha grāhi tvāt paramārthataḥ tu trikāla vyāpinaḥ sarva artha grahaṇa svabhāva tve
āvaraṇa tiraskṛtasya jīva dravyasya cakṣuḥ ādi sāmagrī sāpekṣa āvaraṇa kṣaya upaśama vaśāt
sannihita spaṣṭa artha grahaṇa pariṇāmaḥ pratyakṣam iti ucyate śabda sāpekṣa kṣaya upaśamān

original: niyatāniyatāviśadārthagrahaṇapariṇāmas tu śābdam iti. tan na tadutpattitadākārate
analyzed: niyata aniyata aviśada artha grahaṇa pariṇāmaḥ tu śābdam iti tat na tad utpatti tad ākāra te

original: pratyakṣe śābde 'nyasmin vā jñāne vāstavyau staḥ. tasmāt pāramārthikābhidheyaprayojanasambandhapratipādakam
analyzed: pratyakṣe śābde vā jñāne vāstavyau staḥ tasmāt pāramārthika abhidheya prayojana sambandha pratipādakam
etat ādi vākyam iti sthitam
tatra abhidheyam vācyam
tat ca iha pramāṇam
tasyāḥ iva prakaraṇena pratipādya tvāt

original: tat pramāṇety avayavena lakṣayati. prayojanaṃ dvedhā:
analyzed: tat pramāṇa iti avayavena lakṣayati prayojanam dvedhā

original: śrotuḥ kartuś ca. punar api dvividham:
analyzed: śrotuḥ kartuḥ ca punar api dvividham

original: anantaraṃ vyavahitaṃ ca. tatra śrotur anantaraprayojanaṃ pramāṇaviṣayā vyutpattiḥ,
analyzed: anantaram vyavahitam ca tatra śrotuḥ anantara prayojanam pramāṇa viṣayā vyutpattiḥ

original: kartur vyutpadyamānasya prājñatvāc chiṣyasya vyutpādanam. tatrātmaprayojanaṃ darśayann
analyzed: kartuḥ vyutpadyamānasya prājña tvāt śiṣyasya vyutpādanam tatra ātma prayojanam darśayan

original: ā[hā]rabhyata iti asya mayetipadasavyapekṣatvāt. śiṣyaprayojanaṃ tu vyutpadity anenopasargadhātusamudāyenāiva
analyzed: āha ārabhyate iti asya mayā iti pada savyapekṣa tvāt śiṣya prayojanam tu anena upasarga dhātu samudāyena

original: tadantaragataṃ lapsyata ity abhiprāyavān kartātmavyāpāraṃ ṇijantena nirdiśati:
analyzed: tad antara gatam lapsyate iti abhiprāyavān kartā ātma vyāpāram ṇic antena nirdiśati

original: vyāvahārikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ca. vyāvahārikaṃ heyopādeyopekṣaṇīyeṣv artheṣu hānopādānopekṣālakṣaṇam.
analyzed: vyāvahārikam pāramārthikam ca vyāvahārikam heya upādeya upekṣaṇīyeṣu artheṣu hāna upādāna upekṣā lakṣaṇam

original: pāramārthikaṃ abhyudayaniḥśreyasāvāptir iti. etat tu sākṣād anuktam apy anantaraprayojanaphalatvāt
analyzed: pāramārthikam abhyudaya niḥśreyasa avāptiḥ iti etat tu sākṣāt anuktam api anantara prayojana phalatvāt
tad vacanena aiva ākṣiptam avagantavyam sambandhaḥ tu upāya upeya lakṣaṇaḥ
tatra upeyam prakaraṇa artha parijñānam
prakaraṇam upāyaḥ

original: tatas tadabhilaṣatā prakaraṇam idam ārambhaṇīyam ity anukto 'pi vacanena sambandho 'rthād gamyata iti tātparyārthaḥ.
analyzed: tatas tat abhilaṣatā prakaraṇam idam ārambhaṇīyam iti vacanena sambandhaḥ rthāt gamyate iti tātparyārthaḥ
adhunā akṣara arthaḥ vivriyate

original: tatra yady api pramāṇaśabdasya sarvakārakair bhāvena ca vyutpatteḥ sukaratvāt “kṛtyalyuṭo
analyzed: tatra yadi api pramāṇa śabdasya sarva kārakaiḥ bhāvena ca vyutpatteḥ sukara tvāt

original: bahulam” anyatrāpītivacanād yathākramam amī kartrarthādikārakabhāvavyutpattyā pramāṇaśabdavācyāḥ,
analyzed: bahulam anyatra api iti vacanāt yathākramam amī kartṛ artha ādi kāraka bhāva vyutpattyā pramāṇa śabda vācyāḥ
tat yathā ātma artha jñāna artha kriyā kāraṇa kalāpa kṣaya upaśama kriyā rūpāḥ tathā api iha jñānam eva adhikriyate
tasyāḥ iva parīkṣā kṣama tvāt

original: itareṣāṃ parīkṣāyās tatpuraḥsaratvād vaiyarthāc ca. tathā hi:
analyzed: itareṣām parīkṣāyāḥ tad puraḥsara tvāt vaiyarthāt ca tathā hi
na arthaḥ tāvat ātmanaḥ parīkṣayā
tasya bhrānta abhrānta jñāneṣu samāna tvāt na api arthasya
tasya upeya tvāt
upāya bhūta jñāna parīkṣaṇena ā iva gata tvāt na arthakriyāyāḥ
tad avagatau parīkṣā vaiyarthyāt nā api kāraṇa kalāpasya
jñāna utpatteḥ prāk svarūpa anavagateḥ

original: paścāt tatsvarūpanirṇayād eva tatsādguṇyavaiguṇyāvagater nairarthakyāt. nāpi kṣayopaśamasya,
analyzed: paścāt tad svarūpa nirṇayāt eva tad sādguṇya vaiguṇya avagateḥ nairarthakyāt nā api kṣaya upaśamasya
tasya jñāna utpāda unnīyamāna rūpa tvāt nā api pramiti mātrasya

original: tasya pramāṇasādhyatayā taccārutādvāreṇāiva samīcīnatāsiddher iti. tad ayam abhiprāyo:
analyzed: tasya pramāṇa sādhya tayā samīcīna tā siddheḥ iti tat ayam

original: yady apy anantadharmādhyāsite vastuni sarva eva śabdārthā nirupacaritā ghaṭante,
analyzed: yadi api ananta dharma adhyāsite vastuni sarve eva śabda arthāḥ nirupacaritāḥ ghaṭante
tathā api yena artham paricchidya artha kriyā samartha artha prārthanayā pravartante pramātāraḥ

original: tad eveha jñānam ātmanā saha dharmirūpatayā tādātmye 'pi dharmarūpatayā vyatiriktaṃ
analyzed: tat eva iha jñānam ātmanā saha dharmi rūpatayā tādātmye dharma rūpatayā vyatiriktam

original: pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇam ity ucyate. tasya vyutpādanaṃ paraparikalpitalakṣaṇādivyudāsena
analyzed: pramīyate nena iti pramāṇam iti ucyate tasya vyutpādanam para parikalpita lakṣaṇa ādi vyudāsena
sva abhipreta lakṣaṇa ādi svarūpa prakāśanam tad artham

original: arthaśabdaḥ prayojanaparyāyaḥ. idam ity artharūpatayā svacetasi vivartamānaṃ prakaraṇaśarīraṃ parāmṛśati;
analyzed: artha śabdaḥ prayojana paryāyaḥ idam iti artha rūpatayā sva cetasi vivartamānam prakaraṇa śarīram parāmṛśati
dvividham hi prakaraṇa śarīram
śabdaḥ rthaḥ ca iti

original: bahiḥ śabdarūpatayā prakāśayiṣyamāṇatve 'py antas tattvārthākāreṇa pratyakṣatvāt. ārabhyata iti padavākyaślokādiracanayā prakriyata iti yāvat.
analyzed: bahis śabda rūpa tayā prakāśayiṣyamāṇa tve pi antar tattva artha ākāreṇa pratyakṣa tvāt ārabhyate iti pada vākya śloka ādi racanayā prakriyate iti yāvat

original: [NAV_0.7] iha ca lakṣaṇasaṃkhyāgocaraphaleṣu pramāṇaṃ prati vipratipadyante pare. tathā hi:
analyzed: iha ca lakṣaṇa saṃkhyā gocara phaleṣu pramāṇam prati vipratipadyante pare tathā hi

original: lakṣaṇe tāvat pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam iti saugatāḥ. anadhigatārthādhigantṛ pramāṇam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ. arthopalabdhihetuḥ pramāṇam iti naiyāyikādayaḥ.  #
analyzed: lakṣaṇe tāvat pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam iti saugatāḥ anadhigata artha adhigantṛ pramāṇam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ artha upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam iti naiyāyika ādayaḥ  /
tathā saṃkhyāyām

original: pratyakṣānumāne dve eva pramāṇe iti saugatāḥ. pratyakṣānumānaśabdopamānārthāpattyabhāvāḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣa anumāne dve eva pramāṇe iti saugatāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna śabda upamāna artha āpatti abhāvāḥ

original: pramāṇānīti mīmāṃsakāḥ. pratyakṣānumānaśabdopamānāni pramāṇānīti naiyāyikāḥ. pratyakṣānumānaśabdāni
analyzed: pramāṇāni iti mīmāṃsakāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna śabda upamānāni pramāṇāni iti naiyāyikāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna śabdāni

original: pramāṇānīti vaiśeṣikāḥ. etāny eva sāṃkhyāḥ. pratyakṣam evāikaṃ pramāṇam iti cārvākāḥ. tathā gocare:
analyzed: pramāṇāni iti vaiśeṣikāḥ etāni eva sāṃkhyāḥ pratyakṣam eva āikam pramāṇam iti cārvākāḥ tathā gocare
paraspara vinirluṭhita kṣaṇa kṣayi parama anulakṣaṇāni sva lakṣaṇāni pramāṇa gocaraḥ tāttvika

original: iti bauddhāḥ. sāmānyaviśeṣātmakaṃ vastv iti mīmāṃsakāḥ. parasparavibhaktau sāmānyaviśeṣāv
analyzed: iti bauddhāḥ sāmānya viśeṣa ātmakam vastu iti mīmāṃsakāḥ paraspara vibhaktau sāmānya viśeṣau

original: iti naiyāyikavaiśeṣikāḥ. traiguṇyarūpaṃ sāmānyam iti sāṃkhyāḥ. bhūtacaṭuṣṭayaṃ pramāṇabhūmīti
analyzed: iti naiyāyika vaiśeṣikāḥ traiguṇya rūpam sāmānyam iti sāṃkhyāḥ bhūta caṭuṣṭayam pramāṇa bhūmī iti
cārvākāḥ tathā phale pi vipratipadyante

original: arthādhigatiḥ pramāṇaphalam iti saugatāḥ. pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pramāṇam uttaram uttaraṃ tu phalam iti mīmāṃsakādayaḥ.
analyzed: artha adhigatiḥ pramāṇa phalam iti saugatāḥ pūrvam pūrvam pramāṇam uttaram uttaram tu phalam iti mīmāṃsaka ādayaḥ
tatra tāvat lakṣaṇa saṃkhyā vipratipattī nirācikīrṣuḥ āha
bādha vivarjitam
pratyakṣam ca parokṣam ca dvidhā
meya viniścayāt

original: [NAV_1.1] tatrāpi pūrvārdhena lakṣaṇavipratipattim uttarārdhena tu saṃkhyāvipratipattiṃ
analyzed: tatra api pūrva ardhena lakṣaṇa vipratipattim uttara ardhena tu saṃkhyā vipratipattim

original: nirācaṣṭe. lakṣaṇaṃ ca pararūpebhyo vyāvartanakṣamo 'sādhāraṇadharmaḥ. lakṣyate paricchidyate
analyzed: nirācaṣṭe lakṣaṇam ca para rūpebhyaḥ sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ lakṣyate paricchidyate

original: vijātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ lakṣyaṃ yena tal lakṣaṇam ity ucyate. tac ceha dvaye pratyāyyāḥ,
analyzed: vijātīyebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam lakṣyam yena tat lakṣaṇam iti ucyate tat ca iha dvaye pratyāyyāḥ
sva darśana anurakta antaḥkaraṇāḥ tīrtha antarīyāḥ vipratipannāḥ

original: tathā mugdhabuddhayo laukikā avyutpannāś ceti. tataś ca yadādau vipratipannān prati lakṣaṇaṃ tadāivaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo draṣṭavyo:
analyzed: tathā mugdha buddhayaḥ laukikāḥ avyutpannāḥ ca iti tatas ca yadā ādau vipratipannān prati lakṣaṇam lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: yad idaṃ bhavatām asmākaṃ ca pramāṇam iti prasiddham,
analyzed: yat idam bhavatām asmākam ca pramāṇam iti prasiddham
tat sva para ābhāsi jñānam bādha vivarjitam mantavyam

original: prasiddhaṃ pramāṇam anūdyāprasiddhaṃ svaparābhāsitvādi vidhīyate. yadā tv avyutpannamatīn pratīdaṃ lakṣaṇam,
analyzed: prasiddham pramāṇam anūdya aprasiddham sva para ābhāsi tva ādi vidhīyate yadā tu avyutpanna matīn prati idam lakṣaṇam

original: tadā pratiprāṇi svaparaprakāśino jñānasya bādharahitasya kasyacit siddhatvād,
analyzed: tadā pratiprāṇi sva para prakāśinaḥ jñānasya bādha rahitasya kasyacid siddha tvāt
anyathā pratiniyata vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt
evam te bodhyante

original: yad ado bhavatāṃ kvacin niyatārthagrāhi svaparaprakāśakaṃ bādharahitaṃ jñānaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat pramāṇam iti budhyantām. atrāpi siddhasyānuvādo  #
analyzed: yat adaḥ bhavatām kvacid niyata artha grāhi sva para prakāśakam bādha rahitam jñānam prasiddham tat pramāṇam iti budhyantām atrā api siddhasya anuvādaḥ
siddhasya vidhānam yojyam
adhunā akṣara arthaḥ

original: tatra pramāṇam iti pūrvavat. sva ātmā svarūpaṃ,
analyzed: tatra pramāṇam iti pūrvavat svaḥ ātmā svarūpam
paraḥ rthaḥ

original: tāv ābhāsayituṃ prakāśayituṃ śīlam yasya tattathā. jñāyate nirṇīyate tattvaṃ yena taj jñānam. bādhyate 'neneti bādhaḥ;
analyzed: tau ābhāsayitum prakāśayitum śīlam yasya tat tathā jñāyate nirṇīyate tattvam yena tat jñānam bādhyate nena iti bādhaḥ

original: viparītārthopasthāpakapramāṇapravṛttir iti yāvat. tena viśeṣeṇa varjitaṃ rahitaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tat pramāṇam iti saṇṭaṅkaḥ.
analyzed: viparīta artha upasthāpaka pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ iti yāvat tena viśeṣeṇa varjitam rahitam yat jñānam tat pramāṇam iti saṇṭaṅkaḥ

original: [NAV_1.3] iha ca vyavacchedyāpekṣayā lakṣaṇe viśeṣaṇapravṛtteḥ svaparābhāsīty anena ye svābhāsy eva jñānaṃ manyante jñānavādino bauddhaviśeṣāḥ,
analyzed: iha ca vyavacchedya apekṣayā lakṣaṇe viśeṣaṇa pravṛtteḥ sva para ābhāsi iti anena ye sva ābhāsi eva jñānam manyante jñāna vādinaḥ bauddha viśeṣāḥ

original: ye ca parābhāsy eva mīmāṃsakanaiyāyikādayas te nirastāḥ. te hi bahirarthābhāvāj jñānaṃ svāṃśaparyavasitasattākam ity ācakṣīran,
analyzed: ye ca eva mīmāṃsaka naiyāyika ādayaḥ te nirastāḥ te hi bahis artha abhāvāt jñānam sva aṃśa paryavasita sattākam iti ācakṣīran
tat ayuktam

original: jñeyārthābhāve jñānābhāvaprasaṅgāt. athārthābhāve 'pi svapnadaśāyāṃ vanadevakulādinānāpratibhāsaṃ jñānam avalokitam iti tathābhūtaṃ sakalaṃ
analyzed: jñeya artha abhāve jñāna abhāva prasaṅgāt atha artha abhāve svapna daśāyām vana devakula ādi nānā pratibhāsam jñānam avalokitam iti tathābhūtam sakalam
tat na
tasya api jāgrat avasthā bhāvi sadbhūta artha darśana sampādita ātma saṃskāram iddha ādi kāraṇa kalāpa sannidhāna prabodha savyapekṣa tvāt
itarathā atyanta ananubhūta bhūta pañcaka atirikta ṣaṣṭha bhūta pratibhāsaḥ syāt kim ca

original: katham ekaṃ jñānaṃ sitapītādyanekākāravivartam iti praṣṭavyo bhavān. anādyavidyāvāsanād iti ced,

analyzed: tad saṃvedane ca arthasya api vyatiriktasya saṃvedanam iti sa duṣpratiṣedhaḥ syāt vedya vedaka ākāra kaluṣitāt jñānāt eva vyatiriktā tad kāraṇa bhūtā

original: tathā jaḍam api tadvaśād eva bodharūpaṃ prakāśata iti viparītāpatter artha eva siddhim āskanden,

original: svaprakāśābhāve paraprakāśāyogāt. na hi pradīpaḥ svarūpam anuddyotayan ghaṭādyuddyotane vyāpriyate. svayaṃ cāpratītam api yady arthaṃ grāhayati
analyzed: sva prakāśa abhāve para prakāśa ayogāt na hi pradīpaḥ sva rūpam an uddyotayan ghaṭa ādi uddyotane vyāpriyate svayam ca apratītam api yadi artham grāhayati
devadattasya utpannam yajñadattam grāhayet

original: paraprakāśanamātre dūrāsannādibhedaḥ prathamānānām arthānāṃ kimapekṣaś cakāsti?

original: tasmād antarmukhākārasya bahirarthagrahaṇe saty ayaṃ ghaṭām āṭīkate nānyathā. athārthāpattyādinā pramāṇāntareṇa tad antarniviṣṭaṃ gṛhyate,

original: tatas tadapekṣayā yokṣyate dūrāsannādibheda iti cen, na,

analyzed: avyavahita nirṇaya abhāvāt iti ākūtam artha upalabdhi hetu tvāt tasya prāmāṇyam iti ced

original: dehāder api tatkāraṇatayā prāmāṇyāpatter ity āstāṃ tāvat.

yat ca kutarka bhrānta cetasām nija nija darśana ākarṇana prabhavam kṣaṇa kṣayi sāmānya viśeṣa aikānta īśvara ādi kṛta bhuvana pratibhāsam

original: sa yady api sakalakālaṃ taddoṣāvyuparame pramātur nijadarśanena na bādhyate,

original: tathāpi tajjalajadhavalatāgrāhinā janāntaradarśanena bādhitatvān na pramāṇam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: tathā api tad jala ja dhavala tā grāhinā jana antara darśanena bādhita tvāt na pramāṇam iti uktam bhavati

original: [NAV_1.6] samastalakṣaṇena tu yat pare pratyapīpadann “anadhigatārthādhigantṛ pramāṇam“,
analyzed: samasta lakṣaṇena tu yat pare pratyapīpadan anadhigata artha adhigantṛ pramāṇam
avisaṃvādakam pramāṇam

original: “arthopalabdhihetuḥ pramāṇam” ityādi tan nirāsthat. tathā hy:
analyzed: artha upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam ityādi tat nirāsthat tathā hi
anadhigata artha adhigantṛ tvam kim abhidhīyate

original: jñānāntareṇānadhigatam arthaṃ yad adhigacchati tat pramāṇam iti cet,
analyzed: jñāna antareṇa anadhigatam artham yat adhigacchati tat pramāṇam iti ced

original: tarhi taj jñānāntaraṃ parakīyaṃ svakīyaṃ vā?
analyzed: tarhi tat jñāna antaram parakīyam svakīyam vā
tat yadi parakīyam
tat ayuktam
sarvajña jñānasya sakala artha gocara tayā sarva prākṛta loka jñānānām adhigata artha adhigantṛ tvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt
tad artha grāhi jana antara darśana sambhavāt ca atha svakīyam

original: tatrāpi so 'dhigamyo 'rthaḥ kiṃ dravyam uta paryāyo yad vā,
analyzed: tatra api saḥ dhi gamyaḥ rthaḥ kim dravyam uta paryāyaḥ yat vā

original: dravyaviśiṣṭaḥ paryāyaḥ paryāyaviśiṣṭaṃ vā dravyam iti,
analyzed: dravya viśiṣṭaḥ paryāyaḥ paryāya viśiṣṭam vā dravyam iti
tathā kim sāmānyam uta viśeṣa
āhosvit sāmānya viśiṣṭaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: viśeṣaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sāmānyam ity aṣṭau pakṣāḥ. tatra yady ādyam urarīkuruṣe,
analyzed: viśeṣa viśiṣṭam vā sāmānyam iti aṣṭau pakṣāḥ tatra yadi ādyam urarīkuruṣe
tat ayuktam
dravyasya nitya tva aika tvābhyām anadhigata aṃśa abhāvāt atha dvitīyam
tat api acāru

original: paryāyasya prācīnasaṃvedanodayasamayadhvastasya saṃvedanāntaraprabhavakālaṃ yāvat pratīkṣaṇāsambhavena viśeṣaṇānarthakyāt. uta tṛtīyaṃ,
analyzed: paryāyasya prācīna saṃvedana udaya samaya dhvastasya saṃvedana antara prabhava kālam yāvat pratīkṣaṇa asambhavena viśeṣaṇa ānarthakyāt uta tṛtīyam
tat api asādhīyaḥ

original: vikalpadvayānatikramāt. sa hi dravyaviśiṣṭaḥ paryāyaḥ samakālabhāvinā jñānenānadhigato 'dhigamyate,
analyzed: vikalpa dvaya anatikramāt sa hi dravya viśiṣṭaḥ paryāyaḥ sama kāla bhāvinā jñānena anadhigataḥ dhigamyate

original: yad vā kālāntarabhāvineti. na tāvat samakālabhāvinā,
analyzed: yat vā kāla antara bhāvinā iti na tāvat sama kāla bhāvinā

original: tatsambhavābhāvena viśeṣaṇavaiphalyāt. na hi sambhavo 'sty ekasya pramātur ekakālaṃ dravyakroḍīkṛtāikaparyāyaviṣayasaṃvedanadvayavṛtteḥ,
analyzed: tad sambhava abhāvena viśeṣaṇa vaiphalyāt na hi sambhavaḥ u sti ekasya pramātuḥ eka kālam dravya kroḍīkṛta aika paryāya viṣaya saṃvedana dvaya vṛtteḥ
tathā anubhava abhavāt
parasparam adhigata artha adhigantṛ tvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt ca nā api kāla antara bhāvinā
gṛhyamāṇa paryāyasya kāla antara an āskandanāt
pūrva uttara kṣaṇa truṭita vartamāna kṣaṇa mātra sambaddha tvāt tasya etena paryāya viśiṣṭa dravya pakṣaḥ pi prativyūḍhaḥ
samāna yogakṣema tvāt atha sāmānyam
tat api asaṃbaddham

original: tadekatayā prathamajñānena sākalyagrahaṇād uttareṣāṃ sāmānyajñānānām adhigatārthagocaratayāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt. atha viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: tad eka tayā prathama jñānena sākalya grahaṇāt uttareṣām sāmānya jñānānām adhigata artha gocara tayā aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt atha viśeṣaḥ

original: sa nityo 'nityo veti vaktavyam. nityaś ced,
analyzed: sa nityaḥ nityaḥ vā iti vaktavyam nityaḥ ced

original: evaṃ saty ādyasaṃvedanenāiva tasya sāmastyagrahaṇād uttareṣāṃ tadviṣayāṇām adhigatagocaratvenāprāmāṇyaprasaktiḥ. anityaś cet,
analyzed: evam sati ādi a saṃvedanena ā iva tasya sāmastya grahaṇāt uttareṣām tad viṣayāṇām adhigata gocara tvena aprāmāṇya prasaktiḥ anityaḥ ced
paryāya dūṣaṇena pratikṣiptiḥ atha sāmānya viśiṣṭaḥ viśeṣaḥ
kā asya viśiṣṭa tā
kim tādātmyam uta tad sannidhi mātram
tādātmyam ced
anyathā tādātmya kṣateḥ

original: tadviṣayānyajñānānām aprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta. tatsānnidhyapakṣe tu dvayor api parasparaṃ
analyzed: tad viṣaya anya jñānānām aprāmāṇyam prasajyeta tad sānnidhya pakṣe tu dvayoḥ api parasparam

original: viśakalitarūpatvāt pakṣadvayoditaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ paścāllagnaṃ dhāvati. viśeṣaviśiṣṭasāmānyapakṣe
analyzed: viśakalita rūpa tvāt pakṣa dvaya uditam dūṣaṇam paścāt lagnam dhāvati viśeṣa viśiṣṭa sāmānya pakṣe

original: punar etad eva viparītaṃ yojyam. tan nānadhigatārthādhigantṛtvaṃ jñānasya kathañcid
analyzed: punar etat eva viparītam yojyam tat na anadhigata artha adhigantṛ tvam jñānasya kathañcid

original: vicārabhāragauravaṃ sahata ity alakṣaṇam iti sthitam. avisaṃvādakatvam adhunā vicāryate:
analyzed: vicāra bhāra gauravam sahate iti alakṣaṇam iti sthitam avisaṃvādaka tvam adhunā vicāryate

original: tat kiṃ pradarśitārthaprāptyāhosvid prāptiyogyārthopadarśakatvena utāvicalitārthaviṣayatvena bhavān jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ kathayati?
analyzed: tat kim pradarśita artha prāptyā āhosvit prāpti yogya artha upadarśaka tvena uta avicalita artha viṣaya tvena bhavān jñānasya prāmāṇyam kathayati
yadi prathamaḥ kalpaḥ
tat ayuktam
jala budbuda ādi mumūrṣu padārtha utpādita saṃvedanasya apramāṇa tā utpatteḥ
prāpti kāle tasya dhvasta tvāt atha dvitīyas
tat api acāru
prāpti ayogya deśa sthita graha nakṣatra ādi gocara jñānasya aprāmāṇya prasakteḥ

original: anucitadeśāvasthānenāiva prāptyanarhatvāt teṣām. atha tṛtīyaḥ pakṣas,
analyzed: prāpti anarha tvāt teṣām atha tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ
tatra api avicalita viṣaya tām katham avaiṣi
etat eva asmābhiḥ uditam
kim bhavataḥ paruṣam ābhāti

original: na hi svaparaprakāśi jñānaṃ bādhārahitaṃ vimucyānyasya viṣayānirākaraṇaṃ jñānāntareṇa
analyzed: na hi sva para prakāśi jñānam bādhā rahitam vimucya anyasya viṣaya a nirākaraṇam jñāna antareṇa

original: prekṣāmahe. tat tad eva nyāyāt pramāṇaṃ bhavadbhir abhyupagatam iti. “arthopalabdhihetuḥ
analyzed: prekṣāmahe tat tat eva nyāyāt pramāṇam bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagatam iti artha upalabdhi hetuḥ

original: pramāṇam” ity etad api na parīkṣāṃ kṣamate,
analyzed: pramāṇam iti etat api na parīkṣām kṣamate

original: śarīrāder api tatkāraṇatayā prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt. avyavahitam arthopalambhakāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: śarīra ādeḥ api tad kāraṇa tayā prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt avyavahitam artha upalambha kāraṇam pramāṇam
na deha ādikam iti ced

original: evaṃ tarhi jñānam eva svaparāvirbhāvakaṃ nirbādhakaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: evam tarhi jñānam eva sva para āvirbhāvakam nirbādhakam ca pramāṇam
na sannikarṣa ādi

original: tadsadbhāve 'py arthaparicchedābhāvāt. tasmād etad eva cāru pramāṇalakṣaṇam iti.
analyzed: tad sadbhāve pi artha pariccheda abhāvāt tasmāt etat eva cāru pramāṇa lakṣaṇam iti
adhunā tad saṃkhyām āha
pratyakṣam ca ityādi
tatra siddhānta prasiddha pāramārthika pratyakṣa apekṣayā akṣa śabdaḥ jīva paryāya tayā prasiddhaḥ

original: iha tu vyāvahārikapratyakṣaprastāvād akṣadhvanir indriyavacano gṛhyate. tataś cākṣaṃ
analyzed: iha tu vyāvahārika pratyakṣa prastāvāt akṣa dhvaniḥ indriya vacanaḥ gṛhyate tatas ca akṣam

original: pratigataṃ pratyakṣaṃ. yad indriyam āśrityojjihīte 'rthasākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam
analyzed: pratigatam pratyakṣam yat indriyam āśritya ujjihīte ṛtha sākṣātkāri jñānam tat pratyakṣam
iti arthaḥ etat ca pratyakṣa śabda vyutpatti nimittam

original: na tu pravṛttinimittam. sa hy evaṃ vyutpāditaḥ sākṣād grāhyagrāhakaṃ jñānaviśeṣaṃ lakṣayati,
analyzed: na tu pravṛtti nimittam sa hi evam vyutpāditaḥ sākṣāt grāhya grāhakam jñāna viśeṣam lakṣayati
tatra ā iva rūḍha tvāt

original: yathā gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdaḥ kakudādimantaṃ piṇḍaviśeṣaṃ gacchantam agacchantaṃ vā gocarayati,
analyzed: yathā gamana kriyāyām vyutpāditaḥ pi go śabdaḥ kakud ādimantam piṇḍa viśeṣam gacchantam a gacchantam vā gocarayati
tatra ā iva tasya prasiddha tvāt
na gamana kriyā yuktam api puruṣa ādikam

original: viparyayād iti. tataś ca sarvajñānānāṃ yat svarūpasaṃvedanaṃ tad api pratyakṣam ity uktaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: viparyayāt iti tatas ca sarva jñānānām yat sva rūpa saṃvedanam tat api pratyakṣam iti uktam bhavati

original: tatrāpi svarūpasya grāhyasya sākṣātkaraṇasadbhāvād iti. akṣebhyaḥ parato vartata
analyzed: tatra api sva rūpasya grāhyasya sākṣāt karaṇa sadbhāvāt iti akṣebhyaḥ paratas vartata

original: iti parokṣam. akṣavyāpāranirapekṣaṃ manovyāpāreṇāsākṣādarthaparicchedakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ
analyzed: iti parokṣam akṣa vyāpāra nirapekṣam manaḥ vyāpāreṇa a sākṣāt artha paricchedakam yat jñānam
tat parokṣam iti bhāvaḥ

original: [NAV_1.8] caśabdau pratyakṣaparokṣayos tulyakakṣatāṃ lakṣayataḥ. tena yat pare prāhuḥ:
analyzed: caśabdau pratyakṣa parokṣayoḥ tulya kakṣa tām lakṣayataḥ tena yat pare prāhuḥ
pratyakṣam sakala pramāṇa jyeṣṭham ityādi tat apāstam bhavati
dvayoḥ api prāmāṇyam prati aviśeṣāt

original: viśadāviśadapratibhāsaviśeṣasya sato 'pi jyeṣṭhatāṃ praty anaṅgatvāt. pratyakṣasya puraḥsaratvāt parokṣasya kaniṣṭhateti cen,
analyzed: viśada a viśada pratibhāsa viśeṣasya sataḥ pi jyeṣṭha tām prati an aṅga tvāt pratyakṣasya puraḥsara tvāt parokṣasya kaniṣṭha tā iti ced
na ayam ekāntaḥ
sarvatra anyathā anupapanna tā avadhārita ucchvāsa niḥśvāsa ādi jīva liṅga sadbhāva asadbhāvābhyām jīva sākṣātkāri pratyakṣa kṣūṇe jīvanmṛta pratīti darśanāt
anyathā loka vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt kvacid pratyakṣa parigṛhīta sambandha balāt parokṣam

original: pravartata iti pratyakṣasya jyeṣṭhatvakalpane “paśya mṛgo dhāvatīty“ādiśabdabalāt
analyzed: pravartate iti pratyakṣasya jyeṣṭha tva kalpane paśya mṛgaḥ dhāvati ityādi śabda balāt
kṛkāṭikā moṭana dvāreṇa mṛga viṣayam

original: tathā smaraṇāt saṅketagrahaṇād vāpūrvāpūrvārthadarśanakutūhalādinā vanadevakulādigocaraṃ parokṣapūrvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam iti parokṣasya jyeṣṭhatāsajyeta.
analyzed: tathā smaraṇāt saṅketa grahaṇāt vā apūrva apūrva artha darśana kutūhala ādinā vana devakula ādi gocaram parokṣa pūrvam pratyakṣam dṛṣṭam iti parokṣasya jyeṣṭha tā āsajyeta

original: [NAV_1.9] dvidheti. “sarvaṃ vākyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ pravartata” iti nyāyād,
analyzed: dvidhā iti sarvam vākyam sāvadhāraṇam pravartate iti nyāyāt
anyathā niyata artha pradarśaka tvena tad uccāraṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt

original: viparītākāranirākaraṇacāturyāyogena nirākāṅkṣapravṛttyasiddher dvidhāivety avadhāraṇena paraparikalpitaviparītasaṃkhyāntaraṃ tiraskurute,
analyzed: viparīta ākāra nirākaraṇa cāturya ayogena nirākāṅkṣa pravṛtti asiddheḥ dvidhā iva iti avadhāraṇena para parikalpita viparīta saṃkhyā antaram tiraskurute
tasya yukti bādhita tvāt

original: [NAV_1.10] tathā hi: pratyakṣam evāikaṃ pramāṇam ity asat,
analyzed: tathā hi pratyakṣam eva āikam pramāṇam iti asat

original: parokṣābhāve tasyāiva prāmāṇyāyogāt. sa hi kāścit pratyakṣavyaktīr arthakriyāsamarthārthaprāpakatvenāvyabhicāriṇīr upalabhyānyās tadviparītatayā  #
analyzed: parokṣa abhāve tasyāḥ iva prāmāṇya ayogāt sa hi kāścid pratyakṣa vyaktīḥ arthakriyā samartha artha prāpaka tvena avyabhicāriṇīḥ upalabhya anyāḥ tad viparīta tayā
vyabhicāriṇīḥ ca

original: tataḥ kālāntare punar api tādṛśetarāṇāṃ pratyakṣavyaktīnāṃ pramāṇatetarate samācakṣīta.
analyzed: tatas kāla antare punar api tādṛśa itarāṇām pratyakṣa vyaktīnām pramāṇa tā itarate samācakṣīta
na ca pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnyam purovarti artha grahaṇa paryavasita sattākam pratyakṣam
pūrva apara kāla bhāvinīnām pratyakṣa vyaktīnām sādṛśyam prāmāṇya nibandhanam upalakṣayitum

original: kṣamate. na cāyaṃ svapratītigocarāṇām api pratyakṣavyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ paraṃ pratipādayitum
analyzed: kṣamate na ca ayam sva pratīti gocarāṇām api pratyakṣa vyaktīnām prāmāṇyam param pratipādayitum
īśaḥ tasmāt avaśyantayā yathādṛṣṭa pratyakṣa vyakti sādharmya dvāreṇa adhunātana pratyakṣa vyaktīnām

original: prāmāṇyapratyāyakaṃ paraparipādakaṃ ca parokṣāntargatam anumānarūpaṃ pramāṇāntaram
analyzed: prāmāṇya pratyāyakam para paripādakam ca parokṣa antargatam anumāna rūpam pramāṇa antaram

original: urarīkartavyam. parāvabodhārthaṃ ca pratyakṣam evāikaṃ pramāṇaṃ nānyad astīty ullapann
analyzed: urarīkartavyam para avabodha artham ca pratyakṣam eva āikam pramāṇam na anyat asti iti ullapan
unmatta tām ātmanaḥ lakṣayati
pratyakṣeṇa para cetaḥ vṛtti sākṣātkaraṇa abhāvāt vyāpāra vyāhāra ceṣṭā viśeṣa darśanāt bodha viśeṣa avagatau

original: parokṣasya prāmāṇyaṃ balād āpatatīti nyāyāt. svargādṛṣṭadevatādipratiṣedhaṃ na pratyakṣeṇa kartum arhati,
analyzed: parokṣasya prāmāṇyam balāt āpatati iti nyāyāt svarga adṛṣṭa devatā ādi pratiṣedham na pratyakṣeṇa kartum arhati

original: tasya sannihitamātraviṣayatvāt. na cāyaṃ tadpratiṣedhena kharakharakacārvākatām āpnoti,
analyzed: tasya sannihita mātra viṣaya tvāt na ca ayam tad pratiṣedhena khara kharaka cārvāka tām āpnoti

original: pramāṇāntaraṃ ca tatpratiṣedhārthaṃ necchatīti viṣamam etat kathaṃ kuryād iti savismayaṃ naś cetaḥ. kiṃ ca,
analyzed: pramāṇa antaram ca tad pratiṣedha artham na icchati iti viṣamam etat katham kuryāt iti sa vismayam naḥ cetaḥ kim ca

original: pratyakṣam api kathaṃ pramāṇatāṃ svīkarotīti vaktavyam,
analyzed: pratyakṣam api katham pramāṇa tām svīkaroti iti vaktavyam
gṛhyamāṇa padārtha anvaya vyatireka anukaraṇāt tathā hi
tat samagra sāmagrīka padārtha balena unmajjati

original: tatabhāve visphāritekṣaṇayugalasyāpi pramātur nodīyata iti yadi brūṣe,
analyzed: tata bhāve visphārita īkṣaṇa yugalasya api pramātuḥ nā udīyate iti yadi brūṣe
parokṣe pi tarhi samānam
tat api bahis artha sāmarthyāt evā ullasati
tad sambaddha liṅga śabda dvāreṇa tasya utpatteḥ
anyathā parokṣa ābhāsa tā prasaṅgāt
tasya ca alīka tve pāramārthika parokṣa prāmāṇya kṣateḥ ayogāt
anyathā pratyakṣam api gagana tala avalambi śaśadhara yugala avalokana caturam alīkam avalokitam

original: iti sakalaviśadadarśanāni satyatābhimatāny apy alīkatām aśnuvīran. tan na pramāṇabhūtaṃ
analyzed: iti sakala viśada darśanāni satyatā abhimatāni api alīka tām aśnuvīran tat na pramāṇa bhūtam

original: parokṣaṃ kadācana gṛhyamāṇapadārthasattāṃ vihāyotpattum utsahata iti pratyakṣavat
analyzed: parokṣam kadācana gṛhyamāṇa padārtha sattām vihāya utpattum utsahate iti pratyakṣa vat
pramāṇa koṭim ārohati balāt iti sthitam

original: [NAV_1.11] tathā yad api parair uktadvayātiriktaṃ pramāṇasaṃkhyāntaraṃ pratyajñāyi,
analyzed: tathā yat api paraiḥ ukta dvaya atiriktam pramāṇa saṃkhyā antaram pratyajñāyi

original: tatrāpi yat paryālocyamānam upamānārthāpattivat pramāṇatām ātmasātkaroti,
analyzed: tatra api yat paryālocyamānam upamāna artha āpatti vat pramāṇa tām ātmasātkaroti

original: tad anayor eva pratyakṣaparokṣayor antarbhāvanīyam. yat punar vicāryamāṇaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitābhāvavat prāmāṇyam eva nāskandati,
analyzed: tat anayoḥ eva pratyakṣa parokṣayoḥ antar bhāvanīyam yat punar vicāryamāṇam mīmāṃsaka parikalpita abhāva vat prāmāṇyam eva na āskandati

original: na tena bahirbhūtenāntarbhūtena vā kiñcin naḥ prayojanam avastutvād ity apakarṇanīyam.

original: vikalpaśūnyatayākiñcitkaratvād ity uktam. anumānāt tu tatsādhane vikalpayugalaṃ tadavastham evāvatiṣṭheta,
analyzed: vikalpa śūnya tayā akiñcitkara tvāt iti uktam anumānāt tu tad sādhane vikalpa yugalam tad avastham evā avatiṣṭheta
tad prāmāṇya sādhane pi anumāna kalpanā iti anavasthā kim ca
gṛhīta sambandhasya anumānam pravarteta
sambandhaḥ tri kāla gocaraḥ

original: na ca pratyakṣaṃ taṃ lakṣayituṃ kṣamate,
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣam tam lakṣayitum kṣamate

original: taduttarakālabhāvino vikalpasyāpi vyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa tanniṣṭhatābhyupagamāt. anumānād grahīṣyatīti cen nanu tad api sambandhapūrvakaṃ pravarteta,
analyzed: tad uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ vikalpasya api vyāvahārika abhiprāyeṇa tad niṣṭha tā abhyupagamāt anumānāt grahīṣyati iti ced nanu tat api sambandha pūrvakam pravarteta

original: tadgrahaṇe 'pīyaṃ vārtety anavasthā. tasmād anumānam abhilaṣatā gatyantarābhāvāt
analyzed: tad grahaṇe pi iyam vārttā iti anavasthā tasmāt anumānam abhilaṣatā gati antara abhāvāt

ca prastuta tad dvaividhyasya vighaṭita tvāt

original: anyad api yad evaṃvidham avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ tat pramāṇam astv ity alaṃ śuṣkābhimāneneti. yadi punaḥ sādhyārthānyathānupapannahetusampāditam
analyzed: anyat api yat evaṃvidham avisaṃvādi jñānam tat pramāṇam astu iti alam śuṣka abhimānena iti yadi punar sādhya artha anyathā anupapanna hetu sampāditam

original: tadā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ cety api dvaividhyaṃ ghaṭām aṭed eva;
analyzed: tadā pratyakṣam anumānam ca iti api dvaividhyam aṭet eva

original: meyaviniścayād iti dvidhaiveti ca kākākṣigolakanyāyenātrāpi sambandhanīyam. tataś cāyam artho:

original: dvābhyām eva prakārābhyāṃ meyasya grāhyārthasya viniścayāt svarūpanirṇayād;
analyzed: dvābhyām eva prakārābhyām meyasya grāhya arthasya viniścayāt svarūpa nirṇayāt

original: dve eva yathokte pramāṇe na nyūnam adhikaṃ ceti. ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ:

atirekiṇā rūpeṇa prakāśate iti abhinnam

upalambha kāraṇa samagra tāyām api anupalambhāt
vaiviktyam hi tatra adhyakṣa siddham
vacanāt vyāmohaḥ nivartyeta

original: tathehāpi vidvadbhir draṣṭavyam. nirṇītaṃ tallakṣaṇam adhyakṣeṇa,
analyzed: tathā iha api vidvadbhiḥ draṣṭavyam nirṇītam tad lakṣaṇam adhyakṣeṇa
tasya vyavasāya rūpa tvāt

original: vacanaṃ punar viparītāropanirākaraṇe vyāpriyata iti sthitam. tad evaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyena pratipādya tadgataṃ kucodyaṃ paryahāry ācāryeṇa.
analyzed: vacanam punar viparīta āropa nirākaraṇe vyāpriyate iti sthitam tat evam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam sāmānyena pratipādya tad gatam ku codyam paryahāri ācāryeṇa

original: [NAV_4.0] adhunā tadviṣayām eva saṃkhyāvipratipattiṃ nirācikīrṣatā ye pratyakṣaparokṣalakṣaṇe pramāṇavyaktī prāk prakrānte,
analyzed: adhunā tad viṣayām eva saṃkhyā vipratipattim nirācikīrṣatā ye pratyakṣa parokṣa lakṣaṇe pramāṇa vyaktī prāk prakrānte

original: tayor api lakṣaṇaṃ prati vipratipadyante 'pare. atas tallakṣaṇam api vaktavyam iti tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇam abhidhātukāma āha:
analyzed: tayoḥ api lakṣaṇam prati vipratipadyante pare atas tad lakṣaṇam api vaktavyam iti tāvat pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam abhidhātu kāmaḥ āha
aparokṣa tayā arthasya grāhakam jñānam īdṛśam
pratyakṣam
itarat jñeyam parokṣam grahaṇa īkṣayā
tatra pratyakṣam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ

original: aparokṣatayārthasya grāhakaṃ jñānam iti lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ. parokṣo 'kṣagocarātītas,
analyzed: aparokṣa tayā arthasya grāhakam jñānam iti lakṣaṇa nirdeśaḥ
tatas nyaḥ parokṣaḥ
tad bhāvaḥ tad tā tayā

original: sākṣātkṛtatayeti yāvat. aryata ity artho 'vagamyata iti hṛdayam;
analyzed: sākṣātkṛta tayā iti yāvat aryate iti arthaḥ vagamyate iti hṛdayam

original: arthyata iti vārtho dāhapākādyarthakriyārthibhir abhilaṣyata iti yāvat. tasya grāhakaṃ vyavasāyātmakatayā sākṣāt paricchedakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ,
analyzed: arthyataḥ iti vā arthaḥ dāha pāka ādi arthakriyā arthibhiḥ abhilaṣyate iti yāvat tasya grāhakam vyavasāya ātmaka tayā sākṣāt paricchedakam yat jñānam

original: tad īdṛśam itīdṛg eva pratyakṣam iti saṇṭaṅkaḥ. tatra jñānagrahaṇena yat sāṃkhyāḥ prāhuḥ:
analyzed: tat īdṛśam iti īdṛś eva pratyakṣam iti saṇṭaṅkaḥ tatra jñāna grahaṇena yat sāṃkhyāḥ prāhuḥ
śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam
iti tat tiraskaroti

original: śrotrādīnāṃ prakṛtivikāratayā tadvṛtter vyāpāralakṣaṇāyā jaḍatayā pratyakṣatvāyogād;
analyzed: śrotra ādīnām prakṛti vikāra tayā tad vṛtteḥ vyāpāra lakṣaṇāyāḥ jaḍa tayā pratyakṣa tva ayogāt
artha paricchitti hetutayā pratyakṣa tve āloka ādi jaḍa kāraṇa kalāpa vyāpārasya api pratyakṣa tā āpadyeta
viśeṣa abhāvāt iti

original: [NAV_4.2] arthasya grāhakam ity asya grahaṇekṣayeti vakṣyamāṇapadasāpekṣatvād,
analyzed: arthasya grāhakam iti asya grahaṇa īkṣayā iti vakṣyamāṇa pada sāpekṣa tvāt

original: amunā bahir api ye 'rthakalākalanavikalaṃ sakalam api jñānaṃ pralapanti tān nirasyati;
analyzed: amunā bahis api ye rtha kalā kalana vikalam sakalam api jñānam pralapanti tān nirasyati

original: svāṃśagrahaṇe hy antaḥsaṃvedanaṃ vyāpriyate yathā -- tathā bahir apītarathārthavaj jñānasantānāntarāṇy api viśīryeran,
analyzed: sva aṃśa grahaṇe hi antar saṃvedanam vyāpriyate yathā tathā bahis jñāna santāna antarāṇi api viśīryeran
svapna dṛṣṭāntena tad anumānasya upaplava mātra tā āpatteḥ

original: svavijñānasyāiva tathā tathā vijṛmbhaṇāt. tathā ca pramāṇaprameyapratipādyapratipādakakāryakāraṇabhāvādayaḥ pralīyerann,
analyzed: tathā tathā vijṛmbhaṇāt tathā ca pramāṇa prameya pratipādya pratipādaka kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādayaḥ pralīyeran

original: ātmavyatirekeṇātmīyapūrvottarakṣaṇayor api jñānasya pravṛttinirodhāpatteḥ. advayavijñānatattvasādhanenānukūlam ācarasīti cet,
analyzed: ātma vyatirekeṇa ātmīya pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ api jñānasya pravṛtti nirodha āpatteḥ advaya vijñāna tattva sādhanena anukūlam ācarasi iti ced
syāt etat

original: yadi bhavataḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭasakalavyavahārocchedena kudarśanavāsanāhitādṛṣṭādvayatattvaparikalpanāt pratikūlaṃ na syāt. tan nārthaviraheṇa  #
analyzed: yadi bhavataḥ pramāṇa paridṛṣṭa sakala vyavahāra ucchedena ku darśana vāsanā hita adṛṣṭa advaya tattva parikalpanāt pratikūlam na syāt tat na artha viraheṇa
nirhetuka tva prasaṅgāt iti
grāhakam iti ca nirṇāyakam draṣṭavyam
nirṇaya abhāve rtha grahaṇa ayogāt tena yat tāthāgataiḥ pratyapādi
pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam
iti tat apāstam bhavati
tasya yukti rikta tvāt tathā hi
te nirvikalpaka tve dhyakṣasya ayuktīḥ kheṭayanti kila idam artha sāmarthyena udīyate
sannihita artha kriyā samartha artha grāhaka tvāt na ca arthe dhvanayaḥ santi
tad hetu vilakṣaṇa kāraṇa antara janya tvāt

original: tataś cāsāv upanipatya svagocaraṃ saṃvedanam utthāpayan svākāram anukārayati. tan na tadgrāhiṇi vijñāne śabdasaṃśleṣo yuktaḥ. kiṃ ca,
analyzed: tatas ca asau upanipatya sva gocaram saṃvedanam utthāpayan sva ākāram anukārayati tat na tad grāhiṇi vijñāne śabda saṃśleṣaḥ yuktaḥ kim ca

original: yady utpādakārthopayoge 'pi taṃ tāvan na gṛhṇīyāt,
analyzed: yadi utpādaka artha upayoge tam tāvat na gṛhṇīyāt

original: saṃvedanam api tu smaraṇasampāditaṃ tadabhidhāyakadhvanisaṃyojanaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaṃ tāvad āsīta,
analyzed: saṃvedanam api tu smaraṇa sampāditam tad abhidhāyaka dhvani saṃyojanam pratīkṣamāṇam tāvat āsīta

original: tarhi datto jalāñjalir arthagrahaṇasya. tathā hi:
analyzed: tarhi dattaḥ jala añjaliḥ artha grahaṇasya tathā hi

original: tam artham apaśyaṃs tasmin gṛhītasaṅketaṃ tadabhidhāyakadhvaniṃ nānusmaraty,
analyzed: tam artham a paśyan tasmin gṛhīta saṅketam tad abhidhāyaka dhvanim na anusmarati
upāya abhāvāt

original: ananusmaraṃś ca purovartiny arthe na yojayati,
analyzed: an anusmaran ca purovartini arthe na yojayati
smṛti upasthāpana vyatirekeṇa tad yojana aśakteḥ

original: ayojayaṃś ca bhavadabhiprāyeṇa na paśyatīti dhāndhyād āndhyamāpadyeta. yadi cendriyajam api jñānaṃ vikalpakaluṣitam iṣyeta,
analyzed: ayojayan ca bhavat abhiprāyeṇa na paśyati iti dhā āndhyāt āndhyam āpadyeta yadi ca indriya jam api jñānam vikalpa kaluṣitam iṣyeta

original: tadā tad api manorājyādivikalpavad vikalpāntarāvirbhāve sati nivarteta;
analyzed: tadā tat api manaḥ rājya ādi vikalpa vat vikalpa antara āvirbhāve sati nivarteta
na ca etat asti
sannihita go piṇḍa gocarasya cakṣuḥ ja saṃvedanasya aśva ādi viṣaya vikalpa udaye pi anivartanāt

original: saṃhṛtasakalavikalpasyāpi ca parisphuṭasannihitārthaviṣayadarśanasiddheḥ. tan nākṣajaṃ jñānaṃ śabdasamparkam anubhavatīti.
analyzed: saṃhṛta sakala vikalpasya api ca parisphuṭa sannihita artha viṣaya darśana siddheḥ tat na akṣa jam jñānam śabda samparkam anubhavati iti
atra pratividhīyate yat tāvat uktam
aśabdaka artha sāmarthya udbhava tvāt dhvani rahitam adhyakṣam iti
tat ayuktam

original: na hi śabdāsampṛktārthajam ity etāvatāivābhilāpavinākṛtam iti vaktuṃ śakyam,
analyzed: na hi śabda asampṛkta artha jam iti etāvatā iva abhilāpa vinākṛtam iti vaktum śakyam

original: anyathā jaḍārthajanitam iti jaḍam api tat syāt. atha bodharūpamanaskārasāhityān na jaḍam iti brūṣe,
analyzed: anyathā jaḍa artha janitam iti jaḍam api tat syāt atha bodha rūpa manaskāra sāhityāt na jaḍam iti brūṣe

original: tathā saty abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭamanaskārasanniyogāt sābhilāpam api syāt. kiṃ ca,
analyzed: tathā sati abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭa manaskāra sanniyogāt sa abhilāpam api syāt kim ca

original: viviktāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svākārārpaṇadvāreṇa svagocaraṃ jñānam utpādayantaḥ katham asantam ātmani svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ  #
analyzed: viviktāḥ paramāṇavaḥ sva ākāra arpaṇa dvāreṇa sva gocaram jñānam utpādayantaḥ katham asantam ātmani sva avayava vyāpinam kāla antara saṃcariṣṇum ākāram

original: tatra prathayanti. vibhramād iti cen, na,
analyzed: tatra prathayanti vibhramāt iti ced na

original: nedānīm arthe yad asti tad eva pratibhāti,
analyzed: na idānīm arthe yat asti tat eva pratibhāti

original: tatrāsato 'pi sthūrākārasya pratibhāsanāt. tathā śabdo 'pi. yady avidyamāno 'rthe tadgrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāseta kiṃ kṣūyeta?
analyzed: tatra asataḥ pi sthūra ākārasya pratibhāsanāt tathā śabdaḥ pi yadi a vidyamānaḥ rthe tad grāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāseta kim kṣūyeta

original: yac coktam: 'smaraṇajanitaśabdasaṃyojanaṃ pratīkṣamānam arthopayoge 'pi yady āsītety'ādi yāvad '

āndhyam āpadyeta
tat tāvakapakṣe pi samānam tathā hi
sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya indriya ja nirvikalpaka jñāna sadbhāve pi na tāvat idaṃtayā anidaṃtayā vā artha vyavasthitiḥ
yāvat vidhi pratiṣedha dvāreṇa vikalpa yugalakam pāścātyam nodayate
vikalpam janayati
tatra ā iva asya pramāṇa tā iti vacanān

original: nirvikalpakasya sato 'pi vyavahāraṃ praty asatkalpatvāt. sa ca vikalpaḥ saṅketakālabhāvitam abhilāpasāmānyam anusmarata evotpattum arhati,
analyzed: nirvikalpakasya sataḥ pi vyavahāram prati asat kalpa tvāt sa ca vikalpaḥ saṅketa kāla bhāvitam abhilāpa sāmānyam anusmarataḥ evā utpattum arhati
abhilāpa sāmānya smaraṇa bījam ca kutas prabudhyeta
tādṛśa darśanāt iti ced

original: nanu tad api darśanaṃ nirvikalpakatvād arthaṃ nātiśete,
analyzed: nanu tat api darśanam nirvikalpaka tvāt artham nā atiśete
tat katham sāmānya viṣaya vikalpa bījam prabodhayet

original: arthaḥ punaḥ sāmānyavyavasāyātmikāṃ buddhiṃ na janayed iti bhavatāṃ kadāgrahaḥ. tad arthavat tadviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vyavasāyaśūnyatvān nābhilāpasāmānyagocarasmaraṇabījaṃ
analyzed: arthaḥ punar sāmānya vyavasāya ātmikām buddhim na janayet iti bhavatām kadāgrahaḥ tat arthavat tad viṣayam darśanam vyavasāya śūnya tvāt na abhilāpa sāmānya gocara smaraṇa bījam
tat a prabuddham na smaraṇam janayati
a jātam smaraṇam na śabdam yojayati
a yojitaḥ śabdaḥ na artham niścāyayati
aniścitaḥ rthaḥ na vyavahāram avatarati
anavatīrṇaḥ na adṛṣṭāt viśiṣyate

original: aviśiṣṭaḥ pramātur āndhyaṃ lakṣayatīti. tasmād yathā kathañcinnirṇayābhāvāt svayam
analyzed: a viśiṣṭaḥ pramātuḥ āndhyam lakṣayati iti tasmāt yathā kathañcid nirṇaya abhāvāt svayam

original: apratītam api nirvikalpakadarśanaṃ vāsanāprabodhadvāreṇa vikalpam utthāpyātmavyāpāram
analyzed: apratītam api nirvikalpaka darśanam vāsanā prabodha dvāreṇa vikalpam utthāpya ātma vyāpāram
abhilāpayati katicid aṃśa viṣayam
tathā arthaḥ pi yadi cakṣuḥ ādi sāmagrī antaḥpāti tvena apratītaḥ eva svayam
tathā svabhāva tvāt
saṅketa kāla bhāvita abhilāpa sāmānya viṣaya ātma saṃskāra prabodha dvāreṇa ātma viṣayam abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭam

original: saṃvedanam ullāsayen nātyantam ayuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na cāyaṃ savikalpako bodho manorājyādivikalpakalpaś,
analyzed: saṃvedanam ullāsayet na atyantam ayuktam paśyāmaḥ na ca ayam sa vikalpakaḥ bodhaḥ manaḥ rājya ādi vikalpa kalpaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādi sāmagrī sampādya tvāt

original: itarasya tu manomātraprabhavatvāt. ataḥ kathaṃ tadvikalpāntarāvirbhāve nivarteta?
analyzed: itarasya tu manaḥ mātra prabhava tvāt atas katham tad vikalpa antara āvirbhāve nivarteta

original: asya tu kāraṇasāmarthyena balāt pravṛtteḥ. etena saṃhṛtasakalavikalpāvasthāyāṃ nāiṣa prāduḥṣyād ity etad api pratikṣiptam,
analyzed: asya tu kāraṇa sāmarthyena balāt pravṛtteḥ etena saṃhṛta sakala vikalpa avasthāyām na eṣa prāduḥṣyāt iti etat api pratikṣiptam
asya pramātuḥ icchayā saṃhartum aśakya tvān

original: mānasavikalpasaṃharaṇa eva tatsāmarthyopapatter iti. etac ca śabdasampṛktapratyakṣapakṣād apy ekāntanirvikalpakapratyakṣapakṣasya pāpīyastāṃ  #
analyzed: mānasa vikalpa saṃharaṇe eva tad sāmarthya upapatteḥ iti etat ca śabda sampṛkta pratyakṣa pakṣāt api ekānta nirvikalpaka pratyakṣa pakṣasya pāpīyaḥ tām
darśayadbhiḥ asmābhiḥ udagrāhi

original: [NAV_4.5] paramārthataḥ punaḥ pratyakṣe sākṣāc chabdollekho neṣyate,
analyzed: paramārthataḥ punar pratyakṣe sākṣāt śabda ullekhaḥ na iṣyate

original: viśadavyavasāyenārthasākṣātkaraṇacaturatvāt tasya. kevalaṃ tad api sannihitaṃ parisphuṭaṃ
analyzed: viśada vyavasāyena artha sākṣātkaraṇa catura tvāt tasya kevalam tat api sannihitam parisphuṭam

original: padārthāntaraiḥ saha samānāsamānākāraṃ svaparamāṇūnāṃ sāmānyākāraṃ stambhādhikaṃ
analyzed: padārtha antaraiḥ saha samāna asamāna ākāram sva paramāṇūnām sāmānya ākāram stambha adhikam

para parikalpita kṣaṇa kṣayi vivikta paramāṇu lakṣaṇa sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa pravaṇa nirvikalpaka pratyakṣa pratiṣedha artham

original: 'rthe saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhagrahaṇādayas tadviṣayāḥ śābdavyavahārāḥ sarva eva nirupacaritā
analyzed: rthe saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha grahaṇa ādayaḥ tad viṣayāḥ śābda vyavahārāḥ sarve eva nirupacaritā

original: ghaṭanta ity uktaṃ bhavati. yadi punaḥ śabdasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsam adhyakṣaṃ na syāt,
analyzed: ghaṭantaḥ iti uktam bhavati yadi punar śabda saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam adhyakṣam na syāt
tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced
vikalpa anutthānena sakala vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi

original: nirvyavasāyaṃ darśanam atyantapāṭavopetam api smṛtibījādhānaṃ taduttarakālabhāvi vā tādṛśārthadarśanaṃ tatprabodhanam abhyāsavāsanāpāṭave 'pi  #
analyzed: nirvyavasāyam darśanam atyanta pāṭava upetam api smṛti bīja ādhānam tad uttara kāla bhāvi vā tādṛśa artha darśanam tad prabodhanam abhyāsa vāsanā pāṭave pi
na vidhātum alam
yatas sāmānya vikalpa utpattyā vyavahāraḥ pravarteta

original: tasmād yatra kutracid arthāṃśe pāścātyavyavahārapravṛttis tatra prācīnaṃ saṃvedanaṃ
analyzed: tasmāt yatra kutracid artha aṃśe pāścātya vyavahāra pravṛttiḥ tatra prācīnam saṃvedanam

original: anyathā kṣaṇikatvādyaṃśavat sarvāṃśeṣu vyavahāraḥ pralīyeta. tan na kadācana kalpanāpoḍhatvaṃ
analyzed: anyathā kṣaṇika tva ādi aṃśa vat sarva aṃśeṣu vyavahāraḥ pralīyeta tat na kadācana kalpanā apoḍha tvam

original: pratyakṣasya pramātur api pratītigocaracāritām anubhavati. apratītaṃ cāstīti śraddhātuṃ duḥśakam,
analyzed: pratyakṣasya pramātuḥ api pratīti gocara cāri tām anubhavati apratītam ca asti iti śraddhātum duḥśakam
atiprasaṅgāt iti alakṣaṇam
a bhrānta tvam api na jāghaṭīti
bhavat abhiprāyeṇa sthira sthūra artha grāhiṇaḥ saṃvedanasya viparyasta rūpa tvāt

original: tadviparītasya tu svapnakāle 'py aprakāśamānatvāt. tad yadi yathāvasthitārthagrāhitvam abhrāntatvaṃ,
analyzed: tad viparītasya tu svapna kāle pi aprakāśamāna tvāt tat yadi yathā avasthita artha grāhi tvam abhrānta tvam
tat na sambhavati eva
vivikta kṣaṇa kṣayi paramāṇūnām kadācid api apratibhāsāt

original: teṣāṃ ca pāramārthikatvāt. atha vyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa yad idaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ svalakṣaṇam arthakriyākṣamaṃ,
analyzed: teṣām ca pāramārthika tvāt atha vyāvahārika abhiprāyeṇa yat idam ghaṭa ādikam sva lakṣaṇam arthakriyā kṣamam

original: tatra yan na bhrāmyati tad abhrāntam ity abhipretaṃ,
analyzed: tatra yat na bhrāmyati tat abhrāntam iti abhipretam
tarhi kalpanā apoḍha padam utsāraṇīyam
idānīm anena saha avasthāna abhāvāt
vyavahāra avatāriṇaḥ ghaṭa ādi sva lakṣaṇasya nirṇayena ā iva grahaṇāt
anyathā vyavahāra apravṛtteḥ

original: dṛṣṭasyāpy adṛṣṭānatiśayanāt. tasmād vyavasāyātmakam adhyakṣam ity etad eva cārv iti sthitam.
analyzed: dṛṣṭasya api adṛṣṭa anatiśayanāt tasmāt vyavasāya ātmakam adhyakṣam iti etat eva cāru iti sthitam

original: [NAV_4.7] aparokṣatayety anena tu parokṣalakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇatām adhyakṣasya pariharati,
analyzed: aparokṣa tayā iti anena tu parokṣa lakṣaṇa saṅkīrṇa tām adhyakṣasya pariharati

original: tasya sākṣātkāritayā arthagrahaṇarūpatvād iti. īdṛśam ity amunā tu pūrvoktanyāyāt
analyzed: tasya sākṣātkāri tayā artha grahaṇa rūpa tvāt iti īdṛśam iti amunā tu pūrva ukta nyāyāt
sa avadhāraṇena viśeṣaṇa kadambaka saciva jñāna upapradarśanāt para parikalpita lakṣaṇa yuktasya

original: pratyakṣatāṃ pratikṣipati. evaṃ ca yad āhur:
analyzed: pratyakṣa tām pratikṣipati evam ca yat āhuḥ
indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam

original: tathā “satsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam” ityādi tad ayuktam ity uktaṃ bhavaty,
analyzed: tathā sat samprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam ityādi tat ayuktam iti uktam bhavati
apūrva prādurbhāvasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt

original: atyantāsatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnām apy utpattiprasaṅgāt. tasmād idam ātmarūpatayā vidyamānam eva viśeṣakṛddhetukalāpasannidhānāt sākṣād arthagrahaṇapariṇāmarūpatayā
analyzed: atyanta asatām śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām api utpatti prasaṅgāt tasmāt idam ātma rūpa tayā vidyamānam eva viśeṣa kṛt hetu kalāpa sannidhānāt sākṣāt artha grahaṇa pariṇāma rūpa tayā

original: tathā cotpannajanmādiviśeṣaṇaṃ na sambhavet. athāivaṃvidhārthasūcakam evāitad ity ācakṣīthās,
analyzed: tathā ca utpanna janma ādi viśeṣaṇam na sambhavet atha a ivaṃvidha artha sūcakam iti ācakṣīthāḥ

original: tathā saty avigānam evety āstāṃ tāvat.
analyzed: tathā sati avigānam eva iti āstām tāvat
adhunā parokṣa lakṣaṇam darśayati

original: itarad ityādi. aparokṣatayārthasya grāhakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity uktam,
analyzed: itarat ityādi aparokṣa tayā arthasya grāhakam jñānam pratyakṣam iti uktam

original: tasmād itarad asākṣād arthagrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ parokṣam iti jñeyam avagantavyam. etad api svasaṃvedanāpekṣayā pratyakṣam eva,
analyzed: tasmāt itarat asākṣāt artha grāhakam jñānam parokṣam iti jñeyam avagantavyam etat api sva saṃvedana apekṣayā pratyakṣam eva

original: bahirarthāpekṣayā tu parokṣavyapadeśam aśnuta iti darśayann āha:
analyzed: bahis artha apekṣayā tu parokṣa vyapadeśam aśnute iti darśayan āha
grahaṇa īkṣayā iti

original: iha grahaṇaṃ prakramād bahiḥ pravartanam ucyate,
analyzed: iha grahaṇam prakramāt bahis pravartanam ucyate
nyathā viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt
tasya īkṣā apekṣā tayā
bahis pravṛtti paryālocanayā iti yāvat tat ayam
yadi api svayam pratyakṣam

original: tathāpi liṅgaśabdādidvāreṇa bahirviṣayagrahaṇe 'sākṣātkāritayā vyāpriyata iti parokṣam
analyzed: tathā api liṅga śabda ādi dvāreṇa bahis viṣaya grahaṇe sākṣātkāri tayā vyāpriyate iti parokṣam
iti ucyate etat ca bubhutsita artha anyathā anupapanna artha antara pratīti vaśāt udaya dharmakam

original: iti. sāmānyalakṣaṇasadbhāvād ekākāram api vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ dvidhā bhidyate,
analyzed: iti sāmānya lakṣaṇa sadbhāvāt eka ākāram api vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artham dvidhā bhidyate

original: tad yathā: anumānaṃ śābdaṃ ceti. yato 'dyāpi śabdasyārthānyathānupapannatvam eva pare na pratipadyante,
analyzed: tat yathā anumānam śābdam ca iti yatas dyā api śabdasya artha anyathā anupapanna tvam eva pare na pratipadyante
na ca apṛthakkṛtasya tat viviktam vaktum śakyam
atas bhedena upanyāsaḥ
tatra tāvat anumāna lakṣaṇam abhidhitsuḥ āha
sādhya avinābhunaḥ liṅgāt sādhya niścāyakam smṛtam

original: anumānaṃ, tad abhrāntaṃ pramāṇatvāt samakṣavat // NA_5 //
analyzed: anumānam tat abhrāntam pramāṇa tvāt samakṣa vat
iha api anumānam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ

original: tasya prasiddhatayā anūdyatvāt. sādhyāvinābhuno liṅgāt sādhyaniścāyakam iti lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ,
analyzed: tasya prasiddha tayā anūdya tvāt sādhya avinābhunaḥ liṅgāt sādhya niścāyakam iti lakṣaṇa nirdeśaḥ
tasya aprasiddha tayā vidheya tvāt iti atra api anumāna śabdasya kartṛ ādi kāraka vyutpatti krameṇa artha kathanam
pramāṇa śabda vat draṣṭavyam tatas ca iha api liṅga grahaṇa sādhya avinābhāvi tva lakṣaṇa liṅga sambandha smaraṇa kālāt

original: [Anu] paścān mīyate paricchidyate 'rtho 'numeyaḥ pāvakādir yena jñānena tad anumānam
analyzed: anu paścāt mīyate paricchidyate rthaḥ nu meyaḥ pāvaka ādiḥ yena jñānena tat anumānam
iti tat kiṃbhūtam iti āha
sādhya niścāyakam iti sādhanam arhati

original: sādhayituṃ vā śakya iti sādhyo 'numeya ity arthaḥ;
analyzed: sādhayitum vā śakyaḥ iti sādhyaḥ numeyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tasya niścāyakaṃ tatsvarūpanirṇāyakam iti yāvat. tat kuta ity āha:
analyzed: tasya niścāyakam tad svarūpa nirṇāyakam iti yāvat tat kutas iti āha

original: liṅgāl -- liṅgyate gamyate 'rtho 'neneti liṅgaṃ hetus tasmāt. kiṃbhūtād ity āha:
analyzed: liṅgāt  liṅgyate gamyate rthaḥ nena iti liṅgam hetuḥ tasmāt kiṃbhūtāt iti āha
sādhyā avinābhunaḥ iti vinā bhavati iti vinābhu
tatas nyat avinābhu
sādhya avinābhu

original: sādhyaṃ vimucya yan na bhavatīty arthaḥ,
analyzed: sādhyam vimucya yat na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāt sādhyaniścāyakaṃ jñānaṃ tad anumānam. smṛtam abhipretaṃ nītividbhir iti sambandhaḥ.
analyzed: tasmāt sādhya niścāyakam jñānam tat anumānam smṛtam abhipretam nīti vidbhiḥ iti sambandhaḥ

original: tatra liṅgāt sādhyaniścāyakam ity anenānumānasya pratyakṣaśābdalakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇatāṃ
analyzed: tatra liṅgāt sādhya niścāyakam iti anena anumānasya pratyakṣa śābda lakṣaṇa saṅkīrṇa tām

original: vārayati. sādhyāvinābhuna ity anena parapraṇītaliṅgalakṣaṇavyudāsam ācaṣṭe.
analyzed: vārayati sādhya avinābhunaḥ iti anena para praṇīta liṅga lakṣaṇa vyudāsam ācaṣṭe

original: [NAV_5.2] tataś ca yat pare procuḥ -- pakṣadharmatvānvayavyatirekalakṣaṇarūpatrayopalakṣitāni trīṇy eva liṅgāni:
analyzed: tatas ca yat pare procuḥ pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyatireka lakṣaṇa rūpa traya upalakṣitāni trīṇi eva liṅgāni

original: anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ceti; tad uktam:
analyzed: anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kāryam ca iti tat uktam
anumeye tha tad tulye sadbhāvaḥ
nāstitā asati
niścita anupalambha ātma kārya ākhyāḥ hetavaḥ trayaḥ iti

original: [NAV_2] tathānye: “'syedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam” iti,
analyzed: tathā anye sya idam kāryam kāraṇam saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgikam iti

original: tathā: “pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam” ityādi -- tad bālapralapitaprāyam ity avagantavyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ityādi tat bāla pralapita prāyam iti avagantavyam
sarvatra sādhya avinābhāvi tvasya ā iva gamaka tvāt
tad rahitasya tu trailakṣaṇya lakṣitasya api agamaka tvāt
itarathā tad putra tva ādīnām api gamaka tva prasaṅgān
niyamavat trailakṣaṇyam lakṣaṇam
na yat kiñcid
tena ayam aprasaṅgaḥ iti ced na
niyamena sādhya avinābhāvi tvasya ā iva uddīpanāt
tat ced asti kim trailakṣaṇya apekṣayā
tasyāḥ iva gamaka tvāt tathā hi
jala candrāt nabhaḥ candram
kṛttikā udayāt śakaṭa udayam
puṣpita aika cūtāt puṣpita aśeṣa cūtān
candra udayāt kumuda ākara prabodham

original: vṛkṣāc chāyām ityādi pakṣadharmatvavirahe 'py anumimīmahe. kālādikas tatra dharmī samasty eva,
analyzed: vṛkṣāt chāyām ityādi pakṣa dharma tva virahe pi anumimīmahe kāla ādikaḥ tatra dharmī samasti eva

original: tatra pakṣadharmatā liṅgasya gṛhyata iti cen,
analyzed: tatra pakṣa dharma tā liṅgasya gṛhyate iti ced
na atiprasaṅgāt

original: evaṃ hi śabdasyānityatve sādhye kākakārṣṇyāder api gamakatvaprasaktes,
analyzed: evam hi śabdasya anitya tve sādhye kāka kārṣṇi ādeḥ api gamaka tva prasakteḥ

original: tatrāpi lokāder dharmiṇaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyatvāt. tathānvayavikalo 'py anityaḥ śabdaḥ,
analyzed: tatra api loka ādeḥ dharmiṇaḥ kalpayitum śakya tvāt tathā anvaya vikalaḥ pi anityaḥ śabdaḥ

original: śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ samyagghetutayā samarthayituṃ śakya iti,
analyzed: śrāvaṇa tvāt iti ayam samyak hetutayā samarthayitum śakyaḥ iti
na anvayaḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇam tathā hi

original: tāvakākūtenāiva sakalaṃ sattvam anityatayā kroḍīkṛtam iti bhāvadharmaḥ śrāvaṇatvaṃ katham anityatāṃ vihāya vipakṣe vartitum utsaheta,
analyzed: sakalam sattvam anitya tayā kroḍīkṛtam iti bhāva dharmaḥ śrāvaṇa tvam katham anitya tām vihāya vipakṣe vartitum utsaheta
tad vikalasya niḥsvabhāva tā āpatteḥ
anitya tā vinirmuktasya sattvasya asambhavā vat etena sātmakam jīvat śarīram
prāṇa ādimat tvān
nirātmaka tve tad vaikalya prasaṅgāt

original: ghaṭādivad ity ayam api gamako vyākhyātaḥ,
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi vat iti ayam api gamakaḥ vyākhyātaḥ
sādhyārtha anyathā anupapanna tvasya atra api sadbhāvāt
pakṣa dharma tva anvayayoḥ tu alakṣaṇa tayā pratipādanāt

original: [NAV_5.3] tathā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhirūpaliṅgatrayaniyamo 'pi kila tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasambandhāstitvam eteṣv eveti yaḥ kriyate,
analyzed: tathā kārya svabhāva anupalabdhi rūpa liṅga traya niyamaḥ kila tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇa sambandha astitvam eteṣu eva iti yaḥ kriyate
saḥ u pi a yuktaḥ

original: prakṛtasambandhadvayavikalasyāpi rūpāde rasādigamakatvadarśanāt. mā bhūt tasya tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ gamakatvaṃ,
analyzed: prakṛta sambandha dvaya vikalasya api rūpa ādeḥ rasa ādi gamaka tva darśanāt mā bhūt tasya tādātmya tad utpattibhyām gamaka tvam
samavāyāt bhaviṣyati

original: tathāpi nānyathānupapannatvam eva hetor lakṣaṇam iti yadi vaiśeṣiko manyeta,
analyzed: tathā api na anyathā anupapanna tvam eva hetoḥ lakṣaṇam iti yadi vaiśeṣikaḥ manyeta

original: so 'nyathā nirloṭhanīyaḥ. sa hi vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyaḥ:
analyzed: saḥ nyathā nirloṭhanīyaḥ sa hi vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyaḥ

original: samavāyibhyaḥ samavāyo 'bhinno bhinno vā. yady abhinnaḥ,
analyzed: samavāyibhyaḥ samavāyaḥ bhinnaḥ bhinnaḥ vā yadi a bhinnaḥ
samavāyinaḥ eva tarhi
na samavāyaḥ
tad a vyatirikta tvāt
tad svarūpa vat bhinnaḥ ced
sa katham teṣu varteta
sāmastyena āhosvit eka deśena
tat yadi sāmastyena
tat ayuktam
samavāya bahu tva prasaṅgāt
pratisamavāyi tasya parisamāpta tā avāpteḥ
tat api acāru
sāṃśatā prasaṅgena niravayava tva kṣateḥ

original: svāṃśavartane 'pi sāmastyāikadeśacodyāvatārāc ca. tatrāpi sāmastyapakṣe bahutvaṃ
analyzed: sva aṃśa vartane sāmastya aika deśa codya avatārāt ca tatra api sāmastya pakṣe bahu tvam

original: tadavastham eva. ekadeśapakṣe tv aṃśāntaraprasaṅgenānavasthā. tan na samavāyabalāt
analyzed: tad avastham eva eka deśa pakṣe tu aṃśa antara prasaṅgena anavasthā tat na samavāya balāt
gamaka tām prati āśā a vidheyā

original: tasyāiva tatra duḥsthitatvāt. etena saṃyogino 'pi gamakatā pratyuktā,
analyzed: tasyāḥ iva tatra duḥsthita tvāt etena gamaka tā pratyuktā

original: samānadūṣaṇatvāt. virodhino 'pi viruddhābhāvagamakatvam anyathānupapannatvam eva sūcayati,
analyzed: samāna dūṣaṇa tvāt virodhinaḥ pi viruddha abhāva gamaka tvam anyathā anupapanna tvam eva sūcayati
tad abhāve gamaka tva ayogāt

original: [NAV_5.4] evaṃ paraparikalpitam anyad api liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ yad gamakatāṅgaṃ tad anyathānupapannatvaṃ na vyabhicarati,
analyzed: evam para parikalpitam anyat api liṅga lakṣaṇam yat gamaka tā aṅgam tat anyathā anupapanna tvam na vyabhicarati
sādhyam vinā api upapadyamānasya gamaka tā vaikalyāt iti
atra ā iva vyāpake liṅga lakṣaṇe ntar bhāvanīyam
viparītam tu nirasanīyam iti sthitam

original: [NAV_5.5] tad evam anumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyādhunā yac chauddhodaniśiṣyakair nyagādi,
analyzed: tat evam anumāna lakṣaṇam pratipādya adhunā yat śauddhodani śiṣyakaiḥ nyagādi
yat uta bhrāntam anumānam
sāmānya pratibhāsi tvāt
tasya ca bahis sva lakṣaṇe vyatireka avyatireka vikalpābhyām apākriyamāṇa tayā ayogāt
tad rūpa tayā ca tena tasya adhyavasāyāt

original: atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇasya ca bhrāntilakṣaṇatvāt. prāmāṇyaṃ punaḥ praṇālikayā bahiḥ svalakṣaṇabalāyātatvād anumānasya. tathā hi:
analyzed: a tasmin tad grahaṇasya ca bhrānti lakṣaṇa tvāt prāmāṇyam punar praṇālikayā bahis sva lakṣaṇa bala āyāta tvāt anumānasya tathā hi
na artham vinā tādātmya tad utpatti rūpa sambandha pratibaddha liṅga sadbhāvaḥ
na tat vinā tad viṣayam jñānam
na tad jñānam antareṇa prāk avadhārita sambandha smaraṇam
tad asmaraṇe na anumānam iti

original: arthāvyabhicāritvād bhrāntam api pramāṇam iti saṅgīryate; tad uktam:
analyzed: artha avyabhicāri tvāt bhrāntam api pramāṇam iti saṅgīryate tat uktam

original: “atasmiṃs tadgraho bhrāntir api sambandhataḥ prameti” -- tad apākartum āha:
analyzed: a tasmin tad grahaḥ bhrāntiḥ api sambandhataḥ pramā iti tat apākartum āha
tat abhra antam ityādi tat anumānam
bhrāmyati sva gocare viparyasyati iti bhrāntam
tatas a bhrāntam

original: aviparītārthagrāhīti yāvat. iyaṃ ca pratijñā. pramīyate yathāvasthito 'rthaḥ paricchidyate 'neneti pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: aviparīta artha grāhi iti yāvat iyam ca pratijñā pramīyate yathā avasthitaḥ rthaḥ paricchidyate nena iti pramāṇam

original: tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt. ayaṃ tu hetuḥ. saṅgatam akṣāṇām iti samakṣaṃ,
analyzed: tad bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt ayam tu hetuḥ saṅga tam akṣāṇām iti samakṣam

original: tad iva samakṣavad iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tad idam anumānasya bhrāntatānirākārakaṃ sampūrṇāvayavam,
analyzed: tat iva samakṣa vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat idam anumānasya bhrānta tā nirākārakam sampūrṇa avayavam
upanaya nigamanayoḥ avayava traya pratipādanena ā iva ākṣipta tvāt pramāṇam sūcitam
prayogaḥ tu evam draṣṭavyaḥ
bhrāntam anumānam
pramāṇa tvāt

original: iha yad yat pramāṇaṃ tat tad abhrāntaṃ yathā samakṣaṃ,
analyzed: iha yat yat pramāṇam tat tat abhra antam yathā samakṣam
tathā ca pramāṇam bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagamyate numānam

original: tasmāt pramāṇatvād abhrāntam iti pratipadyantām iti. tatrārthavādī tāvat samakṣalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭānte sādhyavikalatām āvirbhāvayituṃ na pārayati,
analyzed: tasmāt pramāṇa tvāt abhrāntam iti pratipadyantām iti tatra arthavādī tāvat samakṣa lakṣaṇe dṛṣṭānte sādhya vikala tām āvirbhāvayitum na pārayati

original: svayam eva samakṣasyābhrāntatayā 'bhyupagamāt. śūnyavādinaḥ punaḥ samastāpalāpitvāt pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ praty ayogyatāiveti na tam adhikṛtya  #
analyzed: svayam eva samakṣasya abhrānta tayā abhyupagamāt śūnyavādinaḥ punar samasta apalāpi tvāt pramāṇa prameya vyavahāram prati ayogya tā iva iti na tam adhikṛtya
sva sādhana doṣāḥ parihartavyāḥ
sva vacana bādhita pratijña tvena tad vāda utthāna abhāvāt tathā hi
sarva abhāva pratipādakam vacaḥ sti na asti vā

original: yady asti tarhi pratijñāhāniḥ. atha nāsti,
analyzed: yadi asti tarhi pratijñā hāniḥ atha na asti

original: darśayan padāc chābdābhāvam āha. paramārthābhidhāyina ity anena jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśādivacanaprabhavajñānasya
analyzed: darśayan padāt śābda abhāvam āha parama artha abhidhāyinaḥ iti anena jvara hara takṣaka cūḍāratna alaṅkāra upadeśa ādi vacana prabhava jñānasya

original: niṣphalatayā prāmāṇyaṃ nirācaṣṭe. tattvagrāhitayotpannam ity amunā tv evaṃbhūtād
analyzed: niṣphala tayā prāmāṇyam nirācaṣṭe tattva grāhi tayā utpannam iti amunā tu evaṃbhūtāt

original: api vākyāc chrotṛdoṣād viparītādyarthagrahaṇacaturatayā prādurbhūtasya śābdatvaṃ
analyzed: api vākyāt śrotṛ doṣāt viparīta ādi artha grahaṇa catura tayā prādurbhūtasya śābda tvam

original: vārayati. mānam ity anenāntarbhāvitapropasargārthena śābde parasyāprāmāṇyabuddhiṃ tiraskurute,
analyzed: vārayati mānam iti anena antar bhāvita pra upasarga arthena śābde parasya aprāmāṇya buddhim tiraskurute
tad aprāmāṇye para artha anumāna pralaya prasaṅgāt
tasya vacana rūpa tvāt tri avayava hetu sūcaka tvena upacārataḥ tasya prāmāṇyam
na tattvataḥ iti ced

original: nāpramāṇasya sūcakatvāyogāt. nanu ca hetupratipādane yadi tat pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: na apramāṇasya sūcaka tva ayogāt nanu ca hetu pratipādane yadi tat pramāṇam
tatas hetu samarthaka pramāṇa antara pratīkṣaṇam viśīryeta
nirṇīta sva rūpa tvāt tasya
pramāṇa prasiddhe punar pramāṇa antara vaiyarthyāt na etat asti
bhavat parikalpita adhyakṣasya api aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt

original: taddarśite 'rthe vikalpapratīkṣaṇāt tasyāiva prāmāṇyam āsajyeta. tadgṛhītam evārtham asāv abhilāpayatīti cec chabdapratipāditaṃ hetuṃ pramāṇāntaraṃ  #
analyzed: tad darśite rthe vikalpa pratīkṣaṇāt tasyāḥ iva prāmāṇyam āsajyeta tad gṛhītam eva artham asau abhilāpayati iti ced śabda pratipāditam hetum pramāṇa antaram
samarthayate iti samānaḥ nyāyaḥ
śābdam ca dvidhā bhavati

original: laukikaṃ śāstrajaṃ ceti. tatredam dvayor api sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditaṃ. samarthanaṃ punar avipratārakavacanaprabhavasyehādivākyaprastāva  #
analyzed: laukikam śāstra jam ca iti tatra idam dvayoḥ api sādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam pratipāditam samarthanam punar a vipratāraka vacana prabhavasya iha ādi vākya prastāva
eva laukikasya vihitam

original: śāstrajasya tu vidhātavyam iti yādṛśaḥ śāstrāt tajjātaṃ pramāṇatām anubhavati tad darśayati:
analyzed: śāstra jasya tu vidhātavyam iti yādṛśaḥ śāstrāt tad jātam pramāṇa tām anubhavati tat darśayati
āpta upajñam an ullaṅghyam adṛṣṭa iṣṭa virodhakam
tattva upadeśa kṛt sārvam śāstram kāpatha ghaṭṭanam
śāsti śikṣayati jīva ajīva ādi tattvam grāhayati

original: śiṣyate 'neneti vā śāstram. tat kiṃbhūtam iti tadviśeṣaṇāny āha. āptaḥ prakṣīṇāśeṣarāgādidoṣagaṇas,
analyzed: śiṣyate nena iti vā śāstram tat kiṃbhūtam iti tad viśeṣaṇāni āha āptaḥ prakṣīṇa aśeṣa rāga ādi doṣa gaṇaḥ
tena upajñam ādau upalabdham anena apauruṣeya apoham āha
tasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt
puruṣa vyāpāra abhāve vacana anupalabdheḥ
upalambhe pi tad artha anavagamāt
tad artha niścaya artham puruṣa āśrayaṇe gaja snāna nyāya prasaṅgāt

original: tasya rāgādikaluṣitatvena vitathārthakathanapravṛtteḥ. tadanuṣṭhānād api svakāryasiddhau praṇayanārtham api puruṣaḥ kiṃ neṣyate,
analyzed: tasya rāga ādi kaluṣita tvena vitatha artha kathana pravṛtteḥ tad anuṣṭhānāt api sva kārya siddhau praṇayana artham api puruṣaḥ kim nā iṣyate

original: viśeṣābhāvāt. tan na kṣīṇadoṣavacanaṃ vyatiricyānyataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ paralokādāv adṛṣṭe 'rthe pravṛttir yuktā;
analyzed: viśeṣa abhāvāt tat na kṣīṇa doṣa vacanam vyatiricya anyatas prekṣāvatām para loka ādau adṛṣṭe rthe pravṛttiḥ yuktā
tat tat eva śāstram
nirupacarita śabda artha upapatteḥ iti āstām tāvat

original: [NAV_9.2] ata evollaṅghyate prābalyena gamyate 'bhibhūyate anyair ity ullaṅghyaṃ,
analyzed: atas eva ullaṅghyate prābalyena gamyate bhibhūyate anyaiḥ iti ullaṅghyam
tatas an ullaṅghyam

original: sarvavacanātiśāyīti yāvat. ata eva dṛṣṭena pramāṇanirṇīteneṣṭasya tadvācyasya virodho yasmiṃs tattathā tad eva,
analyzed: sarva vacana atiśāyi iti yāvat atas eva dṛṣṭena pramāṇa nirṇītena iṣṭasya tad vācyasya virodhaḥ yasmin tat tathā tat eva
yadi vā dṛṣṭaḥ pramāṇena
iṣṭaḥ vacana antareṇa
tayoḥ virodhakam
tad viruddha artha abhidhānāt
adṛṣṭa iṣṭa virodhakam
abādha artha abhidhāyi iti arthaḥ

original: [NAV_9.3] tadiyatā śāstrasya svārthasampad uktā. adhunā tattvopadeśādīnāṃ parārthatvāt parārthasampadam āha:
analyzed: tat iyatā śāstrasya sva artha sampad uktā adhunā tattva upadeśa ādīnām para artha tvāt para artha sampadam āha
tattvam jīva ādayaḥ padārthāḥ
pramāṇa pratiṣṭhita tvāt

original: teṣāṃ upadeśaḥ svarūpaprakāśanaṃ tadrakṣaṇādividhānaṃ vā. taṃ karoti tattvopadeśakṛt. ata eva sārvaṃ sarvasmai hitaṃ,
analyzed: teṣām upadeśaḥ svarūpa prakāśanam tad rakṣaṇa ādi vidhānam vā tam karoti tattva upadeśa kṛt atas eva sārvam sarvasmai hitam
adhunā pareṣām eva anartha vighāti tvam āha
kutsitāḥ panthāḥ kāpathāḥ tīrtha antarāṇi
teṣām ghaṭṭanam vicālakam nirākārakam

original: sarvajanāpakārikumatavidhvaṃsakam ity arthaḥ. īdṛśād eva śāstrāj jātaṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: sarva jana apakāri kumata vidhvaṃsakam iti arthaḥ īdṛśāt eva śāstrāt jātam śābdam pramāṇam
na anyebhyaḥ
vipralambhaka tvāt teṣām iti
adhunā parārtha anumāna lakṣaṇam vaktavyam

original: tac ca pratyakṣe 'pi paśyann ekayogakṣematvāt sāmānyenāha:
analyzed: tat ca pratyakṣe paśyan eka yogakṣema tvāt sāmānyena āha
sva niścaya vat anyeṣām niścaya utpādanam budhaiḥ

original: parārthaṃ mānam ākhyātaṃ vākyaṃ tadupacārataḥ // NA_10 //
analyzed: parārtham mānam ākhyātam vākyam tad upacārataḥ
atra para artham mānam iti lakṣyam

original: svaniścayavad ityādi lakṣaṇam. sva ātmā tasya niścayaḥ prameyādhigamas,
analyzed: sva niścaya vat ityādi lakṣaṇam svaḥ ātmā tasya niścayaḥ prameya adhigamaḥ
tadvat anya īśām pratipādyānām niścaya utpādanam prameya paricchedaka jñāna prādurbhāvanam

original: yathātmano 'rthanirṇayas tathā pareṣāṃ nirṇayajananam ity arthaḥ. budhair vidvadbhiḥ,
analyzed: yathā ātmanaḥ rtha nirṇayaḥ tathā pareṣām nirṇaya jananam iti arthaḥ budhaiḥ vidvadbhiḥ

original: parasmai arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yena tat parārthaṃ,
analyzed: parasmai arthaḥ prayojanam yena tat parārtham
mīyate nena iti mānam
ākhyātam kathitam
nanu ca yadi niścaya utpādanam para artha mānam

original: tathā jñānam api parapratyāyanāya vyāpriyamānaṃ parārthaṃ prāpnotīty āha:
analyzed: tathā jñānam api para pratyāyanāya vyāpriyamānam para artham prāpnoti iti āha
vākyam para artham
na jñānam
tasyāḥ iva ānantaryeṇa vyāpārāt
para prayojana mātra tvāt ca
itarasya tu vyavahita tvāt

original: svaparopakāritvāc ca. kathaṃ vacanam ajñānarūpaṃ pramāṇam ity āha:
analyzed: sva para upakāri tvāt ca katham vacanam ajñāna rūpam pramāṇam iti āha
tad upacārataḥ
tasya jñānasya upacāraḥ tad rūpasya api tad aṅga tayā tad rūpa tvena grahaṇam
tatas idam uktam bhavati

original: pratipādyagatam utpatsyamānaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad avyavahitakāraṇatvād vacanam apy upacāreṇa pramāṇam ity ucyate. tatrānumānasya pārārthyaṃ parair  #
analyzed: pratipādya gatam utpatsyamānam yat jñānam tat avyavahita kāraṇa tvāt vacanam api upacāreṇa pramāṇam iti ucyate tatra anumānasya pārārthyam paraiḥ
abhyupagatam eva
pratyakṣasya na pratipadyante

original: kiledaṃ śabdapraveśaśūnyasvalakṣaṇagrāhīti nāitadgocaraḥ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryate. na ca śabdāt parasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇadakṣaṃ pratyakṣam
analyzed: kila idam śabda praveśa śūnya sva lakṣaṇa grāhi iti na a etad gocaraḥ parebhyaḥ pratipādayitum pāryate na ca śabdāt parasya sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa dakṣam pratyakṣam

original: śabdasya vikalpotpāditatvena parasyāpi vikalpotpādakatvāt. tad uktaṃ:
analyzed: śabdasya vikalpa utpādita tvena parasya api vikalpa utpādaka tvāt tat uktam
vikalpa yonayaḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ śabda yonayaḥ

original: kāryakāraṇatā teṣāṃ nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśanty api” //
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa tā teṣām na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti api
nirvikalpakam ca pratyakṣam

original: ato na śabdajanyam ity ato 'numānaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya pratyakṣasyāpi parārthatāṃ sādhayitum āha:

original: parasya tadupāyatvāt parārthatvaṃ dvayor api // NA_11 //

original: [NAV_11.1] pratyakṣeṇāpy anumāneneva prasiddhārthaprakāśanāt svapratītaprameyapratyāyakatvāt parārthatvaṃ pratipādyaprayojanatvaṃ dvayor api
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa api anumānena iva prasiddha artha prakāśanāt sva pratīta prameya pratyāyaka tvāt parārtha tvam pratipādya prayojana tvam dvayoḥ api
tulya kāraṇa tvān

original: nānumānasyāivāikasyety abhiprāyaḥ. iha cāśrūyamāṇatvāt tadarthagamanāc cāpīvaśabdau luptanirdiṣṭau draṣṭavyau. pratyakṣapratītārthapratyāyanaṃ  #
analyzed: na anumānasya āivāikasya iti abhiprāyaḥ iha ca aśrūyamāṇa tvāt tad artha gamanāt ca api iva śabdau lupta nirdiṣṭau draṣṭavyau pratyakṣa pratīta artha pratyāyanam

original: yat paro manyate -- nāitadgocaraṃ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryata iti -- tad ayuktaṃ,

analyzed: tad gocarasya kathañcid vikalpa gamya tvena śabda pratipādya tvāt tat yathā anumāna pratītaḥ rthaḥ parasmai pratipādyamānaḥ vacana rūpa āpannaḥ para artham
tathā pratyakṣa pratītaḥ u pi para artham pratyakṣam

original: anumānapratītaṃ pratyāyayann evaṃ vacanayaty -- agnir atra dhūmād,

atas dvayoḥ api parārtha tā iti āha
