original: atas tasyāpi parārthatā viśīryeta. samarthahetukathanāt tatra vacanasya parārthateti ced,

original: atrāpi darśanayogyārthapratipādanād iti brūmaḥ. tan na pratyakṣaparokṣayoḥ pārārthyaṃ prati viśeṣopalabdhir iti mucyatāṃ pakṣapātaḥ.
analyzed: atrā api darśana yogya artha pratipādanāt iti brūmaḥ tat na pratyakṣa parokṣayoḥ pārārthyam prati viśeṣa upalabdhiḥ iti mucyatām pakṣapātaḥ

original: [NAV_12.0] tad evaṃ dvayor api parārthatāṃ pratipādya tatsvarūpam āha:

original: pratyakṣaṃ pratibhāsasya nimittatvāt tad ucyate // NA_12 //

original: [NAV_12.1] yad vacaḥ pratyakṣapratipannārthapratipādi sākṣātkārijñānagocarakathanacaturaṃ tat pratyakṣam ucyata iti sambandhaḥ. tac ca pratyakṣarūpam  #
analyzed: yat vacaḥ pratyakṣa pratipanna artha pratipādi sākṣātkāri jñāna gocara kathana caturam tat pratyakṣam ucyate iti sambandhaḥ tat ca pratyakṣa rūpam

original: vipratipannaṃ prati punar anumānadvāreṇocyamānam anumānam eveti caśabdenānekārthatvād darśayati. vacanaṃ kutaḥ pratyakṣam ity āha:

original: pratibhāsasya nimittatvāt pratipādyapratyakṣaprakāśahetutvād upacāreṇocyata ity arthaḥ.

analyzed: anumānam āha
sādhya avinābhuvaḥ hetoḥ vacaḥ yat pratipādakam
para artham anumānam tat pakṣa ādi vacana ātmakam

original: tasya sādhyāvinābhuvaḥ prāṅ nirūpitasya yad vacaḥ pratipādakaṃ sandarśakaṃ tad anumānaprakāśahetutvāt parārtham anumānam. tat kīdṛśaṃ?
analyzed: tasya sādhya avinābhuvaḥ prāk nirūpitasya yat vacaḥ pratipādakam sandarśakam tat anumāna prakāśa hetu tvāt para artham anumānam tat kīdṛśam

original: ity āha: pakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ sa ādir yeṣāṃ hetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanādīnāṃ tāni tathā,
analyzed: iti āha pakṣaḥ vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ ādiḥ yeṣām hetu dṛṣṭānta upanaya nigamana ādīnām tāni tathā

original: tāny evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tat pakṣādivacanātmakam.
analyzed: tāni eva ātmā svarūpam yasya tat pakṣa ādi vacana ātmakam

original: [NAV_13.2] nanu ca hetupratipādakaṃ vacaḥ parārtham anumānam ity abhidhāya tat pakṣādivacanātmakam iti vadataḥ pūrvāparavyāhatā vāco yuktiḥ.  #
analyzed: nanu ca hetu pratipādakam vacaḥ para artham anumānam iti abhidhāya tat pakṣa ādi vacana ātmakam iti vadataḥ pūrva apara vyāhatā vācaḥ yuktiḥ
na etat asti
evam manyate na aikaḥ prakāraḥ parārtha anumānasya

original: kiṃ tarhi yathā parasya sukhena prameyapratītir bhavati tathā yatnataḥ pratyāyanīyaḥ. tatra daśāvayavaṃ sādhanaṃ pratipādanopāyaḥ. tad yathā  #
analyzed: kim tarhi yathā parasya sukhena prameya pratītiḥ bhavati tathā yatnataḥ pratyāyanīyaḥ tatra daśa avayavam sādhanam pratipādana upāyaḥ tat yathā

original: sannihite 'rthe viśadādhyavasāyena pravṛtteḥ. nāpi śabdāt tannirṇayas,

original: tadasiddhāv anumānānutthānād iti. anumānāt sambandhagrahaṇe niravadhir anavasthānuṣajyeta,

original: taduttarakālabhāvinyā vāsanāprabodhajanyāyā vikalpabuddheḥ svāṃśagrahaṇaparyavasitaśarīratvena bahiḥsvalakṣaṇe praveśābhāvāt,
analyzed: tad uttara kāla bhāvinyāḥ vāsanā prabodha janyāyāḥ vikalpa buddheḥ sva aṃśa grahaṇa paryavasita śarīra tvena bahis sva lakṣaṇe praveśa abhāvāt
tatas ca apratīta tvāt sarvasya asiddha tvam

original: [NAV_23.3] nityāikānte 'pi dharmiṇo 'tyantavyatiriktānām apāramārthikānāṃ vā svasādhanadharmāṇāṃ pramāṇenāpratītatvād asiddhatā draṣṭavyā,
analyzed: dharmiṇaḥ tyanta vyatiriktānām apāramārthikānām vā sva sādhana dharmāṇām pramāṇena apratīta tvāt asiddha tā draṣṭavyā

original: dharmiṇo 'vinirluṭhitarūpāṇāṃ pāramārthikānāṃ sakaladharmāṇāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhatvena nihnotum aśakyatvād iti.
analyzed: dharmiṇaḥ vinirluṭhita rūpāṇām pāramārthikānām sakala dharmāṇām pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa prasiddha tvena nihnotum aśakya tvāt iti

original: [NAV_23.4] tathā viruddhatāpi pakṣadvaye 'pi sarvasādhanadharmāṇām unneyānekāntapratibaddhasvabhāvatvena tatsādhanapravaṇatvāt. etac cottaratra
analyzed: tathā viruddha tā api pakṣa dvaye pi sarva sādhana dharmāṇām unneya anekānta pratibaddha svabhāva tvena tad sādhana pravaṇa tvāt etat ca uttaratra

original: [NAV_23.5] evaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pi nirdiśyamānāḥ sarva eva hetavo 'naikāntikatām ātmasātkurvanti,

analyzed: yaḥ punar sarvajñaḥ āptaḥ vā saḥ ārya satya catuṣṭayam pratyapīpadat

original: tad yathā -- śauddhodanir iti. ayaṃ ca sādhyāvyatirekī vāryasatyacatuṣṭayasya duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇasya
analyzed: tat yathā śauddhodaniḥ iti ayam ca sādhya avyatirekī vārya satya catuṣṭayasya duḥkha samudaya mārga nirodha lakṣaṇasya
pramāṇa bādhita tvena tad bhāṣakasya asarvajña tā anāpta tā upapatteḥ kevalam tat nirākāraka pramāṇa sāmarthya paryālocana vikalānām
sandigdha sādhya vyatireka tayā pratibhāti iti tathā upanyastaḥ tathā hi
yadi api ārya satya catuṣṭayam śauddhodaniḥ pratipāditavān
tathā api sarvajña tāp tate tasya na siddhyataḥ
tābhyām saha ārya satya catuṣṭaya pratipādanasya anyathā anupapatti asiddheḥ
a sarva jñāna āptena api para pratāraṇa abhiprāya pravṛtta nipuṇa buddhi śaṭha puruṣeṇa tathāvidha pratipādanasya

original: kartuṃ śakyatvāt. tasmāc chauddhodaneḥ sakāśād asarvajñatānāptatālakṣaṇasya sādhyasya
analyzed: kartum śakya tvāt tasmāt śauddhodaneḥ sakāśāt asarvajña tā anāpta tā lakṣaṇasya sādhyasya

original: vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdheti sandigdhasādhyavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā:
analyzed: vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā iti sandigdha sādhya vyatireki tvam iti sandigdha sādhana vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: 'nādeyavākyaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto:
analyzed: na ādeya vākyaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ rāga ādimat tvāt iti atra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ
yaḥ punar ādeya vākyaḥ
na sa rāga ādimān

original: tad yathā -- sugata iti. yady api taddarśanānuraktāntaḥkaraṇāṇāṃ sugatasyādeyavacanatā siddhisaudhamadhyārūḍhā,
analyzed: tat yathā sugataḥ iti yadi api tad darśana anurakta antaḥkaraṇāṇām sugatasya adeya vacana tā siddhisaudham adhyārūḍhā
tathā api rāga ādimattva abhāvaḥ tad pratipādaka pramāṇa vaidhuryāt sandeha gocara cāritām anubhavati

original: ataḥ sugatād rāgādimattāvyāvṛttisaṃśayāt sandigdhasādhanavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhyasādhanavyatireko yathā:
analyzed: atas sugatāt rāga ādimattā vyāvṛtti saṃśayāt sandigdha sādhana vyatireki tvam iti sandigdha sādhya sādhana vyatirekaḥ yathā
na vīta rāgāḥ kapila ādayaḥ
karuṇā āspadeṣu api akaruṇā parīta citta tayā a datta nijaka māṃsa śakala tvāt iti atra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: ye punar vītarāgās te karuṇāspadeṣu karuṇāparītacittatayā dattanijamāṃsaśakalās,
analyzed: ye punar vīta rāgāḥ te karuṇā āspadeṣu karuṇā parīta citta tayā datta nija māṃsa śakalāḥ

original: tad yathā -- bodhisattvā iti. atra sādhyasādhanadharmayor bodhisattvebhyo vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā;
analyzed: tat yathā bodhisattvāḥ iti atra sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ bodhisattvebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā

original: tatpratipādakapramāṇavaikalyān na jñāyate kiṃ te rāgādimanta uta vītarāgāḥ;
analyzed: tad pratipādaka pramāṇa vaikalyāt na jñāyate kim te rāga ādimantaḥ uta vīta rāgāḥ

original: tathānukampyeṣu kiṃ svapiśitakhaṇḍāni dattavanto neti vā. ataḥ sandigdhasādhyasādhanavyatirekitvam iti.
analyzed: tathā anukampyeṣu kim sva piśita khaṇḍāni dattavantaḥ na iti vā atas sandigdha sādhya sādhana vyatireki tvam iti

original: [NAV_25.3] parair apare 'pi dṛṣṭāntābhāsās trayo 'vimṛśyabhāṣitayā darśitāḥ. tad yathā -- avyatireko,
analyzed: paraiḥ apare dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ trayaḥ vimṛśya bhāṣitayā darśitāḥ tat yathā
pradarśita vyatirekaḥ

original: viparītavyatirekaś ceti. te 'smābhir ayuktatvān na darśayitavyāḥ. tathā hy:
analyzed: viparīta vyatirekaḥ ca iti te smābhiḥ ayukta tvāt na darśayitavyāḥ tathā hi
avyatirekaḥ taiḥ
yathā a vīta rāgaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ
vaktṛ tvāt iti atra vaidharmya ḍṛṣṭāntaḥ
yaḥ punar vīta rāgaḥ
na sa vaktā

original: yathopalakhaṇḍa iti. yady api kilopalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ,
analyzed: yathā upala khaṇḍe iti yadi api kila upala khaṇḍāt ubhayam vyāvṛttam

original: tathāpi vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekitvam iti. ayuktaś cāyaṃ vaktum,
analyzed: tathā api vyāptyāḥ vyatireka asiddheḥ avyatireki tvam iti ayuktaḥ ca ayam vaktum

original: avyatirekitāyā hetudoṣatvāt. yadi hi dṛṣṭāntabalenāiva vyatirekaḥ pratipādyeta,
analyzed: avyatireki tāyāḥ hetu doṣa tvāt yadi hi vyatirekaḥ pratipādyeta
tadā tathāvidha sāmarthya vikalasya tad ābhāsa tā yujyeta
na ca etat asti

original: prākpravṛttasambandhagrahaṇapravaṇapramāṇagocarasmaraṇasampādanārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntopādānāt. na hy ekatra yo yadabhāve na dṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: prāk pravṛtta sambandha grahaṇa pravaṇa pramāṇa gocara smaraṇa sampādana artham dṛṣṭānta upādānāt na hi ekatra yaḥ yad abhāve na dṛṣṭaḥ

original: sa tadabhāve na bhavatīti pratibandhagrāhipramāṇavyatirekeṇa sidhyaty,
analyzed: sa tad abhāve na bhavati iti pratibandha grāhi pramāṇa vyatirekeṇa sidhyati

original: atiprasaṅgāt. tasmād asiddhapratibandhasya hetor evāyaṃ doṣo,
analyzed: atiprasaṅgāt tasmāt asiddha pratibandhasya hetoḥ eva ayam doṣaḥ
na dṛṣṭāntasya iti tathā pradarśita vyatireka viparīta vyatirekau api vaktum ayuktau
tayoḥ vaktṛ doṣa tvāt tathā hi
apradarśita vyatirekaḥ taiḥ
yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ
kṛtaka tvāt

original: ākāśavad iti. atra vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko vādinā vacanena nodbhāvita iti duṣṭatā. viparītavyatirekaḥ punar abhihito,
analyzed: ākāśa vat iti atra vidyamānaḥ pi vyatirekaḥ vādinā vacanena na udbhāvitaḥ iti duṣṭa tā viparīta vyatirekaḥ punar
yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ
kṛtaka tvāt iti atra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ
yat a kṛtakam tat nityam bhavati

original: yathākāśam iti. atra viparyastavyatirekapradarśanād viparītavyatirekitvam. vaidharmyaprayoge hi sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvākrānto darśanīyo,
analyzed: yathā ākāśam iti atra viparyasta vyatireka pradarśanāt viparīta vyatireki tvam vaidharmya prayoge hi sādhya abhāvaḥ sādhana abhāva ākrāntaḥ darśanīyaḥ
na ca ai evam atra
sādhana abhāvasya sādhya abhāva vyāpta tayā abhidhānāt iti

original: [NAV_25.4] vyatirekāpradarśanaṃ viparītavyatirekapradarśanaṃ ca na vastuno doṣaḥ,
analyzed: vyatireka apradarśanam viparīta vyatireka pradarśanam ca na vastunaḥ doṣaḥ
kim tarhi vacana kuśala tā vikalasya abhidhāyakasya kim ca
yeṣām bhavatām adaḥ darśanam

original: yad uta svārthānumānakāle svayaṃ hetudarśanamātrāt sādhyapratīteḥ parārthānumānāvasare
analyzed: yat uta svārtha anumāna kāle svayam hetu darśana mātrāt sādhya pratīteḥ parārtha anumāna avasare

original: 'pi hetupratipādanam eva kartavyaṃ “viduṣāṃ vācyo hetur eva hi kevala” itivacanāt teṣāṃ '
analyzed: pi hetu pratipādanam eva kartavyam viduṣām vācyaḥ hetuḥ eva hi kevalaḥ iti vacanāt teṣām
kṛtaka tvāt

original: itīyatā hetūpanyāsenāiva sisādhayiṣitasādhyasiddheḥ samastadṛṣṭāntābhāsavarṇanam api pūrvāparavyāhatavacanaracanācāturyam āvirbhāvayati.āsātāṃ  #
analyzed: iti iyatā sisādhayiṣita sādhya siddheḥ samasta dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa varṇanam api pūrva apara vyāhata vacana racanā cāturyam āvirbhāvayati āsātām
tāvat etau
dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana avayava tvena anabhyupagamāt atha ittham ācakṣīthāḥ

original: anvayavyatirekāparijñāne pratipādyasya na dṛṣṭāntam antareṇāitau darśayituṃ śakyāv,
analyzed: anvaya vyatireka aparijñāne pratipādyasya na dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa āitau darśayitum śakyau
atas nvaya vyatireka darśana artham dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhidhātavyaḥ
tatas ca tad kārya akāriṇām tad ābhāsa tā iti ced
gale gṛhītasya ayam ullāpaḥ
tathā api apradarśita vyatireka viparīta vyatirekau dṛṣṭānta ābhāsau na vāstavau
kim tarhi vaktṛ doṣa samutthau
atas na abhidhātum yuktau
tathāvidhasya vidyamāna vastu prakāśana sāmarthya rahitasya nibiḍa jaḍima avaṣṭabdhasya puṃsaḥ vāda anadhikāri tvān
mātṛkā pāṭhaśālā yogya tayā viduṣām vādayitum ayukta tvāt iti

original: [NAV_26.0] tad evaṃ parārthānumānaṃ vyācakṣāṇena yad uktaṃ -- yad uta “tat pakṣādivacanātmakam” iti -- tat pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāṃ sābhāsānāṃ  #
analyzed: tat evam parārtha anumānam vyācakṣāṇena yat uktam yat uta tat pakṣa ādi vacana ātmakam iti tat pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭāntānām sa ābhāsānām
pratipādanāt prāyas

original: kevalaṃ tat paroktadūṣaṇoddhārād eva samīcīnatām ābibhartīty amunā prastāvena dūṣaṇaṃ sābhāsam abhidhātukāma āha:
analyzed: kevalam tat para ukta dūṣaṇa uddhārāt eva samīcīna tām ābibharti iti amunā prastāvena dūṣaṇam sa ābhāsam abhidhātu kāmaḥ āha
vādi ukte sādhane prokta doṣāṇām udbhāvanam
vadana śīlaḥ vādī pratyāyakaḥ
tena uktaḥ upanyaste kasmin

original: sādhane; sādhyate pratipādyapratītāv āropyate 'numeyaṃ yena tat sādhanam. tac cānekarūpaṃ prāk pratyapādi,
analyzed: sādhane sādhyate pratipādya pratītau āropyate numeyam yena tat sādhanam tat ca aneka rūpam prāk pratyapādi
tat yathā kvacid hetuḥ eva āikaḥ
kvacid pakṣa hetū
kvacid pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭāntāḥ
kvacid te eva sa upanayāḥ
kvacid sa nigamanāḥ
kvacid ekāika tad śuddhi vṛddhyā iti
pratipādyasya kvacid kathañcid pratyāyayitum śakya tvāt

original: tatpratyāyanopāyasya ca sādhanatvād iti. tatreha samyaksādhanasya dūṣayitum aśakyatvāt,
analyzed: tad pratyāyana upāyasya ca sādhana tvāt iti tatra iha samyak sādhanasya dūṣayitum aśakya tvāt
sādhana ābhāsaḥ eva tad sāmarthya upapatteḥ

original: sādhanābhāsam eva dūṣanopanipātāt prāg avasthāyām anirjñātaṃ sāmānyena sādhanadhvaninoktaṃ,
analyzed: sādhana ābhāsam eva dūṣana upanipātāt prāk avasthāyām anirjñātam sāmānyena sādhana dhvaninā uktam
tatra prokta doṣāṇām pratyakṣa ādi nirākṛta pakṣa asiddha ādi hetu sādhya ādi vikala dṛṣṭānta ādi upanyāsa lakṣaṇānām

original: udbhāvanaṃ prāśnikānāṃ purataḥ prakāśanaṃ yat tad dūṣyate svābhipretasādhyapratyāyanavaikalyalakṣaṇāṃ
analyzed: udbhāvanam prāśnikānām puratas prakāśanam yat tat dūṣyate sva abhipreta sādhya pratyāyana vaikalya lakṣaṇām

original: vikṛtiṃ nīyate sādhanam aneneti dūṣaṇam iti jñeyam.
analyzed: vikṛtim nīyate sādhanam anena iti dūṣaṇam iti jñeyam
adhunā tad ābhāsam āha

original: nirgataṃ samyakprayuktatvād avadyaṃ pāpaṃ pakṣādidoṣalakṣaṇaṃ dauṣṭyam asmād iti niravadyaṃ,
analyzed: nirgatam samyak prayukta tvāt avadyam pāpam pakṣa ādi doṣa lakṣaṇam dauṣṭyam asmāt iti niravadyam

original: tasmin sādhane vādinokta iti vartate. tathāpi matsaritayā pramṛdyodaraṃ yad avidyamānānāṃ
analyzed: tasmin sādhane vādinā uktaḥ iti vartate tathā api matsari tayā pramṛdya udaram yat a vidyamānānām

original: doṣāṇām udbhāvanaṃ tad dūṣaṇasthānopanyastatvāt tatkāryākaraṇāt samyaksādhane doṣodbhāvanasya
analyzed: doṣāṇām udbhāvanam tat dūṣaṇa sthāna upanyasta tvāt tad kārya akaraṇāt samyak sādhane doṣa udbhāvanasya
pralāpāyamāna tvāt dūṣaṇa vat ābhāsate iti dūṣaṇa ābhāsam iti

original: tad eva nāma saṃjñā yasya tattathā. samarthasādhanopanyāsatvāt sādhite sādhye satām
analyzed: tat eva nāma saṃjñā yasya tat tathā samartha sādhana upanyāsa tvāt sādhite sādhye satām

original: apy apaśabdālaṅkārādidoṣāṇāṃ yad udbhāvanaṃ tad api dūṣaṇābhāsanāmakam iti. tuśabdena
analyzed: api apaśabda alaṅkāra ādi doṣāṇām yat udbhāvanam tat api dūṣaṇa ābhāsa nāmakam iti tuśabdena
viśeṣaṇa arthena darśayati vastu siddhi artham vāda pravṛtteḥ
tasya siddha tvāt
apaśabda ādīnām aprastuta tayā tad dvareṇa doṣa prakāśanasya asambaddha pralāpa rūpa tvāt
itarathā tāvat mātreṇa ā iva para apākaraṇa siddheḥ samartha sādhana anveṣaṇa prayatnaḥ viśīryeta
prayojana abhāvāt iti
tat evam vyāvahārika pramāṇasya pratyakṣa parokṣa sva artha para arha ādi bheda bhinnasya

original: lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyādhunā yaiḥ pāramārthikaṃ samastāvaraṇavicchedalabhyam aśeṣārthagocaraṃ
analyzed: lakṣaṇam pratipādya adhunā yaiḥ pāramārthikam samasta āvaraṇa viccheda labhyam aśeṣa artha gocaram

tad mata uddalana artham tad lakṣaṇam abhidhitsuḥ āha
sakala āvaraṇa mukta ātma kevalam yat prakāśate
sakalam samastam
āvṛṇoti āvriyate vā anena iti āvaraṇam
tad svarūpa pracchādanam karma iti arthaḥ

original: sakalaṃ ca tad avāraṇaṃ ca sakalāvaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: sakalam ca tat avāraṇam ca sakala āvaraṇam
tena muktaḥ rahita

original: ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tattathā. ata eva kevalam asahāyam,
analyzed: ātmā svarūpam yasya tat tathā atas eva kevalam asahāyam
āvaraṇa kṣaya upaśama vicitra tayā iva bodhasya nānā ākāra tayā pravṛtteḥ

original: sāmastyena punar āvaraṇanirdalane vibandhakakāraṇavaikalyād ekākāratayāiva tasya vivartanāt. ato jñānāntaranirapekṣaṃ yat prakāśate prathate  #
analyzed: sāmastyena punar āvaraṇa nirdalane vibandhaka kāraṇa vaikalyāt eka ākāra tayā iva tasya vivartanāt atas jñāna antara nirapekṣam yat prakāśate prathate
nirupādhikam dyotate iti arthaḥ

original: tat paramārthataḥ pratyakṣam. tad idaṃ sakalāvaraṇamuktātmetihetudvāreṇa tathā kevalaṃ yat prakāśata itisvarūpato nirūpyādhunā kāryadvāreṇa  #
analyzed: tat paramārthataḥ pratyakṣam tat idam sakala āvaraṇa mukta ātmā iti hetu dvāreṇa tathā kevalam yat prakāśate iti svarūpataḥ nirūpya adhunā kārya dvāreṇa
nirūpayan āha

original: sakalārthātmanāṃ samastavastusvarūpāṇāṃ satatapratibhāsanam anavarataprakāśanaṃ sakalārthātmasatatapratibhāsanam iti,
analyzed: sakala artha ātmanām samasta vastu svarūpāṇām satata pratibhāsanam anavarata prakāśanam sakala artha ātma satata pratibhāsanam iti
pratibhāsyate nena iti pratibhāsanam

original: ātmano dharmarūpatayā bhedavadvivakṣitaṃ jñānam iti yāvat. asya ca pāramārthikatvaṃ,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ dharma rūpa tayā bheda vat vivakṣitam jñānam iti yāvat asya ca pāramārthika tvam
nirupacarita śabda artha upapatteḥ tathā hi
akṣa śabdaḥ jīva paryāyaḥ

original: tataś cākṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaṃ,
analyzed: tatas ca akṣam prati vartate iti pratyakṣam

original: yatrātmanaḥ sākṣād vyāpāraḥ. vyāvahārikaṃ punar indriyavyavahitātmavyāpārasampādyatvāt paramārthataḥ parokṣam eva:
analyzed: yatra ātmanaḥ sākṣāt vyāpāraḥ vyāvahārikam punar indriya vyavahita ātma vyāpāra sampādya tvāt paramārthataḥ parokṣam eva

tirodhāna aviśeṣāt

original: nirgocaratāṃ yāyāt. tad idaṃ svarūpato 'prasādhya lakṣaṇam abhidadhānasya ko 'bhiprāya ity;

original: teṣāṃ dhyāndhīkṛtabuddhitvād avadhāraṇīyatām anena darśayati. kim asya pratipādakaṃ pramāṇam iti ced, ete brūmaḥ:
analyzed: teṣām dhyā andhīkṛta buddhi tvāt avadhāraṇīya tām anena darśayati kim asya pratipādakam pramāṇam iti ced ete brūmaḥ
samasti samasta vastu vistāra gocaram viśada darśanam

original: tasya tasya grāhakaṃ kiñcit pratyakṣam udayapadavīṃ samāsādayati,
analyzed: tasya tasya grāhakam kiñcid pratyakṣam udaya padavīm samāsādayati
yathā citrabhānoḥ
pravartate ca sakala artha viṣayam anumānam

original: atas tadavalokinā viśadadarśanenāpi bhāvyam iti. sarvārthaviṣayaṃ kim anumānaṃ pravartata iti ced,
analyzed: atas tad avalokinā viśada darśanena api bhāvyam iti sarva artha viṣayam kim anumānam pravartate iti ced
idam api brūma

original: iha yad yad asti tat tat sarvaṃ sthityudayāpavargasaṃsargam anubhavati,
analyzed: iha yat yat asti tat tat sarvam sthiti udaya apavarga saṃsargam anubhavati

original: vastutvāt; yad yad vastu tat tat sthemajanmapralayaiḥ kroḍīkṛtaṃ;
analyzed: vastu tvāt yat yat vastu tat tat sthema janma pralayaiḥ kroḍīkṛtam
tat yathā aṅguliḥ aṅguli tva vakra tva ṛju tva apekṣayā iti
vastu ca yat asti

original: ataḥ prastutatrayākrāntaṃ tad avagantavyam. idam eva nikhilārthagocaram anekāntānumānaṃ
analyzed: atas prastuta traya ākrāntam tat avagantavyam idam eva nikhila artha gocaram anekānta anumānam
jñāna kriyā abhyāsa atiśayāt nikhila āvaraṇa vicchede vibandhaka kāraṇa abhāvāt viśada darśanībhavati

original: na cānumānapravṛttāv apy anarthitvādinā pramātur apravṛttāv anumeyagocarapratyakṣāsambhavena
analyzed: na ca anumāna pravṛttau api anarthi tva ādinā pramātuḥ apravṛttau anumeya gocara pratyakṣa asambhavena

original: sambhavasya sādhyatayābhipretatvāt. na ca sambhavamātre 'sti vyabhicāraḥ,
analyzed: sambhavasya sādhya tayā abhipreta tvāt na ca sambhava mātre sti vyabhicāraḥ
sarva anumeyānām sambhavat pratyakṣa tayā vyāpta tvāt iti
athavā anyathā anumānayāmaḥ
ātmā
vidyamāna śuddhi upāya tvāt

original: iha yo yo vidyamānaśuddhyupāyaḥ sa sa sambhavatsamastaśuddhiko;
analyzed: iha yaḥ yaḥ vidyamāna śuddhi upāyaḥ sa sa sambhavat samasta śuddhikaḥ
yathā vidyamāna kṣāra mṛd puṭapāka ādi śuddhi upāyaḥ ratna viśeṣaḥ

original: tathā ca vidyamānajñānādyabhyāsaśuddhyupāya ātmātaḥ sambhavatsamastaśuddhika iti.
analyzed: tathā ca vidyamāna jñāna ādi abhyāsa śuddhi upāyaḥ ātmā atas sambhavat samasta śuddhikaḥ iti

original: sāmastyaśuddhaś cātmā jñānajñāninoḥ kathañcid abhedāt kevalam abhidhīyata iti. jñānādyabhyāsaḥ
analyzed: sāmastya śuddhaḥ ca ātmā jñāna jñāninoḥ kathañcid abhedāt kevalam abhidhīyate iti jñāna ādi abhyāsaḥ
katham viśuddhi kāraṇam iti ced

original: āvaraṇamalapratipakṣarūpatvād iti brūmaḥ. pratipakṣarūpatā katham avadhāriteiti cet,
analyzed: āvaraṇa mala pratipakṣa rūpa tvāt iti brūmaḥ pratipakṣa rūpa tā katham avadhāritā iti ced
tava ā iva darśanāt tathā hi
dṛśyate jñāna ādi abhyāsataḥ pratikṣaṇam āvaraṇa vilayaḥ

original: tadatiśaye punaḥ sāmastyocchedaḥ syād ity abhidadhmahe. etena yat pare procur -- yathā:
analyzed: tad atiśaye punar sāmastya ucchedaḥ syāt iti abhidadhmahe etena yat pare procuḥ yathā
pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa pañcaka gocara atikrānta tvāt sarva artha saṃvedanam abhāva ākhya ṣaṣṭha pramāṇa gocara tām pratipadyate tat ayuktam
tad sambhavasya anumānena pratipādanāt
pramāṇa pañcaka pravartana abhāva asiddheḥ kim ca

original: pramāṇapañcakaṃ tadgocaraṃ na pravartata iti kathaṃ bhavato nirṇayaḥ?
analyzed: pramāṇa pañcakam tad gocaram na pravartate iti katham bhavataḥ nirṇayaḥ
kim niyata deśa kāla vyāptyā yat vā samasta deśa kāla āskandanena iti
yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tato yathā ghaṭādeḥ kvacit pramāṇapañcakaṃ tadgocaraṃ nirvartamānam abhāvaṃ sādhayaty,
analyzed: tatas yathā ghaṭa ādeḥ kvacid pramāṇa pañcakam tad gocaram nirvartamānam abhāvam sādhayati

original: evaṃ samastavastusaṃvedanagocaram api tan nivartamānaṃ niyatadeśadaśāvacchinnam abhāvaṃ sādhayen,
analyzed: evam samasta vastu saṃvedana gocaram api tat nivartamānam niyata deśa daśā avacchinnam abhāvam sādhayen

original: tataś ca ghaṭādivat tad durnivāraṃ syāt. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣo,
analyzed: tatas ca ghaṭa ādi vat tat durnivāram syāt atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ
sau asambhavī eva
samasta deśa kāla varti puruṣa pariṣad saṃvedana sākṣātkāriṇaḥ hi evam vaktum yuktam

original: yad uta na kvacit samastārthasaṃvedanaṃ astīti -- na bhavatas,
analyzed: yat uta na kvacid samasta artha saṃvedanam asti iti na bhavataḥ

original: tathāvidhapuruṣasambhavānabhyupagamāt. itarathā ya eva kaścin niścityāivam abhidadhyāt,
analyzed: tathāvidha puruṣa sambhava anabhyupagamāt itarathā yaḥ eva kaścid abhidadhyāt

original: sa eva samastavastuvistāravyāpijñānāloka iti samastārthagocarasaṃvedanasiddhir ity āstāṃ tāvat.
analyzed: saḥ eva samasta vastu vistāra vyāpi jñāna ālokaḥ iti samasta artha gocara saṃvedana siddhiḥ iti āstām tāvat

original: [NAV_28.0] tad evaṃ pramāṇaviṣaye lakṣaṇasaṃkhyāvipratipattī nirākṛtyādhunā kramaprāptāṃ gocaravipratipattiṃ bahuvaktavyatvād anirākṛtya tāvat  #
analyzed: tat evam pramāṇa viṣaye lakṣaṇa saṃkhyā vipratipattī nirākṛtya adhunā krama prāptām gocara vipratipattim bahu vaktavya tvāt a nirākṛtya tāvat
phala vipratipattim nirācikīrṣuḥ āha
pramāṇasya phalam sākṣāt ajñāna vinivartanam
kevalasya sukha upekṣe śeṣasya ādāna hāna dhīḥ

original: sākṣād asākṣāc cānantaraṃ vyavahitaṃ cety arthaḥ. tatra sākṣād ajñānam anadhyavasāyaḥ prameyāparicchittis tasya vinivartanaṃ viśeṣeṇa pralayāpādanaṃ  #
analyzed: sākṣāt asākṣāt ca anantaram vyavahitam ca iti arthaḥ tatra sākṣāt ajñānam anadhyavasāyaḥ prameya aparicchittiḥ tasya vinivartanam viśeṣeṇa pralaya āpādanam
pramāṇasya phalam
ajñāna uddalana dvāreṇa tasya pravṛtteḥ

original: tasya ca sarvānarthamūlatayā pramātrapakāritvāt. tannivartanasya prayojanatā yuktāiva.
analyzed: tasya ca sarva anartha mūla tayā pramātṛ apakāri tvāt tad nivartanasya prayojana tā yuktā iva

original: etac cānantaraprayojanaṃ sarvajñānānām ekarūpatvāt sāmānyenoktam. vyavahitaprayojanaṃ punar vibhāgenāha:

kevalasya sarvajña jñānasya sukham vaiṣayika sukha atīta parama āhlāda anubhava

original: te sukhopekṣe phalam ity arthaḥ. śeṣasya tadvyatiriktaprākṛtalokapramāṇasyādānaṃ grahaṇaṃ hānaṃ parityāgas,
analyzed: te sukha upekṣe phalam iti arthaḥ śeṣasya tad vyatirikta prākṛta loka pramāṇasya adānam grahaṇam hānam parityāgaḥ

original: prekṣāpūrvakāriṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttyayogād ity uktaṃ bhavati.

gocaraḥ viṣayaḥ

analyzed: tathā api anādi mithyā abhiniveśa vāsita antaḥkaraṇāḥ kudarśana vipralabdha buddhayaḥ vipratipadyante iti sarva pramāṇānām anekānta gocara tva sādhakam

iha yat pramāṇam tat paraspara a vinirluṭhita aneka dharma parikarita vastunaḥ grāhakam

iha yat yatra pratibhāti

original: tad -- yathā nirādīnavanayanaprabhavadarśane pratibhāsamānaṃ pāṭalatayā japākusumaṃ tathāiva tadgocaratayābhyupagamyate;
analyzed: tat yathā nirādīnava nayana prabhava darśane pratibhāsamānam pāṭala tayā japā kusumam tathā iva tad gocara tayā abhyupagamyate

original: [NAV_29.2] na cetaretaraviśakalitadharmidharmabhāvavādibhiḥ kaṇabhakṣākṣapādaśiṣyakais tāvad asya hetor asiddhatādidoṣaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyas,

tad abhyupagamam antareṇa sva abhipreta vastunaḥ tathā hi

original: ekasmin dharmiṇi bahavo dharmās tato bhinnatanavaḥ kathaṃ varteran?

original: nanu so 'pi samavāyo yady upakāryopakārakabhāvavyatirekeṇāpi bhavati,

na bhinnaiḥ svabhāvaiḥ

original: tās tarhi tatra kathaṃ vartanta iti vācyam. samavāyād ityuttare 'sāv apy upakāryopakārakabhāvam
analyzed: tāḥ tarhi tatra katham vartante iti vācyam samavāyāt iti uttare sau api upakārya upakāraka bhāvam

original: antareṇa kathaṃ na sarvatreti prācīnaṃ codyaṃ paścāllagnam anudhāvati. upakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagame
analyzed: antareṇa katham na sarvatra iti prācīnam codyam paścāt lagnam anudhāvati upakārya upakāraka bhāva abhyupagame

original: punar apy anekasvabhāvatāpradarśitayukteḥ punaḥ śaktyupakārakabhinnaśaktiparikalpane tad evāvartate,

analyzed: tat na bhinna dharma parikalpane pi anekāntāt mokṣaḥ iti varam ādau eva matsaritām

original: vihāyānekadharmādhyāsitaṃ vastv abhyupagatam. kiṃ bhedakalpanayāsthāna evātmanā parikleśiteneti.

ekānta bhedaḥ eva tad upapatteḥ

original: bhinnāḥ khalu saṃyogādayaḥ saṃyogyādibhyo vikalpayituṃ pāryante -- yad uta katham eta eteṣu vartanta iti?

yadi eka deśena
tat ayuktam

original: teṣāṃ niravayavatvābhyupagamāt. sāvayavatve 'pi tebhyo 'vayavebhyo yady abhinnās,

original: ekasyānekāvayavatvaprāpteḥ. atha bhinnās teṣv api te kathaṃ vartanta ity vācyam:

original: ekadeśena sāmastyena vā. ekadeśapakṣe tad evāvartata ity anavasthā. atha sāmastyena,

original: pratyekaṃ parisamāptatayā saṃyogādibahutvaprasaṅgāt. tadabhinnāḥ punaḥ saṃyogādayo na vikalpabhājo bhavanti. abhedapakṣe 'pi saṃyogādimātraṃ  #
analyzed: pratyekam parisamāpta tayā saṃyoga ādi bahu tva prasaṅgāt tad abhinnāḥ punar saṃyoga ādayaḥ na vikalpa bhājaḥ bhavanti abheda pakṣe pi saṃyoga ādi mātram

original: saṃyogyādimātraṃ vā syād iti cen, na,
analyzed: saṃyogi ādi mātram vā syāt iti ced na
tasya api ekāntena anabhyupagamāt

original: kiṃ tarhy anyonyāviśliṣṭasvarūpā vivakṣayā sandarśanīyabhedāḥ sarva evāite 'bhyupagamyante,

tathā ca brahma advaita śūnyavāda ādayaḥ siddhim aśnuvīran

original: [NAV_29.3] etenāsya hetoḥ kāpilā apy asiddhatādidoṣam abhidhitsavo maukyam ānītāḥ. tathā hy:

original: paryāyabhrāntijanakaḥ punar vivarto 'pāramārthika iti cen, na,

original: dvayor api sarvapramāṇeṣu prakāśamānayor abādhitayoḥ sarvavyavahāranibandhanayoḥ pakṣapātam antareṇāikasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt. tathā sati  #

original: dravyaṃ punar alīkam iti paryāyapakṣapātī prasañjayan durniṣedhaḥ syād iti. athettham abhidadhīthā:
analyzed: dravyam punar alīkam iti paryāya pakṣapātī prasañjayan durniṣedhaḥ syāt iti atha ittham abhidadhīthāḥ
dravyam sarvatra avyabhicarita rūpa tvāt satyam
paryāyāḥ punar vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti asatyāḥ

original: tad ayuktam. yadi nāma dravyam abhedarūpatvāt sarvatrānuvartate,
analyzed: tat ayuktam yadi nāma dravyam abheda rūpa tvāt sarvatra anuvartate
paryāyāḥ tu bheda rūpa tvāt vyavacchidyante
tathā api tat satyam
itare līkāḥ iti vaktum na pāryate

original: na hi nīlaṃ pītarūpatāṃ na bibhartītyetāvatā tad asatyam,
analyzed: na hi nīlam pīta rūpa tām na bibharti iti etāvatā tat asatyam
atiprasaṅgāt
sarvasya para rūpa parihāra avasthāyi tayā alīka tva prāpteḥ atha dravyam eva paryāyāḥ
tad a vyatirikta tvāt
tad sva rūpavan
na santi vā dravya vyatirekiṇaḥ
niḥsvabhāva tvāt
kha puṣpa vat iti pramāṇayasi
tathā sati paryāyāḥ eva dravyam
tad avyatirikta tvāt tad sva rūpavan
na asti vā paryāya vyatiriktam dravyam
niṣparyāya tvāt

original: ākāśakusumavad itītaro 'pi pramāṇayan kena vāryeta. tan na pakṣadvaye 'pi kācid viśeṣopalabdhir
analyzed: ākāśa kusuma vat iti pramāṇayan kena vāryeta tat na pakṣa dvaye pi kācid viśeṣa upalabdhiḥ
iti yathā iva ananta saha krama varti paryāya adhyāsitam vastu sarva pramāṇeṣu prakāśate tathā iva abhyupagantavyam

original: tathā cānyasyābhāvāt tad eva tadgocara iti sthitam.
analyzed: tathā ca anyasya abhāvāt tat eva tad gocaraḥ iti sthitam

original: [NAV_29.4] tathā sugatamatānusāriṇām api madhye sautrāntikas tāvad asya hetor asiddhatām āvirbhāvayituṃ notsahate,
analyzed: tathā sugata mata anusāriṇām api madhye sautrāntikaḥ tāvat asya hetoḥ asiddha tām āvirbhāvayitum nā utsahate
tad abhyupagati vyatirekeṇa nija darśana vyavasthā anupapatteḥ tathā hi
bahis tāvat ekam kāraṇam apara apara sāmagrī antaḥpāti tayā aneka kārya kāryā āvedyate

original: yathā rūpaṃ svottarakṣaṇaṃ svāvagāhijñānādikaṃ ca yugapaj janayati. yadi cāikakṣaṇavartinaḥ sāmagrībhedena bhedam anubhavata eva bhinnadeśanānākāryakāritā,
analyzed: yathā rūpam sva uttara kṣaṇam sva avagāhi jñāna ādikam ca yugapad janayati yadi ca āika kṣaṇa vartinaḥ sāmagrī bhedena bhedam anubhavataḥ eva bhinna deśa nānā kārya kāri tā

original: tathā sati nityapakṣoditaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ svamastakopanipāti syāt,
analyzed: tathā sati nitya pakṣa uditam dūṣaṇam sva mastaka upanipāti syāt

original: tasyāpi tathāiva bhinnakālakāryanirvartane 'pi bhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt. tathā pratibhāsabhedena kṣaṇakṣayirūpādisvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvābhyupagamaś  #
analyzed: tasya api tathā iva bhinna kāla kārya nirvartane pi bheda abhāva prasaṅgāt tathā pratibhāsa bhedena kṣaṇa kṣayi rūpa ādi sva lakṣaṇa vilakṣaṇa tva abhyupagamaḥ
nirnibandhanaḥ syāt
kauṭasthyam dravyasya apara apara kāraṇa kalāpa antargata tayā nava purāṇa ādi paryāya rūpa rasa gandha sparśa avabhāsa lakṣaṇa kārya sampādana avirodha prasakteḥ

original: kiṃ cāyam ekaṃ svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ sākṣāl lakṣayan kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇāni
analyzed: kim ca ayam ekam sva avayava vyāpinam kāla antara saṃcariṣṇum ākāram sākṣāt lakṣayan kṣaṇa kṣayi paramāṇu lakṣaṇāni
sva lakṣaṇāni ācakṣīta na anyathā
yathākūtam tad avabhāsasya svapna antare pi an upalakṣaṇāt

original: lakṣitasya cālakṣitavyatirekanirākaraṇatas tādātmyaṃ kathayan svagirānekāntāvabhāsaṃ samarthayate. tathā hy:
analyzed: lakṣitasya ca alakṣita vyatireka nirākaraṇataḥ tādātmyam kathayan sva girā anekānta avabhāsam samarthayate tathā hi
alakṣita paramāṇu pārimāṇḍalya pratikṣaṇa vivartam api sva lakṣaṇam sthira sthūra ādi ātmanā darśayati svarūpam
anyathā suṣuptam jagat āsajyeta
tad aprakāśane pramāṇa antarasya api atyanta vilakṣaṇa sva lakṣaṇa āvedakasya apravṛtti prasaṅgāt
tathā antar saṃvedanam artha svarūpa apekṣayā bahirmukha antarmukha sa vikalpa avikalpa bhrānta abhrānta ādi pratibhāsam
ekam abhyupayataḥ katham anekānta avabhāsaḥ siddhaḥ syāt
tathā nānā deśa sthita artha sārtha samarpita ākāra uparaktam ekam ākāra bhede pi anyathā yugapad prakāśamāna sita asita ādi artha vyavasthiti anupapatteḥ
saṃvedanam anumanyamānaḥ katham bhinna samaya bhāvi harṣa viṣāda ādi aneka vivarta vaśāt tad bhedam
ātyantikam abhidadhīta

original: abhinnayogakṣematvād. yugapadbhāvināṃ saṃvidantarniviṣṭākārāṇām ekatvaṃ na harṣādīnāṃ,
analyzed: abhinna yogakṣema tvāt yugapad bhāvinām saṃvid antar niviṣṭa ākārāṇām eka tvam na harṣa ādīnām
tad viparyayāt iti ced na
tad sāmarthya vyavasthāpya artha abheda prasaṅgāt

original: tadekatayā sitapītādiṣu jñānasya bodharūpeṇāivāviśiṣṭatvāt. tad evaṃ bahir antaś
analyzed: tad eka tayā sita pīta ādiṣu jñānasya bodha rūpeṇa a iva a viśiṣṭa tvāt tat evam bahis antar
pramāṇataḥ sthiteḥ sva lakṣaṇasya anyathā sva abhyupeta darśana vyavasthā yogān
na arthavādī anekānta prakāśam pratikṣeptum arhati
tathā urarīkṛta yoga ācāra matam api balāt anekānta prakāśa rajjuḥ āveṣṭayati

original: ekasyāpi jñānasyānekavedyavedakākāratayā prathanopagateḥ. ekayogakṣematvāt tadaikyam iti cen, na,
analyzed: ekasya api jñānasya aneka vedya vedaka ākāra tayā prathana upagateḥ eka yogakṣema tvāt tad aikyam iti ced na

original: yugapadudayapralayavatāṃ sahavedināṃ sakalasantānānām ekatvaprasaṅgāt. saṃvṛtidarśitatvād anekatvasya,
analyzed: yugapad udaya pralayavatām sahavedinām sakala santānānām ekatva prasaṅgāt saṃvṛti darśita tvāt anekatvasya
na tena sva saṃvedana sākṣātkṛta pāramārthika āika tva kṣatiḥ iti ced na
brahma vādi mata a pratiṣedha prasakteḥ

original: yato 'nādyavidyābalād ekam akramaṃ sacetanaṃ svasaṃvedanasākṣātkṛtam api brahmānekaṃ kramavac cetanācetanaṃ parokṣāparokṣaṃ lakṣyate,
analyzed: yatas na ādya vidyā balāt ekam akramam sa cetanam sva saṃvedana sākṣātkṛtam api brahma anekam kramavat cetana acetanam parokṣa aparokṣam lakṣyate

original: bhavatparikalpitagrāhyagrāhakākāraviviktasaṃvedanavad iti tenāpi na durupapādam. astu vāyam anekāntāvabhāso bhrāntas,
analyzed: bhavat parikalpita grāhya grāhaka ākāra vivikta saṃvedana vat iti tena api na durupapādam astu vā ayam anekānta avabhāsaḥ bhrāntaḥ
tathā api saṃvedanasya advaya tā na lakṣyate

original: tallakṣaṇe sakalāsumatām adhunāiva muktatāvāpteḥ. lakṣyate ca tat kathañcid,
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇe sakala asumatām adhunā iva mukta tā avāpteḥ lakṣyate ca tat kathañcid

original: itarathā suṣuptadaśāvat sarvavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgād ity ekasyāpi saṃvedanasya lakṣitālakṣitatvenānekāntapratibhāso
analyzed: itarathā suṣupta daśā vat sarva vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt iti ekasya api saṃvedanasya lakṣita alakṣita tvena anekānta pratibhāsaḥ

original: duḥśako 'pahnotum iti jñānavādy apy asya hetor asiddhatāvirbhāvanaṃ prati tūṣṇīm āsīta.
analyzed: duḥśakaḥ u pahnotum iti jñāna vādī api asya hetoḥ asiddha tā āvirbhāvanam prati tūṣṇīm āsīta

original: [NAV_29.6] śūnyavādinaḥ samastābhāvād asiddho 'nekāntaprakāśa iti cen, na,
analyzed: śūnyavādinaḥ samasta abhāvāt asiddhaḥ nekānta prakāśaḥ iti ced na

original: anyathāpramāṇakaṃ sarvaṃ sarvatra vidyata iti parasyāpi vadato na vadanabhaṅgaḥ syāt,
analyzed: anyathā pramāṇakam sarvam sarvatra vidyate iti parasya api vadataḥ na vadana bhaṅgaḥ syāt

original: tadabhyupagame 'bhyupagamakṣatiḥ. tayoś ca darśitavad anekāntaprakāśa iti nāsiddho
analyzed: tad abhyupagame bhyupagama kṣatiḥ tayoḥ ca darśita vat anekānta prakāśaḥ iti na asiddhaḥ
hetuḥ maru marīcikā nicaya cumbini saṃvedane jala ullekhe pi tad gocara tva abhyupagama abhāvāt
anaikāntikaḥ yam iti mā śaṅkiṣṭhāḥ
tasya bhrānta tvāt

original: abhrāntaprakāśo hi tadabhyupagatihetuḥ. athāyam apītaretaravinirluṭhitaparamāṇukṣaṇakṣayibodhena bādhyamānatvād bhrānta ity ācakṣīthās,
analyzed: abhrānta prakāśaḥ hi tad abhyupagati hetuḥ atha ayam api itaretara vinirluṭhita paramāṇu kṣaṇa kṣayi bodhena bādhyamāna tvāt bhrāntaḥ iti ācakṣīthāḥ
tat ayuktam

original: yatas tadbodhaḥ kim upalabdhimātram yad vā nirṇayaḥ?

yadi ādyaḥ kalpaḥ tadā anumānam viśīryeta
nirgocara tvāt
nirvikalpaka vivikta darśanena virodha bhīru tayā sarvathā vastu grahaṇa abhyupagamāt
pramāṇa kalite ca māna antara vaiyarthyāt
anavasthā prāpteḥ atha dvitīyas

original: tathā sati sarvaṃ nirvikalpakam apramāṇatām aśnuvīta. na ca nirṇayo 'nekāntaprakāśaṃ bādhate,
analyzed: tathā sati sarvam nirvikalpakam apramāṇa tām aśnuvīta na ca nirṇayaḥ nekānta prakāśam bādhate

original: bahir antaś ca tathāiva tadvijṛmbhaṇāt. atha sarvathā vastugrahaṇe 'pi nirvikalpakaṃ yatrāṃśe pāścātyaṃ vyavahārakārivyavasāyam upajanayati,
analyzed: bahis antar ca tathā iva tad vijṛmbhaṇāt atha sarvathā vastu grahaṇe nirvikalpakam yatra aṃśe pāścātyam vyavahāra kāri vyavasāyam upajanayati
tatra ā iva pramāṇa tām āskandati na anyatra iti manyethāḥ

original: tathā sati yadanantaram arthakriyāsamarthārthaprārthanayā puruṣaḥ pravartate sa eva nirṇayaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ svīkuryān,
analyzed: tathā sati yad anantaram arthakriyā samartha artha prārthanayā puruṣaḥ pravartate saḥ eva nirṇayaḥ prāmāṇyam svīkuryān
na nirvikalpakam

original: tajjanakatve 'pi sannikarṣādivad ity āsajyeta. nirvikalpakam anadhigatārthādhigantṛtvāt pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: tad janaka tve pi sannikarṣa ādi vat iti āsajyeta nirvikalpakam anadhigata artha adhigantṛ tvāt pramāṇam
na vyavasitiḥ
tad vikalpa tvāt iti ced

original: nānumiter api tadvad aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt. na ca viparītākāranirākaraṇacaturatayānumitir viśeṣavatī,
analyzed: na anumiteḥ api tad vat aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt na ca viparīta ākāra nirākaraṇa catura tayā anumitiḥ viśeṣavatī
nirṇīteḥ api tad apanoda dakṣa tvāt

original: asamāropaviṣaye 'pravṛtteḥ. trirūpaliṅgajatayā viśeṣo 'numiter mānatāsādhaka iti cet,
analyzed: asamāropa viṣaye pravṛtteḥ trirūpa liṅga ja tayā viśeṣaḥ numiteḥ māna tā sādhakaḥ iti ced

original: sākṣād anubhavād utpādas tarhi nirṇīter mahāparādha iti bhavato bālatām īkṣāmahe. kiṃ ca,
analyzed: sākṣāt anubhavāt utpādaḥ tarhi nirṇīteḥ mahā aparādhaḥ iti bhavataḥ bāla tām īkṣāmahe kim ca

original: yathā nirvikalpakam alakṣitaṃ sakalavyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇagrahaṇapravaṇam api katicidaṃśaviṣayaṃ vikalpam utthāpayati,
analyzed: yathā nirvikalpakam alakṣitam sakala vyāvṛtta sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa pravaṇam api katicid aṃśa viṣayam vikalpam utthāpayati

original: tathārtha evendriyālokādisannikṛṣṭatayā katicinnijāṃśaviṣayaṃ sākṣādviśadavikalpaṃ janayed iti kim ajāgalastanakalpanirvikalpakakalpanayā?
analyzed: tathā arthaḥ evā indriya āloka ādi sannikṛṣṭa tayā katicid nija aṃśa viṣayam sākṣāt viśada vikalpam janayet iti kim ajāgala stana kalpa nirvikalpaka kalpanayā
tāvantaḥ ṃśāḥ bahis arthe virudhyante iti ced

original: pāṭavāpāṭavādayo darśane 'py ekasmin na virudhyanta iti kiṃ rājñām ājñā?
analyzed: pāṭava apāṭava ādayaḥ darśane pi ekasmin na virudhyante iti kim rājñām ājñā

original: tasmān na kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇalakṣakaṃ kvacit kadācid darśanaṃ lakṣayanti bhavanto 'pi,
analyzed: tasmāt na kṣaṇa kṣayi paramāṇu lakṣaṇa sva lakṣaṇa lakṣakam kvacid kadācid darśanam lakṣayanti bhavantaḥ pi

original: kevalaṃ svadarśanānuraktāntaḥkaraṇatayā na tadasattāṃ pratipadyante. svāṃśavyāpinaṃ kālāntarānuyāyinam ekaṃ bahir antaś cārthaṃ bodhaṃ ca prakāśayan  #
analyzed: kevalam sva darśana anurakta antaḥkaraṇa tayā na tad asattām pratipadyante sva aṃśa vyāpinam kāla antara anuyāyinam ekam bahis antar ca artham bodham ca prakāśayan  /
prathamānaḥ nirṇayaḥ

original: na punar nirmūlakaiḥ kuyuktivikalpair bādhyata iti na bhrāntaḥ. kiṃ cāsya bhrāntatāṃ kathayan sarvapramāṇaprameyavyavasthām unmūlyati. tathā
analyzed: na punar nirmūlakaiḥ kuyukti vikalpaiḥ bādhyate iti na bhrāntaḥ kim ca asya bhrānta tām kathayan sarva pramāṇa prameya vyavasthām unmūlyati tathā

original: yat sattvabodharūpatvasukhatvādiṣu pramāṇaṃ tad eva kṣaṇakṣayitvasvargaprāpaṇaśaktiyuktatvādiṣv apramāṇam;
analyzed: yat sattva bodha rūpa tva sukha tva ādiṣu pramāṇam tat eva kṣaṇa kṣayi tva svarga prāpaṇa śakti yukta tva ādiṣu apramāṇam

original: tathā yad vastu nīlacaturasrordhvatādirūpatayā prameyaṃ tad eva madhyabhāgakṣaṇavivartādināprameyaṃ;
analyzed: tathā yat vastu nīla caturasra ūrdhva tā ādi rūpa tayā prameyam tat eva madhya bhāga kṣaṇa vivarta ādinā aprameyam

original: tathā yad bahirarthāpekṣayā savikalpakaṃ svapnādidarśanaṃ vā bhrāntaṃ tad eva svarūpāpekṣayābhrāntam;
analyzed: tathā yat bahis artha apekṣayā savikalpakam svapna ādi darśanam vā bhrāntam tat eva svarūpa apekṣayā abhrāntam

original: tathā yan niśīthinīnāthadvayādikaṃ dvitve 'līkaṃ tad api dhavalatāniyatadeśacāritādāv analīkam iti nirṇayaḥ. yadi tu virodhād bibhyadbhir bhavadbhir  #
analyzed: tathā yat niśīthinī nātha dvaya ādikam dvi tve līkam tat api dhavala tā niyata deśa cārita ādau analīkam iti nirṇayaḥ yadi tu virodhāt bibhyadbhiḥ bhavadbhiḥ
ayam apahnūyate

original: kim aparam aikāntikaṃ pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ corarīkṛtya svākūtaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur iti sakautukaṃ naś cetaḥ.
analyzed: kim aparam aikāntikam pramāṇam prameyam ca urarīkṛtya su ākūtam pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ iti sa kautukam naḥ cetaḥ

original: [NAV_29.7] atha jñānavādy advaitaprakāśam alakṣitam abhyupetya tena bāhuvidhyaṃ dadhāno bodho bādhyamānatvād bhrānta ity abhidadhyāt,
analyzed: atha jñāna vādī advaita prakāśam alakṣitam abhyupetya tena bāhuvidhyam dadhānaḥ bodhaḥ bādhyamāna tvāt bhrāntaḥ iti abhidadhyāt
tat ayuktam
dṛṣṭa hāni adṛṣṭa parikalpanā prasaṅgāt

original: alakṣitanirvikalpadarśanasya ca prāg eva pratikṣiptatvāt. atha yuktir bodhasya vaividhyaṃ bādheta,
analyzed: alakṣita nirvikalpa darśanasya ca prāk eva pratikṣipta tvāt atha yuktiḥ bodhasya vaividhyam bādheta
tathā hi bhrānta abhrānta saṃvedana vivekasya kartum aśakya tvāt
saṃvid mātrasya tu sarvatra avyabhicāri tvāt

original: advayaṃ saṃvedanaṃ viviktayuktyā prakāśamānam anādikālālīnavāsanāsamupajanitasaṃvṛtidarśitasattākaṃ sitāsitādivividhapratibhāsaṃ nirākurute.  #
analyzed: advayam saṃvedanam vivikta yuktyā prakāśamānam anādi kāla ālīna vāsanā samupajanita saṃvṛti darśita sattākam sita asita ādi vividha pratibhāsam nirākurute
atra pratividadhmahe

original: kim ayam anekākāro bodho 'dvayasaṃvedanād vyatyaraikṣīd vā na vā. kiṃ cāto,
analyzed: kim ayam aneka ākāraḥ bodhaḥ dvaya saṃvedanāt vyatyaraikṣīt vā na vā kim
yadi vyabhaitsīt

original: katham adṛṣṭatatkāryatve vyatirikto 'yaṃ tad advayaṃ saṃvedanam anumāpayet?
analyzed: katham adṛṣṭa tad kārya tve vyatiriktaḥ yam tat advayam saṃvedanam anumāpayet

original: avyatirekapakṣe punar anekaḥ sann ekasaṃvedanatādātmyena prathamānaḥ katham advaitaṃ noddalayet?
analyzed: avyatireka pakṣe punar anekaḥ san eka saṃvedana tādātmyena prathamānaḥ katham advaitam nā uddalayet

original: atha saṃvṛtidarśitatvād alīkatayāsya sitāsitādyākārabahirmukhakāluṣyasya bodhena tāttvikena saha bhedābhedavikalpānupapattir iti brūṣe,
analyzed: atha saṃvṛti darśita tvāt alīka tayā asya sita asita ādi ākāra bahirmukha kāluṣyasya bodhena tāttvikena saha bheda abheda vikalpa anupapattiḥ iti brūṣe

original: ataḥ parasparavibhinnāv iti. na sāmānyāt pṛthag viśeṣopalambha iti cet,
analyzed: atas paraspara vibhinnau iti na sāmānyāt pṛthak viśeṣa upalambhaḥ iti ced

original: kathaṃ tarhi tasyopalambha iti vācyam. sāmānyavyāptasyeti cen,
analyzed: katham tarhi tasya upalambhaḥ iti vācyam sāmānya vyāptasya iti ced
na tarhi sa viśeṣa upalambhaḥ
sāmānyasya api tena grahaṇāt

original: tataś ca tena bodhena viviktaviśeṣagrahaṇābhāvāt tadvācakaṃ dhvaniṃ tatsādhyaṃ ca vyavahāraṃ na pravartayet pramātā;
analyzed: tatas ca tena bodhena vivikta viśeṣa grahaṇa abhāvāt tad vācakam dhvanim tad sādhyam ca vyavahāram na pravartayet pramātā
na ca etat asti

original: viśeṣābhidhānavyavahārayoḥ pravṛttidarśanāt. tasmād viśeṣam abhilaṣatā tatra ca vyavahāraṃ
analyzed: viśeṣa abhidhāna vyavahārayoḥ pravṛtti darśanāt tasmāt viśeṣam abhilaṣatā tatra ca vyavahāram

original: pravartayatā tadgrāhako bodho vivikto 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. tathā sāmānyam api viviktākāratayā
analyzed: pravartayatā tad grāhakaḥ bodhaḥ viviktaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ tathā sāmānyam api vivikta ākāra tayā
sva grāhiṇi jñāne yadi na prakāśeta

original: tadā tadgocarābhimatasaṃvedanena viśeṣasyāpy ākalanāt sāmānyābhidhānavyavahārayoḥ pravṛtter ucchedas tathāiva vaktavyo,
analyzed: tadā tad gocara abhimata saṃvedanena viśeṣasya api ākalanāt sāmānya abhidhāna vyavahārayoḥ pravṛtteḥ ucchedaḥ tathā iva
vivikta sāmānya grāhi bodha mūlaka tvāt tayoḥ

original: tadaniṣṭau tayor apy abhāvāpatteḥ. na ca sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā tiraskṛtya kevalasya viśeṣasya sāmānyasya vābhyupagamaḥ kartuṃ yukto,
analyzed: tad aniṣṭau tayoḥ api abhāva āpatteḥ na ca sāmānyam viśeṣam vā tiraskṛtya kevalasya viśeṣasya sāmānyasya vā abhyupagamaḥ kartum yuktaḥ

original: dvayor api svagrāhijñāne pratibhāsamānatayā viśeṣābhāvāt. tasmād etau dvāv apītaretaraviśakalitāv aṅgīkaraṇārhāv iti naigamaḥ.
analyzed: dvayoḥ api sva grāhi jñāne pratibhāsamāna tayā viśeṣa abhāvāt tasmāt etau dvau api itaretara viśakalitau aṅgīkaraṇa arhau iti naigamaḥ

original: [NAV_29.15] adhunā saṅgrahābhiprāyo varṇyate. tatra saṅgṛhṇāty aśeṣaviśeṣatirodhānadvāreṇa sāmānyarūpatayā jagad ādatta iti saṅgrahaḥ. ayaṃ  #
analyzed: adhunā saṅgraha abhiprāyaḥ varṇyate tatra saṅgṛhṇāti aśeṣa viśeṣa tirodhāna dvāreṇa sāmānya rūpa tayā jagat ādatte iti saṅgrahaḥ ayam
hi manyate
bhāva lakṣaṇa sāmānyāt vyatiricyamāna mūrtayaḥ vā viśeṣāḥ parikalpyeran
a vyatiricyamāna mūrtayaḥ vā
gati antara abhāvāt tatra yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ
tadā niḥsvabhāva tām te svīkuryuḥ
bhāva vyatireki tvāt
gagana kusuma ādi vat atha dvitīyaḥ kalpaḥ
tarhi bhāva mātram āpadyante tathā hi
bhāva mātram viśeṣāḥ
tad avyatirikta tvāt

original: iha yad yato 'vyatiriktaṃ tat tad eva bhavati,
analyzed: iha yat yatas vyatiriktam tat tat eva bhavati
tat yathā svarūpam
a vyatirekiṇaḥ ca viśeṣāḥ

original: atas tadrūpā eva. nanu ca yadi bhāvamātram eva tattvaṃ tadā tasya sarvatrāviśeṣād
analyzed: atas tad rūpāḥ eva nanu ca yadi bhāva mātram eva tattvam tadā tasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt
ye ete prati prāṇi prasiddhāḥ stambha ibha kumbha ambhorūha ādi viśiṣṭa vastu sādhyāḥ vyavahārāḥ
te sarve pi pralayam āpadyeran

original: ato viśeṣā api viviktavyavahārahetavo 'bhyupagantavyāḥ. nāitad asti,
analyzed: atas viśeṣāḥ api vivikta vyavahāra hetavaḥ bhyupagantavyāḥ na etat asti
vyavahārasya anādya vidyā bala pravartita tvāt
tena pārāmarthika pramāṇa pratiṣṭhita tattva pratibandha abhāvāt kim ca
viśeṣa agrahaḥ viśeṣeṇa tyājyaḥ
viśeṣa vyavasthāpaka pramāṇa abhāvāt tathā hi
bheda rūpāḥ viśeṣāḥ

original: na ca kiñcit pramāṇaṃ bhedam avagāhate,
analyzed: na ca kiñcid pramāṇam bhedam avagāhate

original: pratyakṣaṃ hi tāvad bhāvasampāditasattākaṃ tam eva sākṣatkartuṃ yuktam,
analyzed: pratyakṣam hi tāvat bhāva sampādita sattākam tam eva sākṣatkartum yuktam
na abhāvam
tasya sakala śakti viraha rūpa tayā tad utpādane vyāpāra abhāvāt
anutpādakasya ca sākṣātkaraṇe sarva sākṣātkaraṇa prasaṅgāt

original: tathā ca viśeṣābhāvāt sarvo draṣṭāsarvadarśīsyāt. aniṣṭam cāitad bhavatāṃ,
analyzed: tathā ca viśeṣa abhāvāt sarvaḥ draṣṭā a sarva darśī syāt aniṣṭam bhavatām

original: tasmād bhāvagrāhakam eva tad eṣṭavyam. sa ca bhāvaḥ sarvatrāviśiṣṭa iti tathāiva tena grāhyas,
analyzed: tasmāt bhāva grāhakam eva tat eṣṭavyam sa ca bhāvaḥ sarvatra aviśiṣṭaḥ iti tathā iva tena grāhyaḥ

original: taduttarakālabhāvī punar vikalpo ghaṭo 'yaṃ paṭādir na bhavatīty evamākāro vyavahāraṃ racayann avidyāmūlatvān na pramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: tad uttara kāla bhāvī punar vikalpaḥ ghaṭaḥ yam paṭa ādiḥ na bhavati iti evam ākāraḥ vyavahāram racayan avidyā mūla tvāt na pramāṇam

original: tan na pratyakṣād viśeṣāvagatiḥ. nāpy anumānādeḥ,
analyzed: tat na pratyakṣāt viśeṣa avagatiḥ na api anumāna ādeḥ
pratyakṣa mūlaka tvāt śeṣa pramāṇa vargasya
tasmāt sāmānyam eva
na viśeṣāḥ iti saṅgrahaḥ

original: [NAV_29.16] sāmprataṃ vyavahāramatam ucyate. tatra vyavaharaṇaṃ vyavahriyate vānena laukikair abhiprāyeṇeti vyavahāraḥ. ayaṃ tu manyate:
analyzed: sāmpratam vyavahāra matam ucyate tatra vyavaharaṇam vyavahriyate vā anena laukikaiḥ abhiprāyeṇa iti vyavahāraḥ ayam tu manyate
yathā loka grāham eva vastu astu
kim anayā adṛṣṭa avyavahriyamāna vastu parikalpana kaṣṭa piṣṭikayā

original: yad eva ca lokavyavahārapatham avatarati tasyānugrāhakaṃ pramāṇam upalabhyate,
analyzed: yat eva ca lokavyavahāra patham avatarati tasya anugrāhakam pramāṇam upalabhyate
na itarasya

original: na hi sāmānyam anādinidhanam ekaṃ saṅgrāhābhimataṃ pramāṇabhūmis,
analyzed: na hi sāmānyam an ādi nidhanam ekam saṅgrāha abhimatam pramāṇa bhūmiḥ
tathā anubhava abhāvāt

original: sarvasya sarvadarśitvaprasaṅgāc ca. nāpi viśeṣāḥ paramāṇulakṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇaḥ pramāṇagocaras,
analyzed: sarvasya sarva darśi tva prasaṅgāt ca nā api viśeṣāḥ paramāṇu lakṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇa kṣayiṇaḥ pramāṇa gocaraḥ

original: tathā pravṛtter abhāvāt. tasmād idam eva nikhilalokābādhitaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ kiyatkālabhāvisthūratām
analyzed: tathā pravṛtteḥ abhāvāt tasmāt idam eva nikhila loka ābādhitam pramāṇa prasiddham kiyat kāla bhāvi sthūra tām

original: ābibhrāṇam udakāharaṇādyarthakriyānirvartanakṣamaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vasturūpaṃ pāramārthikam astu,
analyzed: ābibhrāṇam udaka āharaṇa ādi arthakriyā nirvartana kṣamam ghaṭa ādikam vastu rūpam pāramārthikam astu
pūrva uttara kāla bhāvi tad paryāya paryālocanā punar ajyāyasī
tatra pramāṇa prasara abhāvāt

original: pramāṇam antareṇa ca vicārasya kartum aśakyatvāt. avastutvāc ca teṣāṃ,
analyzed: pramāṇam antareṇa ca vicārasya kartum aśakya tvāt avastu tvāt ca teṣām
kim tad gocara paryālocanena

original: tathā hi: pūrvottarakālabhāvino dravyavivartāḥ kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇā vā viśeṣā na kañcana lokavyavahāram uparacayanti,
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ dravya vivartāḥ kṣaṇa kṣayi paramāṇu lakṣaṇāḥ vā viśeṣāḥ na kañcana lokavyavahāram uparacayanti
tat na te vastu rūpā

original: [NAV_29.17] sāmprataṃ ṛjusūtrābhiprāyaḥ kathyate. tatra rju praguṇam akuṭilam atītānagatavakraparityāgād
analyzed: sāmpratam ṛju sūtra abhiprāyaḥ kathyate tatra ṛju praguṇam akuṭilam atīta anagata vakra parityāgāt

original: vartamānakṣaṇavivartivastuno rūpaṃ sūtrayati niṣṭaṅkitaṃ darśayatīty ṛjusūtraḥ. tathā hy:
analyzed: vartamāna kṣaṇa vivarti vastunaḥ rūpam sūtrayati niṣṭaṅkitam darśayati iti ṛjusūtraḥ tathā hi

original: asyābhiprāyo -- 'tītasya vinaṣṭatvād anāgatasyālabdhātmalābhatvāt kharaviṣāṇādibhyo 'viśiṣyamāṇatayā sakalaśaktiviraharūpatvān nārthakriyānirvartanakṣamatvam,
analyzed: asya abhiprāyaḥ u tītasya vinaṣṭa tvāt anāgatasya alabdha ātmalābha tvāt khara viṣāṇa ādibhyaḥ viśiṣyamāṇa tayā sakala śakti viraha rūpa tvāt na arthakriyā nirvartana kṣamatvam
arthakriyā kṣamam ca vastu

original: tadabhāvān na tayor vastutvam iti. vartamānakṣaṇāliṅgitaṃ ca punar vasturūpaṃ samastārthakriyāsu vyāpriyata iti tad eva pāramārthikam. tad  #
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na tayoḥ vastu tvam iti vartamāna kṣaṇa āliṅgitam ca punar vastu rūpam samasta arthakriyāsu vyāpriyate iti tat eva pāramārthikam tat
api ca niraṃśam abhyupagantavyam
aṃśavyāpteḥ yukti rikta tvāt

original: ekasyānekasvabhāvatām antareṇānekasvāvayavavyāpanāyogāt. anekasvabhāvatāivāstv iti cen, na,
analyzed: ekasya aneka svabhāva tām antareṇa aneka sva avayava vyāpana ayogāt aneka svabhāva tā iva astu iti ced na
virodha vyāghra āghrāta tvāt tathā hi
yadi ekaḥ svabhāvaḥ katham anekaḥ
anekaḥ ced katham ekaḥ
eka anekayoḥ paraspara parihāreṇa avasthānāt

original: tasmāt svarūpanimagnāḥ paramāṇava eva parasparopasarpaṇadvāreṇa kathañcin nicayarūpatām āpannā nikhilakāryeṣu vyāpārabhāja iti ta eva svalakṣaṇaṃ,
analyzed: tasmāt sva rūpa nimagnāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva paraspara upasarpaṇa dvāreṇa kathañcid nicaya rūpa tām āpannāḥ nikhila kāryeṣu vyāpāra bhājaḥ iti te eva sva lakṣaṇam

original: na sthūratāṃ dhārayat pāramārthikaṃ iti. kiṃ ca,
analyzed: na sthūra tām dhārayat pāramārthikam iti kim ca
pramāṇataḥ rtha vyavasthā

original: na ca pramāṇaṃ deśakālavyāptigrahaṇe kiñcana pravartate,
analyzed: na ca pramāṇam deśa kāla vyāpti grahaṇe kiñcana pravartate
sarva pramāṇānām vartamāna prakāśa rūpa tvāt tathā hi

original: pratyakṣaṃ tāvad rūpālokamanaskāracakṣurlakṣaṇakāraṇacatuṣṭayāl labdhasattākaṃ vartamānakṣaṇa eva prakāśate,
analyzed: pratyakṣam tāvat rūpa āloka manaskāra cakṣuḥ lakṣaṇa kāraṇa catuṣṭayāt labdha sattākam vartamāna kṣaṇe eva prakāśate
atīta vartsyat kṣaṇayoḥ asannihita tvāt

original: tataś ca tat tatkālasambaddham eva vastuno rūpaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamate na pūrvam aparaṃ vāsannidhānād eva. yadi punar vinaṣṭam api pūrvakṣaṇavartirūpamākalayet,
analyzed: tatas ca tat tad kāla sambaddham eva vastunaḥ rūpam sākṣātkartum kṣamate na pūrvam aparam vā asannidhānāt eva yadi punar vinaṣṭam api pūrva kṣaṇa varti rūpam ākalayet

original: tadā vinaṣṭatvāviśeṣān niravadhiḥ kṣaṇaparamparā tatra pratīyeta,
analyzed: tadā vinaṣṭa tva aviśeṣāt niravadhiḥ kṣaṇa paramparā tatra pratīyeta

original: tathā ca sati saṅkalikayānādijanmaparamparāgrāhi pratyakṣam anuṣajyeta. evam anāgatakṣaṇagrahaṇe 'pi yojyam;
analyzed: tathā ca sati saṅkalikā yāna ādi janma paramparā grāhi pratyakṣam anuṣajyeta evam anāgata kṣaṇa grahaṇe yojyam
aniṣṭam ca etat

original: tasmāt tad vārtamānikakṣaṇagrahaṇadakṣam evety abhyupagantavyam. nanu ca yadi kṣaṇabhaṅguratām arthātmanām adhyakṣam avalokayati,
analyzed: tasmāt tat vārtamānika kṣaṇa grahaṇa dakṣam evā iti abhyupagantavyam nanu ca yadi kṣaṇa bhaṅgura tām artha ātmanām adhyakṣam avalokayati

original: tadā nīlateva pratibhāsamānā sā vipratipattigocaraṃ na yāyād iti tadviṣayo laukikānāṃ vyavahāraḥ pravarteta,
analyzed: tadā nīla tā iva pratibhāsamānā sā vipratipatti gocaram na yāyāt iti tad viṣayaḥ laukikānām vyavahāraḥ pravarteta
na ca etat asti

original: sthiratādvāreṇa vyavahārapravṛtter iti. atra pratividhīyate -- sākṣātkurvāṇā api kṣaṇavinaśvaratāṃ sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhabuddhayo
analyzed: sthira tā dvāreṇa vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ iti atra pratividhīyate sākṣātkurvāṇāḥ api kṣaṇa vinaśvara tām sadṛśa apara apara utpatti vipralabdha buddhayaḥ
anādi kāla prarūḍha vāsanā prabodha samupajanita mithyā vikalpa sāmarthyāt ca viparyasta sthira tā vyavahāram pravartayanti
tat na ayam adhyakṣasya aparādhaḥ

original: 'pi tu pramātḥṇām eva. tathā ghanākāro 'pi pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvimithyāvikalpasandarśita eva,
analyzed: tu pramātḥṇām eva tathā ghana ākāraḥ pi pratyakṣa pṛṣṭhabhāvi mithyā vikalpa sandarśitaḥ eva
vivikta darśane tad pratibhāsa ayogāt

original: karacaraṇaśirogrīvādayo hy avayavāḥ parasparavibhaktā eva tatra pratibhānti,
analyzed: kara caraṇa śiraḥ grīvā ādayaḥ hi avayavāḥ paraspara vibhaktāḥ eva tatra pratibhānti
na vyāpya ākāraḥ
na ca te sva aṃśa vyāpinaḥ pratibhānti

original: tadavayavānām apītaretaraviśakalitarūpāṇāṃ pratibhāsāt tāvad yāvat paramāṇava eva prathante,
analyzed: tad avayavānām api itaretara viśakalita rūpāṇām pratibhāsāt tāvat yāvat paramāṇavaḥ eva prathante

original: vyāpirūpasya vicārākṣamatvād ity uktaprāyam. nāpy anumānāt sthirasthūravastusiddhiḥ,
analyzed: vyāpi rūpasya vicāra akṣama tvāt iti ukta prāyam nā api anumānāt sthira sthūra vastu siddhiḥ
pratyakṣa parigṛhītam hi sambandham āsādya anumānam pravarteta

original: yadā ca tat kṣaṇabhaṅguraviviktāṃśagrahaṇacāturyam ābibhrad darśitaṃ tadānumānam api tatpratibandhamūlakaṃ tadgocaram eva pāramparyeṇa pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: yadā ca tat kṣaṇa bhaṅgura vivikta aṃśa grahaṇa cāturyam ābibhrat darśitam tadā anumānam api tad pratibandha mūlakam tad gocaram eva pāramparyeṇa pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: svapratibhāsino rūpasyālīkatayā tatpratiṣṭhāpanadvāreṇāiva tasya prāmāṇyāt. nanu ca smaraṇapratyabhijñānādīni sthirasthūravastuvyatirekeṇa
analyzed: sva pratibhāsinaḥ rūpasya alīka tayā tad pratiṣṭhāpana dvāreṇa eva tasya prāmāṇyāt nanu ca smaraṇa pratyabhijñāna ādīni sthira sthūra vastu vyatirekeṇa
pūrvam a dṛṣṭe tad abhāvāt

original: puruṣādyavayavināṃ smaraṇāt pratyabhijñānāc ca. nāitad asti,
analyzed: puruṣa ādi avayavinām smaraṇāt pratyabhijñānāt ca na etat asti
teṣām alīka vāsanā prabodha utthāpita tvena prāmāṇya ayogāt kim ca

original: tāny api svayaṃ vartamānakṣaṇa eva prakāśante,
analyzed: tāni api svayam vartamāna kṣaṇe eva prakāśante

original: viplavavaśāt tu svarūpam eva vāsanāsampāditātītārtharūpatayā vyavasyanti,
analyzed: viplava vaśāt tu sva rūpam eva vāsanā sampādita atīta artha rūpa tayā vyavasyanti
ghana ākāram ca tasya asantam adhyāropayanti

original: tan na tebhyo 'pi vyāpivastusiddhiḥ. tasmād vyāpini rūpe pramāṇānavatārāt parasparaviśliṣṭāḥ paramāṇava eva paramārthata iti rjusūtraḥ.
analyzed: tat na vyāpi vastu siddhiḥ tasmāt vyāpini rūpe pramāṇa anavatārāt paraspara viśliṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva paramārthataḥ iti rjusūtraḥ

original: [NAV_29.18] tad idam arthasvarūpanirūpaṇanipuṇānāṃ nayānāṃ matam upavarṇitam;
analyzed: tat idam artha svarūpa nirūpaṇa nipuṇānām nayānām matam upavarṇitam

original: adhunā śabdavicāracaturāṇām upavarṇyate. tatra trayāṇām api śabdādīnām idaṃ sādhāraṇamākūtaṃ,
analyzed: adhunā śabda vicāra caturāṇām upavarṇyate tatra trayāṇām api śabda ādīnām idam sādhāraṇam ākūtam

original: yad uta śabda eva paramārtho nārthas,
analyzed: yat uta śabdaḥ eva parama arthaḥ na arthaḥ

original: tasya tadavyatiriktatvāt. pārthakyena vastutvasiddheḥ katham avyatireka iti cet,
analyzed: tasya tad avyatirikta tvāt pārthakyena vastu tva siddheḥ katham avyatirekaḥ iti ced
pramāṇāt iti brūmaḥ tathā hi
na vyatiriktaḥ rthaḥ śabdāt
tad pratītau tasya pratīyamāna tvāt

original: iha yatpratītau yat pratīyate tat tato 'vyatiriktaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: iha yad pratītau yat pratīyate tat tatas vyatiriktam bhavati

original: tad yathā -- śabde pratīyamāne tasyāiva svarūpaṃ,
analyzed: tat yathā śabde pratīyamāne tasyāḥ iva svarūpam
pratīyate ca śabde pratīyamāne

original: 'to 'sau tato 'vyatirikta iti. agṛhītasaṅketasya ghaṭaśabdaśravaṇe 'pi ghaṭapratīter abhāvād vyatirikta iti ced,
analyzed: sau tatas vyatiriktaḥ iti agṛhīta saṅketasya ghaṭa śabda śravaṇe ghaṭa pratīteḥ abhāvāt vyatiriktaḥ iti ced

original: evaṃ tarhi viṣasya māraṇātmakatvaṃ tadajñasya na pratibhātīti tat tato vyatiriktam āpadyeta,
analyzed: evam tarhi viṣasya māraṇa ātmaka tvam tat ajñasya na pratibhāti iti tat tatas vyatiriktam āpadyeta
na ca etat asti
tad vyatireka aviśeṣeṇa guḍa khaṇḍa vat viṣasya api amāraka tva āpatteḥ

original: sambandhasya ca vyatiriktena saha prāg evāpāstatvāt;
analyzed: sambandhasya ca vyatiriktena saha prāk evā apāsta tvāt
tat na abuddha pramātṛ doṣeṇa vastunaḥ nyathātvam

original: anyathāndho rūpaṃ nekṣata iti tadabhāvo 'pi pratipattavya iti. ye nirabhidhānā vartante 'rthās teṣāṃ śabdāt pārthakyena vastutvasiddhir iti  #
analyzed: anyathā andhaḥ rūpam na īkṣate iti tad abhāvaḥ pi pratipattavyaḥ iti ye nirabhidhānāḥ vartante rthāḥ teṣām śabdāt pārthakyena vastu tva siddhiḥ iti
ced na
nirabhidhāna artha abhāvāt
kevalam kecid viśeṣa śabdaiḥ saṅkīrtyante

original: kecit sāmānyadhvanibhir ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ syāt. yadi vā sakalārthavācakā viśeṣadhavanayo na santīti nāsty atra pramāṇam. tataś ca sarve 'rthā
analyzed: kecid sāmānya dhvanibhiḥ iti etāvān viśeṣaḥ syāt yadi vā sakala artha vācakāḥ viśeṣa dhavanayaḥ na santi iti na asti atra pramāṇam tatas ca sarve rthāḥ
rtha tvāt

original: ghaṭārthavad iti pramāṇāt sarveṣāṃ svavācakatvena pūrvoktayukteḥ śabdād apārthakyasiddhiḥ. tasmān na paramārthato 'rthaḥ śabdātirikto 'sty,
analyzed: ghaṭa artha vat iti pramāṇāt sarveṣām sva vācaka tvena pūrva ukta yukteḥ śabdāt apārthakya siddhiḥ tasmāt na paramārthataḥ rthaḥ śabda atiriktaḥ u sti

original: upacārataḥ punar laukikair aparyālocitaparamārthair vyavahriyate. asāv apy aupacārikaḥ śabdātmako vārthaḥ pratikṣaṇabhaṅguraḥ svīkartavyo,
analyzed: upacārataḥ punar laukikaiḥ a paryālocita paramārthaiḥ vyavahriyate asau api aupacārikaḥ śabda ātmakaḥ vā arthaḥ prati kṣaṇa bhaṅguraḥ svīkartavyaḥ
varṇānām kṣaṇa dhvaṃsi tā pratīteḥ
ṛjusūtra pratipādita yukti kalāpāt ca

original: [NAV_29.19] sāmpratam eteṣām eva pratyekam abhiprāyaḥ kathyate. tatra śabdo:
analyzed: sāmpratam eteṣām eva pratyekam abhiprāyaḥ kathyate tatra

original: rūḍhito yāvanto dhvanayaḥ kasmiṃścid arthe pravartante;
analyzed: rūḍhitaḥ yāvantaḥ dhvanayaḥ kasmiṃścid arthe pravartante
yathā indra śakra purandara ādayaḥ

original: teṣāṃ sarveṣām apy ekam artham abhipraiti kila pratītivaśād,
analyzed: teṣām sarveṣām api ekam artham abhipraiti kila pratīti vaśāt

original: yathā śabdāvyatireko 'rthasya pratipādyate tathāiva tasyāikatvaṃ vānekatvaṃ vā pratipādanīyaṃ;
analyzed: yathā śabda avyatirekaḥ rthasya pratipādyate tathā iva tasya aikatvam vā anekatvam vā pratipādanīyam

original: na cendraśakrapurandarādayaḥ paryāyaśabdā vibhinnārthavācitayā kadācana pratīyante,
analyzed: na ca indra śakra purandara ādayaḥ paryāya śabdāḥ vibhinna artha vāci tayā kadācana pratīyante
tebhyaḥ sarva dāivāika ākāra parāmarśa utpatteḥ

original: askhaladvṛttitayā tathāiva vyavahāradarśanāt. tasmād eka eva paryāyaśabdānām artha iti śabdaḥ,
analyzed: a skhalat vṛtti tayā tathā iva vyavahāra darśanāt tasmāt ekaḥ eva paryāya śabdānām arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ

original: śabdyata āhūyate 'nenābhiprāyeṇārtha iti niruktād ekārthapratipādanābhiprāyeṇāiva paryāyadhvanīnāṃ prayogād iti.
analyzed: śabdyate āhūyate nena abhiprāyeṇa arthaḥ iti niruktāt ekārtha pratipādana abhiprāyeṇa iva paryāya dhvanīnām prayogāt iti

original: [NAV_29.20] sāmprataṃ samabhirūḍhamatam upavarṇyate. tatra sam ekībhāvenābhirohati
analyzed: sāmpratam samabhirūḍha matam upavarṇyate tatra sam ekībhāvena abhirohati

original: vyutpattinimittam āskandati śabdapravṛttau yo 'bhiprāyaḥ sa samabhirūḍhaḥ. ayaṃ hi
analyzed: vyutpatti nimittam āskandati śabda pravṛttau yaḥ bhiprāyaḥ sa samabhirūḍhaḥ ayam hi
paryāya śabdānām prativibhaktam eva artham abhimanyate
tat yathā indanāt indraḥ
parama aiśvaryam indra śabda vācyam paramārthatas
tadvati arthe punar upacārataḥ pravartate
na vā kaścid tadvān
sarva śabdānām paraspara vibhakta artha pratipādaka tayā āśraya āśrayi bhāvena pravṛtti asiddheḥ evam śakanāt śakraḥ

original: pūrdāraṇāt purandara ityādi bhinnārthatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ darśayati;
analyzed: pūrdāraṇāt purandaraḥ ityādi bhinna artha tvam sarva śabdānām darśayati
pramāṇayati ca
paryāya śabdāḥ vibhinna arthāḥ

original: iha ye ye prativibhaktavyutpattinimittakās te te bhinnārthāḥ,
analyzed: iha ye ye prativibhakta vyutpatti nimittakāḥ te te bhinna arthāḥ
yathā indra ghaṭa puruṣa śabdā vibhinna arthā
vibhinna vyutpatti nimittakāḥ ca paryāya śabdāḥ api

original: ato 'bhinnārthā iti. yat punar avicāritapratītibalād ekārthābhidhāyakatvaṃ pratipādyate tad ayuktam,
analyzed: atas bhinna arthāḥ iti yat punar avicārita pratīti balāt ekārtha abhidhāyaka tvam pratipādyate tat ayuktam
atiprasaṅgāt tathā hi

original: yadi yuktiriktā pratītir eva śaraṇīkriyate tadā mandamandaprakāśe davīyasi deśe sanniviṣṭaśarīrā
analyzed: yadi yukti riktā pratītiḥ eva śaraṇīkriyate tadā manda manda prakāśe davīyasi deśe sanniviṣṭa śarīrā

original: vibhinnā api nimbakadambāśvatthakapitthādaya ekatarvākāratām ābibhrāṇāḥ pratīyanta
analyzed: vibhinnāḥ api nimba kadamba aśvattha kapittha ādayaḥ eka taru ākāra tām ābibhrāṇāḥ pratīyanta
iti eka tayā iva abhyupagantavyāḥ na ca etat asti
vivikta tad sva rūpa grāhi pratyanīka pratyaya upanipāta bādhita tvena pūrva pratīteḥ viviktānām eva teṣām abhyupagamāt
tat na aika artha vācinaḥ dhvanayaḥ santi
rūḍhiḥ punar a vicārita tad arthānām iti samabhirūḍhaḥ
sāmpratam evambhūta abhiprāyaḥ pratipādyate tatra aivam śabdaḥ prakāra vacanaḥ

original: tataś cāivaṃ yathā vyutpāditas taṃ prakāraṃ bhūtaḥ prāpto yaḥ śabdaḥ sa evambhūtaḥ;
analyzed: tatas ca aivam yathā vyutpāditaḥ tam prakāram bhūtaḥ prāptaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ saḥ evambhūtaḥ
tad samarthana pradhānaḥ bhiprāyaḥ pi evambhūtaḥ
tad viṣaya tvāt

original: viṣayaśabdena ca viṣayiṇo 'bhidhānāt. ayaṃ hi yasminn arthe śabdo vyutpādyate sa vyutpattinimittam artho yadāiva vivartate tadāiva taṃ śabdaṃ  #
analyzed: viṣaya śabdena ca viṣayiṇaḥ abhidhānāt ayam hi yasmin arthe śabdaḥ vyutpādyate sa vyutpatti nimittam arthaḥ yadā iva vivartate tadā iva tam śabdam
pravartamānam abhipraiti

original: na sāmānyena. yathodakādyāharaṇavelāyāṃ yoṣidādimastakārūḍho viśiṣṭaceṣṭāvān eva ghaṭo 'bhidhīyate,
analyzed: na sāmānyena yathā udaka ādi āharaṇa velāyām yoṣit ādi mastaka ārūḍhaḥ viśiṣṭa ceṣṭāvān eva ghaṭaḥ abhidhīyate
na śeṣaḥ

original: paṭādivad iti. atītāṃ bhāvinīṃ vā ceṣṭām adhikṛtya sāmānyenāivocyata iti cen, na,
analyzed: paṭa ādi vat iti atītām bhāvinīm vā ceṣṭām adhikṛtya iti ced na
tayoḥ vinaṣṭa anutpanna tayā śaśaviṣāṇa kalpa tvāt

viśeṣa abhāvāt kim ca

kapāla mṛd piṇḍa ādau api tad pravartanam durnivāram syāt
viśeṣa abhāvāt

original: tasmād yatra kṣaṇe vyutpattinimittam avikalam asti tasminn eva so 'rthas tacchabdena vācya ity evambhūtaḥ.
analyzed: tasmāt yatra kṣaṇe vyutpatti nimittam avikalam asti tasmin eva saḥ rthaḥ tad śabdena vācyaḥ iti evambhūtaḥ
tat evam aneka dharma parīta artha   buddhiḥ pramāṇam

original: taddvārāyātaḥ punar ekadharmaniṣṭhārthasamarthanapravaṇaḥ parāmarśaḥ śeṣadharmasvīkāratiraskāraparihāradvāreṇa vartamāno nayaḥ,
analyzed: tad dvārā āyātaḥ punar eka dharma niṣṭhā artha samarthana pravaṇaḥ parāmarśaḥ śeṣa dharma svīkāra tiraskāra parihāra dvāreṇa vartamānaḥ nayaḥ
sa ca dharmāṇām ānantyāt ananta bhedaḥ
tathā api sarva saṅgrāhaka abhiprāya parikalpana mukhena aivam sapta bhedaḥ darśitaḥ ayam eva
ca sva abhipreta dharma avadhāraṇa ātmaka tayā aśeṣa dharma tiraskāra dvāreṇa pravartamāṇaḥ parāmarśaḥ
durnaya saṃjñām aśnute

original: tadbalaprabhāvitasattākā hi khalv ete parapravādāḥ. tathā hi:
analyzed: tad bala prabhāvita sattākāḥ hi khalu ete parapravādāḥ tathā hi
naigama naya darśana anusāriṇau naiyāyika vaiśeṣikau saṅgraha abhiprāya pravṛttāḥ sarve

original: 'py advaitavādāḥ sāṃkhyadarśanaṃ ca. vyavahāranayānupāti prāyaś cārvākadarśanam.

ṛju sūtra ākūta pravṛtta buddhayaḥ tāthāgatāḥ śabda ādi naya mata avalambinaḥ vaiyākaraṇa ādaya
iti atha ittham abhidadhīthāḥ

original: yathā: katham ete 'vadhāraṇadvāreṇa svakam arthaṃ samarthayantas tadviparītaṃ nirākurvāṇā durnayatāṃ pratipadyanta ity,
analyzed: yathā katham ete vadhāraṇa dvāreṇa svakam artham samarthayantaḥ tad viparītam nirākurvāṇāḥ durnaya tām pratipadyante iti
atrā ucyate evam pravṛttau
nirgocarasya naya tva ayogāt tathā hi

original: nayati kenacid aṃśena viśiṣṭam arthaṃ prāpayati yo 'bhiprāyaḥ sa nayaḥ,
analyzed: nayati kenacid aṃśena viśiṣṭam artham prāpayati yaḥ bhiprāyaḥ sa nayaḥ

original: svābhipretadharmāc cheṣadharmapratikṣepadvāreṇa tu pravṛtto na kiñcin nayaty,

original: [NAV_29.23] tathā hi: yaḥ tāvan naigamanayaḥ parasparaviśliṣṭau sāmānyaviśeṣau pratyapīpadat,

original: tad ayuktam. tayos tathā kadācana pratibhāsābhāvāt. yac coktam:

original: dhavakhadirapalāśādisamastaviśeṣāpasāraṇe vṛkṣatvādisāmānyapratibhāsābhāvāt. dūrād viśeṣāgrahaṇe 'pi kevalaṃ tac cakāstīti cen, na,

tatra api abhyantarībhūta viśeṣa pratibhāsāt

original: tadvirahe śaśaviṣāṇarūpatvāt. evaṃ viśeṣā api na sāmānyād atyantavyatirekiṇaḥ pratibhānti,

original: itarathā sattāto 'tiricyamānā bhāvā niḥsvabhāvatām ātmasātkurvanti. tathā vṛkṣatvādisāmānyebhyo 'pi bhedino vṛkṣādayo na syus,
analyzed: itarathā sattātaḥ tiricyamānāḥ bhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāva tām ātmasātkurvanti tathā vṛkṣa tva ādi sāmānyebhyaḥ pi bhedinaḥ vṛkṣa ādayaḥ na syuḥ

original: tadabhedanibandhanatvāt tatsvarūpasthiteḥ. tasmāt tad eva saṃvedanam upasarjanīkṛtavaiṣamyaṃ pradhānīkṛtāikākāraṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhṇātīty ucyate,
analyzed: tad abheda nibandhana tvāt tad svarūpa sthiteḥ tasmāt tat eva saṃvedanam upasarjanīkṛta vaiṣamyam pradhānīkṛta aika ākāram sāmānyam gṛhṇāti iti ucyate
nyakkṛta sama tvam utkalita nānātvam punar viśeṣa grahi iti

original: samatvanānātvayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedinoḥ parasparaṃ sarvārtheṣu bhāvāt,
analyzed: samatva nānātvayoḥ kathañcid bheda abhedinoḥ parasparam sarva artheṣu bhāvāt

original: tadabhāve tathāvidhapratibhāsānupapatteḥ. etena yad avādi “na cāitau vibhinnāv api pratibhāsamānau sāmānyaviśeṣau kathañcin miśrayituṃ yuktāv”
analyzed: tad abhāve tathāvidha pratibhāsa anupapatteḥ etena yat avādi na ca āitau vibhinnau api pratibhāsamānau sāmānya viśeṣau kathañcid miśrayitum yuktau

original: vibhinnayoḥ pratibhāsābhāvāt. vyavahāro 'pi sarvaḥ pradhānopasarjanadvāreṇa kathañcid itaretarāvinirluṭhitasāmānyaviśeṣasādhya eva;

na hi sāmānyam doha vāha ādi kriyāyām upayujyate
viśeṣāṇām eva tatra upayogān
na api viśeṣāḥ eva tad kāriṇaḥ

original: gotvaśūnyānāṃ teṣāṃ vṛkṣādyaviśiṣṭatayā tatkaraṇasāmarthyābhāvāt. kiṃ cātyantavyatireke sāmānyaviśeṣayor vṛkṣaṃ chindhīti coditaḥ kim iti tadviśeṣe  #
analyzed: go tva śūnyānām teṣām vṛkṣa ādi aviśiṣṭa tayā tad karaṇa sāmarthya abhāvāt kim ca atyanta vyatireke sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ vṛkṣam chindhi iti coditaḥ kim iti tad viśeṣe
vidhatte

original: tatra tasya samavāyād iti cen, na,
analyzed: tatra tasya samavāyāt iti ced na
samavāya grāhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt
bhāve pi viśliṣṭayoḥ abheda buddhi utpādana akṣama tvāt

original: tasyāpi vyatiriktatayā padārthāntarāviśeṣān nityatvāikatvasarvagatatvādibhiś ca sarvatra tatkaraṇaprasaṅgāc ca. yat punar avādīr,

original: tato viviktayos tayoḥ kvacid anupalambhād yo 'yaṃ vivikteṣu sāmānyeṣu viśeṣeṣu cābhidhānārthakriyālakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ sa samastaḥ pralayaṃ yāyāl,
analyzed: tatas viviktayoḥ tayoḥ kvacid anupalambhāt yaḥ yam vivikteṣu sāmānyeṣu viśeṣeṣu ca abhidhāna artha kriyā lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa samastaḥ pralayam yāyāt
lolībhāvena tad vivekasya kartum aśakya tvāt
tat api asamīcīnam

original: yato yady api parasparāviviktayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ sarvatropalambhas,
analyzed: yatas yadi api paraspara aviviktayoḥ sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ sarvatra upalambhaḥ

original: tathāpi yatrāiva pramātur arthitvaṃ tad eva sāmānyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā api pramātuḥ arthi tvam tat eva sāmānyam

original: viśeṣān vā pradhānīkṛtya tadgocaraṃ dhvanim arthakriyāṃ vā pravartayatītarasyāpy upasarjanabhāvena tatra vyāpārāt,

original: tadvikalasyetarasyāpi śaśaviśāṇāyamānatayā kvacid anupayogāt. kiṃ cātyantavyatirekiṇi
analyzed: tad vikalasya itarasya api śaśa viśāṇāyamāna tayā kvacid anupayogāt kim ca atyanta vyatirekiṇi

original: mūrdhani patad durviṣahaṃ syāt. tathā hi:
analyzed: mūrdhani patat durviṣaham syāt tathā hi

original: tat teṣu kathaṃ varteta -- sāmastyenāikadeśena vā?

sāmastya pakṣe prati viśeṣam parisamāpta tayā sāmānya bahu tva prasaṅgaḥ
niṣṭam ca etat

original: ekatvābhupagamakṣateḥ. ekadeśena vartane punar yāvanto viśeṣās tāvantas tadaṃśāḥ prasajanti,
analyzed: eka tva abhupagama kṣateḥ eka deśena vartane punar yāvantaḥ viśeṣāḥ tāvantaḥ tad aṃśāḥ prasajanti
na ca etat asti

sarva dharmāṇām yaugapadyena vaktum aśakya tvāt

original: tadabhidhāyakānām apyānantyāt. na cāikāikadharmasandarśakatve 'py amūni vacanāny alīkāni vaktuṃ pāryante,
analyzed: tad abhidhāyakānām api ānantyāt na ca aikāika dharma sandarśaka tve pi amūni vacanāni alīkāni vaktum pāryante
samasta śābda vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt

original: tadalīkatve tataḥ pravṛttyasiddher iti. atrocyata -- iha tāvad dvaye vastupratipādakā,
analyzed: tad alīka tve tatas pravṛtti asiddheḥ iti atrā ucyate iha tāvat dvaye vastu pratipādakā

original: laukikās tattvacintakāś ca. tatra pratyakṣādiprasiddham artham arthitvavaśāl laukikās tāvan madhyasthabhāvena vyavahārakāle vyapadiśyanti,
analyzed: laukikāḥ tattva cintakāḥ ca tatra pratyakṣa ādi prasiddham artham arthi tva vaśāt laukikāḥ tāvat madhyastha bhāvena vyavahāra kāle vyapadiśyanti

original: yad uta nīlam utpalaṃ sugandhi komalam iti,
analyzed: yat uta nīlam utpalam sugandhi komalam iti
na tu tad dharmi gata dharma antara grahaṇa nirākaraṇayoḥ ādriyante
na ṛthi tvāt

original: tāvatāiva vivakṣitavyavahāraparisamāpteḥ. na ca tadvacanānām alīkatā,
analyzed: tāvatā eva vivakṣita vyavahāra parisamāpteḥ na ca tad vacanānām alīka tā
śeṣa dharma antara pratikṣepa abhāvāt

original: tatpratikṣepakāriṇām evālīkatvāt. “sarvaṃ vacanaṃ sāvadhāraṇam” itinyāyāt teṣām api śeṣadharmatiraskārakāritvasiddher bhavannītyālīkatāpadyata  #
analyzed: tad pratikṣepa kāriṇām eva alīka tvāt sarvam vacanam sāvadhāraṇam iti nyāyāt teṣām api śeṣa dharma tiraskāra kāri tva siddheḥ bhavan nītyā alīka tā apadyata  /
iti ced na
avadhāraṇasya tad asambhava mātra vyavacchede vyāpārāt

original: yathānekapuruṣasampūrṇe sadasi dvārādau sthitasya kim atra devadattaḥ samasti nāstīti
analyzed: yathā aneka puruṣa sampūrṇe sadasi dvāra ādau sthitasya kim atra devadattaḥ samasti na asti iti

original: vā dolāyamānabuddheḥ kenacid abhidhīyate -- yathā devadatto 'stīti. atra yady apy
analyzed: vā dolāyamāna buddheḥ kenacid abhidhīyate yathā devadattaḥ sti iti atra yadi api
upanyasta pada dvayasya sāvadhāraṇa tā gamyate
nyathā tad uccāraṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt
tathā api avadhāraṇam tad asambhava mātram vyavacchinatti
na śeṣa puruṣa antarāṇi
na api para rūpeṇa nāstitvam
tad vyavaccheda abhiprāyeṇa prastuta vākya prayogāt
prayoktṛ abhiprāya ādi sāpekṣa tayā iva dhvaneḥ svārtha pratipādana sāmarthyāt na ca vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇa sambandha ānarthakyam

original: tadabhāve prayoktrabhiprāyamātreṇa rūpasyāiva niyoktum aśakyatvāt. na ca samastadharmayuktam eva vastu pratipādayad vacanaṃ satyam ity abhidadhmahe,
analyzed: tad abhāve prayoktṛ abhiprāya mātreṇa rūpasya ā iva niyoktum aśakya tvāt na ca samasta dharma yuktam eva vastu pratipādayat vacanam satyam iti abhidadhmahe
yena aikāika dharma āliṅgita vastu sandarśakānām alīka tā syāt
kim tarhi sambhavat artha pratipādakam satyam iti
sambhavanti ca śeṣa dharma a pratikṣepe vacana gocara āpannāḥ dharmāḥ

original: tasmāt tatpratipādakaṃ satyam eva. yadā tu durnayamatābhiniviṣṭabuddhibhis tīrthāntarīyais taddharmigatadharmāntaranirākaraṇābhiprāyeṇāiva  #
analyzed: tasmāt tad pratipādakam satyam eva yadā tu durnaya mata abhiniviṣṭa buddhibhiḥ tīrtha antarīyaiḥ tad dharmi gata dharma antara nirākaraṇa abhiprāyeṇa iva
sāvadhāraṇam tat prayujyate

original: yathānityam eva vastu nityam eva vetyādi,
analyzed: yathā anityam eva vastu nityam eva vā ityādi

original: tadā nirālambanatvād alīkatāṃ prāpnuvat kena vāryeta?
analyzed: tadā nirālambana tvāt alīka tām prāpnuvat kena vāryeta

original: tattvacintakāḥ punaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddham anekāntātmakaṃ vastu darśayanto dvedhā darśayeyus,
analyzed: tattva cintakāḥ punar pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddham anekānta ātmakam vastu darśayantaḥ dvedhā darśayeyuḥ

original: tad yathā -- vikalādeśena sakalādeśena vā. tatra vikālādeśo nayādhīnaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā vikala ādeśena sakala ādeśena vā tatra vikāla ādeśaḥ naya adhīnaḥ
sakala ādeśaḥ pramāṇa āyattaḥ tathā hi

original: yadā madhyasthabhāvenārthitvavaśāt kiñcid dharmaṃ pratipipādayiṣavaḥ śeṣadharmasvīkaraṇanirākaraṇavimukhayā dhiyā vācaṃ prayuñjate,
analyzed: yadā madhyastha bhāvena arthi tva vaśāt kiñcid dharmam pratipipādayiṣavaḥ śeṣa dharma svīkaraṇa nirākaraṇa vimukhayā dhiyā vācam prayuñjate
tadā tattva cintakāḥ api laukika vat sammugdha ākāra tayā ācakṣate

original: yad uta “jīvo 'sti kartā pramātā bhoktetyādi“. ataḥ sampūrṇavastupratipādanābhāvād vikalādeśo 'bhidhīyate,
analyzed: yat uta kartā pramātā bhoktā ityādi atas sampūrṇa vastu pratipādana abhāvāt vikalā ādeśaḥ bhidhīyate

original: nayamatena sambhavaddharmāṇāṃ darśanamātram ity arthaḥ. yadā tu pramāṇavyāpāram avikalaṃ parāmṛśya pratipādayitum abhiprayanti,
analyzed: naya matena sambhavat dharmāṇām darśana mātram iti arthaḥ yadā tu pramāṇa vyāpāram avikalam parāmṛśya pratipādayitum abhiprayanti
tadā aṅgīkṛta guṇa pradhāna bhāva aśeṣa dharma sūcaka kathañcid paryāya sya ācchabda bhūṣitayā sa avadhāraṇayā ca vācā darśayanti
syāt asti eva jīva
ityādikayā atas yam syāt śabda saṃsūcita ābhyantarībhūta ananta dharmakasya sākṣāt upanyasta jīva śabda kriyābhyām
pradhanīkṛta ātma bhāvasya avadhāraṇa vyavacchinna tad asambhavasya vastunaḥ sandarśaka tvāt
sakala ādeśaḥ iti ucyate
pramāṇa pratipanna sampūrṇa artha kathanam iti yāvat tat uktam
sā jñeya viśeṣa gatiḥ naya pramāṇa ātmikā bhavet tatra

original: sakalagrāhi tu mānaṃ vikalagrāhī nayo jñeyaḥ //
analyzed: sakala grāhi tu mānam vikala grāhī nayaḥ jñeyaḥ
tat idam uktam bhavati

original: nayapramāṇābhijñaḥ syādvādī sakalavikalādeśāv adhikṛtya vastusvarūpapratipipādayiṣayā yad yad brūte tat tat satyaṃ,
analyzed: naya pramāṇa abhijñaḥ syādvādī sakala vikala ādeśau adhikṛtya vastu svarūpa pratipipādayiṣayā yat yat brūte tat tat satyam

original: sambhavadarthagocaratvāt. durnayamatāvalambinaḥ punar ekāntavādino yad yad ācakṣate tat tad alīkam,
analyzed: sambhavat artha gocara tvāt durnaya mata avalambinaḥ punar ekāntavādinaḥ yat yat ācakṣate tat tat alīkam
asambhavat artha viṣaya tvāt iti

original: [NAV_30.0] sāmpratam amum evārthaṃ draḍhayan siddhānte 'py ekāikanayamatapravṛttāni sūtrāṇi na sampūrṇārthābhidhāyakānīty,
analyzed: sāmpratam amum eva artham draḍhayan siddhānte pi ekāika naya mata pravṛttāni sūtrāṇi na sampūrṇa artha abhidhāyakāni iti

original: api tu tatsamudāyābhiprāyapravṛttam avikalavastunivedakam iti darśayann āha:
analyzed: api tu tad samudāya abhiprāya pravṛttam avikala vastu nivedakam iti darśayan āha
nayānām eka niṣṭhānām pravṛtteḥ śruta vartmani
sampūrṇa artha viniścāyi syādvādaśrutam ucyate
iha trividham śrutam

original: tad yathā -- mithyāśrutaṃ nayaśrutaṃ syādvādaśrutaṃ ca. tatra śrūyata iti śrutam āgamaḥ. mithyālīkaṃ śrutaṃ mithyāśrutaṃ,
analyzed: tat yathā mithyāśrutam naya śrutam syādvāda śrutam ca tatra śrūyate iti śrutam āgamaḥ mithyā alīkam śrutam mithyāśrutam
tat ca durnaya abhiprāya pravṛttam tīrthika sambandhi

original: nirgocaratvāt. tathā nayair hetubhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ nayaśrutam,
analyzed: nirgocara tvāt tathā nayaiḥ hetu bhūtaiḥ śrutam naya śrutam
etat ca arhat āgama antargatam eva āika naya abhiprāya pratibaddham
yathā ityādi

original: ṛjusūtranayābhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇikatvasyāpi tatra sambhavāt. tathā nirdiśyamānadharmavyatiriktāśeṣadharmāntarasaṃsūcakena syātā yukto vādo 'bhipretadharmavacanaṃ
analyzed: ṛju sūtra naya abhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇika tvasya api tatra sambhavāt tathā nirdiśyamāna dharma vyatirikta aśeṣa dharma antara saṃsūcakena syātā yuktaḥ vādaḥ bhipreta dharma vacanam

original: tadātmakaṃ śrutaṃ syādvādaśrutam. tat kiṃbhūtam ucyata ity āha:
analyzed: tad ātmakam śrutam syādvādaśrutam tat kiṃbhūtam ucyate iti āha

original: sampūrṇo 'vikalaḥ sa cāsāv arthaś ca tadviniścāyi tannirṇayahetutvād evam abhidhīyate;
analyzed: sampūrṇaḥ vikalaḥ sa ca asau arthaḥ ca tad viniścāyi tad nirṇaya hetu tvāt evam abhidhīyate
śabda ātmaka tvān

original: niścayasya bodharūpatvād iti. nayaśrutaṃ tarhi sampūrṇārthaviniścāyi kasmān na bhavatīty āha:
analyzed: niścayasya bodha rūpa tvāt iti naya śrutam tarhi sampūrṇa artha viniścāyi kasmāt na bhavati iti āha

original: nayānāṃ naigamādīnām ekaniṣṭḥānām ekadharmagrahaṇaparyavasitānāṃ śrutavartmany āgamamārge pravṛtteḥ pravartanān na tad ekāikābhiprāyapratibaddhaṃ
analyzed: nayānām naigama ādīnām eka niṣṭḥānām eka dharma grahaṇa paryavasitānām śruta vartmani āgama mārge pravṛtteḥ pravartanāt na tat ekāika abhiprāya pratibaddham
tad samudāyasya ā iva sampūrṇa artha viniścāyaka tvāt iti ākūṭam

original: [NAV_31.0] tad evaṃ nayapramāṇasvarūpaṃ pratipādyādhunāśeṣanayapramāṇavyāpakaṃ teṣāṃ tatra tādātmyenāvasthānāt pramātāram abhidhātukāma āha:
analyzed: tat evam naya pramāṇa svarūpam pratipādya adhunā aśeṣa naya pramāṇa vyāpakam teṣām tatra tādātmyena avasthānāt pramātāram abhidhātu kāmaḥ āha
tatra tri kāla jīvanāt jīvaḥ
prāṇa dhārakaḥ ātmā iti arthaḥ

original: sa pramiṇotīti pramātā prameyaparicchedakaḥ. kiṃbhūtaḥ sann ity āha:
analyzed: sa pramiṇoti iti pramātā prameya paricchedakaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ san iti āha

original: svānyāv ātmaparau nirbhāsitum uddyotayituṃ śīlam asyeti svānyanirbhāsī,

original: svasvarūpārthayoḥ prakāśaka iti yāvat. tathā karotīti kartā,
analyzed: sva svarūpa arthayoḥ prakāśakaḥ iti yāvat tathā karoti iti kartā
bhuṅkte iti bhoktā
vivartanam apara apara paryāyeṣu gamanam vivṛttiḥ pariṇāmaḥ

original: sā vidyate yasyeti vivṛttimān. sva ātmā saṃvedyate 'neneti svasaṃvedanaṃ tena samyak
analyzed: sā vidyate yasya iti vivṛttimān svaḥ ātmā saṃvedyate nena iti sva saṃvedanam tena samyak

original: siddhaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ pratīto vā svasaṃvedanasaṃsiddhaḥ. kṣitiḥ pṛthivy ādir yeṣāṃ tāni kṣityādīny,
analyzed: siddhaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ pratītaḥ vā sva saṃvedana saṃsiddhaḥ kṣitiḥ pṛthivī ādiḥ yeṣām tāni kṣiti ādīni
ādi śabdāt ambu tejaḥ vāyu ākāśāni gṛhyante

original: na vidyata ātmā svarūpam asyety anātmakaḥ,
analyzed: na vidyate ātmā svarūpam asya iti anātmakaḥ

original: [NAV_31.2] tatra jīvaḥ pramātetyanena ye pāramārthikaṃ pramātāraṃ nābhyupagacchanty,
analyzed: tatra jīvaḥ pramātā iti anena ye pāramārthikam pramātāram na abhyupagacchanti

original: api tu vijñānakṣaṇaparamparānubhavabalaprabodhitānādiprarūḍhavāsanāsampāditasattākaṃ mithyāvikalpaparikalpitam apāramārthikaṃ taṃ manyante  #

prati kṣaṇa vilaya vādinaḥ tān nirācaṣṭe
kṣaṇa vilayasya prāk eva pratiṣiddha tvāt

original: [NAV_31.3] nanu ca ghaṭādayas tāvad vināśam āviśanto dṛśyante,
analyzed: nanu ca ghaṭa ādayaḥ tāvat vināśam āviśantaḥ dṛśyante
teṣām ca vināśaḥ lakuṭa ādi kāraṇa kalāpena a vinaśvara svabhāvānām vā kriyeta

original: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ vā. yady ādyaḥ kalpas tad ayuktaṃ,
analyzed: vinaśvara svabhāvānām vā yadi ādyaḥ kalpaḥ tat ayuktam
svabhāvasya pracyāvayitum aśakya tvāt

original: anyathā svabhāvatvāyogāt. athāivaṃbhūta eva tasya svabhāvaḥ svakāraṇabalāyāto yad uta vināśakāraṇam āsādya vinaṅkṣyatīti brūṣe,
analyzed: anyathā svabhāva tva ayogāt atha a ivaṃbhūtaḥ eva tasya svabhāvaḥ sva kāraṇa bala āyātaḥ yat uta vināśa kāraṇam āsādya vinaṅkṣyati iti brūṣe

original: tathāpi tadvināśakāraṇasannidhānaṃ kiṃ yādṛcchikam uta tatsvabhāvasampādyam eva. yadādyaḥ kalpas,
