tadā sannihitasya api tad pratyanīka pratyaya upanipātena nivartanāt
tad sannidhāpaka hetūnām api sva sannidhāpaka kāraṇa kalāpa sāpekṣa tvāt
sannihitānām api pratidvandvinā nivartanāt
yādṛcchika tvāt ca na avaśyaṃbhāvi tad sannidhānam

original: tataś cāsannihitasvavināśakāraṇakadambakaḥ kaścid ghaṭādir na vinaśyed apy,
analyzed: tatas ca asannihita sva vināśa kāraṇa kadambakaḥ kaścid ghaṭa ādiḥ na vinaśyet api
aniṣṭam ca etat
sarva kṛtakānām vināśa avigānāt atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tathā sati paścād api tadbalād vināśahetavaḥ sannidhāsyantīti prathamakṣaṇa eva sannidadhatu,

original: tathāpi kṣaṇikatāivārthasya. svahetor eva niyatakālāt parato 'yaṃ svavināśahetuṃ sannidhāpayiṣyatīty evaṃrūpo jāta iti cen,
analyzed: tathā api kṣaṇikatā iva arthasya sva hetoḥ eva niyata kālāt paratas yam sva vināśa hetum sannidhāpayiṣyati iti evaṃrūpaḥ jātaḥ iti ced
api kṣaṇa bhaṅgura tā āyātā tathā hi

original: svahetunā kilāsau varṣāt parataḥ svavināśahetusannidhāpanakṣamasvabhāvo vyadhāyi;
analyzed: sva hetunā kila asau varṣāt paratas sva vināśa hetu sannidhāpana kṣama svabhāvaḥ vyadhāyi

original: sa ca tasyotpādakṣaṇād dvitīyakṣaṇe svabhāvo 'sti vā na vā?
analyzed: sa ca tasya utpāda kṣaṇāt dvitīya kṣaṇe svabhāvaḥ sti vā na vā

original: asti cet, tathā sati punar varṣaṃ tena sthātavyam,
analyzed: asti ced tathā sati punar varṣam tena sthātavyam

original: evaṃ yāvad varṣopāntyakṣaṇe 'pi yadi tatsvabhāva evāsau tadāparam api varṣāntaraṃ sthitir āpadyeta,
analyzed: evam yāvat varṣa upāntya kṣaṇe yadi tad svabhāvaḥ evā asau tadā aparam api varṣa antaram sthitiḥ āpadyeta

original: apracyutavarṣasthāyisvabhāvatvād iti. atha dvitīyakṣaṇe nāsti sa svabhāva iti brūṣe,
analyzed: apracyuta varṣa sthāyi svabhāva tvāt iti atha dvitīya kṣaṇe na asti sa svabhāvaḥ iti brūṣe
hanta kṣaṇika tvam eva āḍhaukate
tādavasthyasya tad lakṣaṇa tvāt kim ca

original: vināśahetur bhāvasya vināśaṃ vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā kuryāt?
analyzed: vināśa hetuḥ bhāvasya vināśam vyatiriktam a vyatiriktam vā kuryāt

original: tataś ca bhāvas tādavasthyam anubhavet. tatsambandhaḥ kriyata iti cen,
analyzed: tatas ca bhāvaḥ tādavasthyam anubhavet tad sambandhaḥ kriyate iti ced

original: na sambandhasya tādātmyatadutpattivyatiriktasya pratiṣedhāt. na cānayor anyataraḥ sambandho 'tra samasti,
analyzed: na sambandhasya tādātmya tad utpatti vyatiriktasya pratiṣedhāt na ca anayoḥ anyataraḥ samasti

original: anyahetukasya paścād utpannasya tadutpattivaikalyāt. tan na vyatirikto vināśaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ. avyatiriktakaraṇe punas tam eva bhāvaṃ vināśahetuḥ  #
analyzed: anya hetukasya paścāt utpannasya tad utpatti vaikalyāt tat na vyatiriktaḥ vināśaḥ kartum yuktaḥ a vyatirikta karaṇe punar tam eva bhāvam vināśa hetuḥ  /
karoti iti prāptam
avyatirekasya tad rūpa tā lakṣaṇa tvāt na ca asau kartavyaḥ
sva hetoḥ eva niṣpanna tvāt
tad karaṇe ca tasya avasthānam eva syān

original: na pralayaḥ. tan nāvinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ paścāt kathañcid api vināśaḥ kartuṃ śakyo,
analyzed: na pralayaḥ tat na a vinaśvara svabhāvānām paścāt kathañcid api vināśaḥ kartum śakyaḥ

original: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ punaḥ svahetubalāyātatvāt prāg api pratikṣaṇabhāvī,

na kāraṇa antara apekṣaḥ
svabhāvasya niyata rūpa tvāt

atra ucyate satyam etat

original: kiṃ tu yathā vināśakāraṇāyogāt pratikṣaṇabhāvī vināśo bhavadbhiḥ pratipadyate,
analyzed: kim tu yathā vināśa kāraṇā ayogāt pratikṣaṇa bhāvī vināśaḥ bhavadbhiḥ pratipadyate

original: tathāiva sthityutpattī pratikṣaṇabhāvinyau kiṃ na pratipadyete,
analyzed: tathā iva sthiti utpattī prati kṣaṇa bhāvinyau kim na pratipadyete

original: taddhetūnām api vicāryamāṇānām ayogāt. tathā hi:
analyzed: tad hetūnām api vicāryamāṇānām ayogāt tathā hi

original: sthitihetunā tāvat svayam asthirasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ sthāpyeran sthirasvabhāvā vā?
analyzed: sthiti hetunā tāvat svayam asthira svabhāvāḥ bhāvāḥ sthāpyeran sthira svabhāvāḥ vā

original: na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
analyzed: na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodam kṣamate
svabhāvasya anyathā kartum aśakya tvāt
tasya pratiniyata rūpa tvāt
cetana acetana svabhāvavat

original: anyathā svabhāvatāhāneḥ. dvitīyapakṣe punaḥ svayaṃ sthirasvabhāvānāṃ kiṃ sthitihetunā?
analyzed: anyathā svabhāva tā hāneḥ dvitīya pakṣe punar svayam sthira svabhāvānām kim sthiti hetunā
sthitiḥ na iṣyate eva
tena an abhyupagata upālambhaḥ eva ayam iti ced
hanta hataḥ sī

original: evaṃ hi bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamātram api na tiṣṭheyuḥ. kṣaṇabhāvinīṣyata eveti cet,
analyzed: evam hi bhāvāḥ kṣaṇa mātram api na tiṣṭheyuḥ kṣaṇa bhāvinī iṣyate eva iti ced

original: sā tarhy asthitisvabhāvānāṃ hetuśatair api kartuṃ na pāryata iti brūmaḥ,
analyzed: sā tarhi asthiti svabhāvānām hetu śataiḥ api kartum na pāryate iti brūmaḥ

original: tatsvabhāvatve punar hetuvyāpāranairarthakyāt. ahetukā satī sakalakālaṃ bhavatīti
analyzed: tad svabhāva tve punar hetu vyāpāra nairarthakyāt ahetukā satī sakala kālam bhavati iti

original: datto jalāñjaliḥ pratikṣaṇavilayasya. tathotpādahetur api tatsvabhāvasyotpattiṃ vidadhyād atatsvabhāvasya vā?
analyzed: dattaḥ jala añjaliḥ prati kṣaṇa vilayasya tathā utpāda hetuḥ api tad svabhāvasya utpattim vidadhyāt a tad svabhāvasya vā

original: na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkartuṃ yuktaḥ,
analyzed: na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkartum yuktaḥ

original: svayam utpādakasyotpādane vyāpriyamāṇo hi hetuḥ piṣṭaṃ pinaṣṭi,
analyzed: svayam utpādakasya utpādane vyāpriyamāṇaḥ hi hetuḥ piṣṭam pinaṣṭi
śaṅkham dhavalayati

svayam an utpatti dharmakasya utpādayitum aśakya tvāt
anyathā śaśaviṣāṇa ādayaḥ pi utpādya koṭim adhyāsīran

original: tataś ca na kaścid atyantābhāvaḥ syāt. tad yathā nirhetukatvān nāśaḥ pratikṣaṇabhāvī,
analyzed: tatas ca na kaścid atyanta abhāvaḥ syāt tat yathā nirhetuka tvāt nāśaḥ pratikṣaṇa bhāvī

original: tathāiva darśitayukteḥ sthityutpattī apīti trayākrāntaṃ sakalaṃ vastu jātam abhyupagantavyaṃ;
analyzed: tathā iva darśita yukteḥ sthiti utpattī api iti traya ākrāntam sakalam vastu jātam abhyupagantavyam

original: tathā sati jīvo 'pi jīvatvacaitanyadravyatvādibhiḥ sthemānaṃ ābibhrāṇa eva harṣaviṣādādibhir
analyzed: tathā sati jīvaḥ api jīva tva caitanya dravya tva ādibhiḥ sthemānam ābibhrāṇaḥ eva harṣa viṣāda ādibhiḥ

original: aparāparārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś cotpādavyayadharmakaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pramāteti balāt siddhim adhyāste.
analyzed: apara apara artha grahaṇa pariṇāmaiḥ ca utpāda vyaya dharmakaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pramātā iti balāt siddhim adhyāste

original: [NAV_31.5] nanu ca yady utpādavyayasthitīnāṃ nirhetukatvāt sakalakālabhāvitā bhavadbhiḥ sādhyate,
analyzed: nanu ca yadi utpāda vyaya sthitīnām nirhetuka tvāt sakala kāla bhāvi tā bhavadbhiḥ sādhyate

original: tadānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhaḥ khalv ayaṃ tatkāraṇakalāpavyāpāraḥ kathaṃ neyaḥ?
analyzed: tadā anvaya vyatirekābhyām pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa prasiddhaḥ khalu ayam tad kāraṇa kalāpa vyāpāraḥ katham neyaḥ
na ca ayam apahnotum śakyaḥ
tathā hi kulāla ādi kāraṇa vrāta vyāpāre ghaṭa ādayaḥ samupalabhyante

original: tadabhāve ca nopalambhyanta iti tajjanyā ity ucyante. sthitir api vināśakāraṇasannidhānāt prāk tadbalād eva,
analyzed: tad abhāve ca na upalambhyante iti tad janyāḥ iti ucyante sthitiḥ api vināśa kāraṇa sannidhānāt prāk tad balāt eva

original: tathā nāśo 'pi mudgarādisannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sadasattām anubhavaṃs tatkṛtaḥ pratīyate,
analyzed: tathā nāśaḥ api mudgara ādi sannidhāna asannidhānābhyām sat asat tām anubhavan tad kṛtaḥ pratīyate
na ahetukaḥ tat katham etat iti

original: [NAV_31.6] atrocyate -- na vayaṃ sarvathā hetūnāṃ vyāpāraṃ vārayāmaḥ,
analyzed: atra ucyate na vayam sarvathā hetūnām vyāpāram vārayāmaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi svayam utpādavyayasthityātmanā vivartamānasya dravyasya hetavas tadviśeṣakaraṇe vyāpāram anubhavanti,
analyzed: kim tarhi svayam utpāda vyaya sthiti ātmanā vivartamānasya dravyasya hetavaḥ tad viśeṣa karaṇe vyāpāram anubhavanti
tena iva sārddham teṣām anvaya vyatireka anukaraṇa darśanāt
dṛṣṭasya ca apahnave smākam a pravṛtta tvāt

original: kevalaṃ pratītivikalāṃ yuktiṃ yuktivinākṛtāṃ vā pratītiṃ nāṅgīkurmahe,
analyzed: kevalam pratīti vikalām yuktim yukti vinākṛtām vā pratītim na aṅgīkurmahe
sambhavat artha gocara tayā nirālambana tvāt tasyāḥ iti āstām tāvat

original: [NAV_31.7] svānyanirbhāsītyanena prāguktasvaparābhāsipramāṇaviśeṣaṇavan mīmāṃsakān parokṣabuddhivādino yogācārāṃś ca jñānamātravādinaḥ pratikṣipati,
analyzed: sva anya nirbhāsi iti anena prāgukta sva para ābhāsi pramāṇa viśeṣaṇa vat mīmāṃsakān parokṣa buddhi vādinaḥ yoga ācārān ca jñāna mātra vādinaḥ pratikṣipati
jñāna jñāninoḥ kathañcid abhedena tad ukta nyāya aviśeṣāt iti
kartā bhoktā iti viśeṣaṇa dvayena sāṃkhya matam vikuṭṭayati
kartā san bhoktā api iti kākvā upanyāsāt
akartuḥ bhoga anupapatteḥ
bhuji kriyā nirvartana samarthasya ā iva bhoktṛ tvāt japā kusuma ādi sannidhāna vaśāt sphaṭike

original: raktatādivyapadeśavad akartur api prakṛtyupadhānavaśāt sukhaduḥkhādibhogavyapadeśo yuktas; tathā hi:
analyzed: rakta tā ādi vyapadeśa vat akartuḥ api prakṛti upadhāna vaśāt sukha duḥkha ādi bhoga vyapadeśaḥ yuktaḥ tathā hi

original: prakṛtivikāradarpaṇākārabuddhisaṅkrāntānāṃ sukhaduḥkhādyātmakānām arthānāṃ puruṣaḥ sannidhānamātreṇa bhojako vyapadiśyate,
analyzed: prakṛti vikāra darpaṇa ākāra buddhi saṅkrāntānām sukha duḥkha ādi ātmakānām arthānām puruṣaḥ sannidhāna mātreṇa bhojakaḥ vyapadiśyate

original: “buddhyadhyavasitam arthaṃ puruṣaś cetayata” itivacanād iti cen, na,
analyzed: buddhi adhyavasitam artham puruṣaḥ cetayate iti vacanāt iti ced na
kathañcid sa kriyāka tā vyatirekeṇa prakṛti upadhāne pi anyathātva anupapatteḥ
apracyuta prācīna rūpasya vyapadeśa anarha tvāt
tad pracyave ca prāktana rūpa tyāgena uttara rūpa adhyāsitayā sa kriyatvam āpatati iti nyāyāt

original: sphaṭikadṛṣṭānte 'pi japākusumādisannidhānād andhopalādau raktatānāvirbhavantī tatra punar āvirbhavantī tasya tathāvidhaṃ pariṇāmaṃ lakṣayaty,
analyzed: sphaṭika dṛṣṭānte japā kusuma ādi sannidhānāt andhopala ādau rakta tān āvirbhavantī tatra punar āvirbhavantī tasya tathāvidham pariṇāmam lakṣayati

original: anyathāndhopalavat tatrāpi na prāduḥṣyāt. tan nākriyasya bhoktṛtopapadyata iti.
analyzed: anyathā andha upala vat tatra api na prāduṣyāt tat na akriyasya bhoktṛ tā upapadyate iti

original: [NAV_31.9] vivṛttimān ityamunā tv ekāntanityam apariṇāminaṃ naiyāyikavaiśeṣikādiprakalpitaṃ pramātāraṃ nirasyati,
analyzed: vivṛttimān iti amunā tu ekānta nityam apariṇāminam naiyāyika vaiśeṣika ādi prakalpitam pramātāram nirasyati
sarvathā avicalita rūpasya artha grahaṇa pariṇāma anupapatteḥ vyatirikta jñāna samavāyāt pramiṇoti iti ced na
samavāyasya prāk eva pratikṣipta tvāt
sambandha antarasya ca vyatirekiṇā sākam anupapatteḥ

original: anyatrānyathānupapannatvāt. na ca vyatirekiṇi jñāne tat samasti,
analyzed: anyatra anyathā anupapanna tvāt na ca vyatirekiṇi jñāne tat samasti
tad grāhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt
avyatireka anubhavasya ca tad bādhaka tvāt kim ca
yadi samavāya balāt ātmani jñānam samavaiti

original: tadātmanāṃ samavāyasya ca vibhutvād ekarūpatvāc ca sarvātmasu kiṃ na samavaiti,
analyzed: tad ātmanām samavāyasya ca vibhu tvāt eka rūpa tvāt ca sarva ātmasu kim na samavaiti
viśeṣa abhāvāt

original: tathā ca devadattajṭānena yajṭadattādayo 'py arthatattvaṃ buddhyeran. anyac ca vijṭānodayasamaye
analyzed: tathā ca devadatta jṭānena artha tattvam buddhyeran anyat ca vijṭāna udaya samaye

original: 'pi yādṛśaḥ prāgavasthāyāṃ tādṛśa eva santiṣṭhamānaḥ prāg apramātā paścāt pramāteti
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ prāc avasthāyām tādṛśaḥ eva san tiṣṭhamānaḥ prāk apramātā paścāt pramātā iti
bruvāṇaḥ khalu unmatta tām ātmani āvirbhāvayati

original: [NAV_31.10] paścārddhena punar bhūtavyatirekiṇaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣanirgrāhyaṃ jīvaṃ darśayaṃś cārvākadarśanaṃ tiraskurute,
analyzed: paśca arddhena punar bhūta vyatirekiṇam sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa nirgrāhyam jīvam darśayan cārvāka darśanam tiraskurute

original: jaḍātmakabhūtāvyatireke hi tadvilakṣaṇabodharūpaharṣaviṣādādivivartānubhavābhāvaprasaṅgāt. nanu ca kāyākārapariṇatāni bhūtāny evātmavyatirekiṇīṃ  #
analyzed: jaḍa ātmaka bhūta a vyatireke hi tad vilakṣaṇa bodha rūpa harṣa viṣāda ādi vivarta anubhava abhāva prasaṅgāt nanu ca kāya ākāra pariṇatāni bhūtāni eva ātma vyatirekiṇīm
cetanām utkālayanti
sā ca tathāvidha pariṇāma pariṇateṣu teṣu santiṣṭhate

original: tadabhāve punas teṣv eva nilīyata iti;
analyzed: tad abhāve punar teṣu eva nilīyate iti
tad vyatireka anubhave pi na para loka yāyi jīva siddhiḥ
iyatā iva dṛṣṭa vyavahāra upapatteḥ na etat asti

original: dvayaṃ hi tāvad etat saṃyogam anubhavad upalababhyate -- paṭcabhūtātmakaṃ śarīraṃ cetanā ca. tatrāpi śarīraṃ bahirmukhākāreṇa bodhenārtharūpatayā  #
analyzed: dvayam hi tāvat etat saṃyogam anubhavat paṭcabhūta ātmakam śarīram cetanā ca tatra api śarīram bahirmukha ākāreṇa bodhena artha rūpa tayā
jaḍam anubhūyate
cetanā punar antar mukha ākāreṇa sva saṃvedana pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkriyate

original: 'ta evāvyatirekapakṣaḥ pratibhāsanirākṛtatvān nāśaṅkitaḥ. vyatirekiṇoḥ punaḥ prakāśamānayor yadi bhūtāny eva cetanām utkālayantīti bhavadbhiḥ
analyzed: te eva avyatireka pakṣaḥ pratibhāsa nirākṛta tvāt na āśaṅkitaḥ vyatirekiṇoḥ punar prakāśamānayoḥ yadi bhūtāni eva cetanām utkālayanti iti bhavadbhiḥ

original: tadā cetanāiva bhavāntarād utpattisthānamāyātā paṭcabhūtabhrāntijanakaṃ śarīraṃ nirvartayet,
analyzed: tadā cetanā iva bhava antarāt utpatti sthānam āyātā paṭcabhūta bhrānti janakam śarīram nirvartayet
punar bhava antaram yātu kāmā muṭcet
tat tayā adhiṣṭhitam gamana ādi ceṣṭām kuryāt

original: tadviyuktaṃ punaḥ kāṣṭhavat tiṣṭhed iti jīvasampādyam eva śarīraṃ,
analyzed: tad viyuktam punar kāṣṭha vat tiṣṭhet iti jīva sampādyam eva śarīram
na punar asau tat sampādyaḥ iti
etat parikalpanam yuktataram paśyāmaḥ

original: jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sakarmakatayāparāparabhavabhramaṇāparāparaśarīranirvartanayor upapadyamānatvāt. bhavāntarād āgacchan utpattisthānaṃ jīvo  #
analyzed: jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sa karmaka tayā apara apara bhava bhramaṇa apara apara śarīra nirvartanayoḥ upapadyamāna tvāt bhava antarāt āgacchan utpatti sthānam jīvaḥ
dhyakṣeṇa na upalabhyate iti ced

original: bhūtāny api tarhi kāyākāradhāraṇadvāreṇa cetanām utkālayantīti pratyakṣeṇa nopalakṣyanta iti samāno nyāhaḥ. atha kāyākārapariṇateṣv eva bhūteṣu
analyzed: bhūtāni api tarhi kāya ākāra dhāraṇa dvāreṇa cetanām utkālayanti iti pratyakṣeṇa na upalakṣyante iti samānaḥ nyāhaḥ atha kāya ākāra pariṇateṣu eva bhūteṣu
na anyadā iti anyathā anupapatti vaśāt tad janyā iti parikalpyata

original: evaṃ tarhi mṛtāvasthāyāṃ kāyākāram ābibhrāṇeṣv api nopalabdhā,
analyzed: evam tarhi mṛta avasthāyām kāya ākāram ābibhrāṇeṣu api na upalabdhā

original: kāyākārapariṇāmo vā kādācitkatayā hetvantarāpekṣītyanyathānupapattivaśād eva tannirvartanakṣamā cetanā bhavāntarāgatajīvasambandhinīti pratipadyāmahe.  #
analyzed: kāya ākāra pariṇāmaḥ vā kādācitkatayā hetu antara apekṣī iti anyathā anupapatti vaśāt eva tad nirvartana kṣamā cetanā bhava antara āgata jīva sambandhinī iti pratipadyāmahe
kim ca

original: jīvas tāvat karmacaitanyasambandhāc charīranirvartanārthaṃ pravarata iti yuktam evāitad,
analyzed: jīvaḥ tāvat karma caitanya sambandhāt śarīra nirvartana artham pravarate iti yuktam
bhūtāni punar kiṃbhūtāni cetanā karaṇe pravarteran
sa cetanāni niścetanāni vā
yadi ādyaḥ kalpaḥ
tatas vikalpa yugalam avatarati

original: tac caitanyaṃ tebhyo bhinnam abhinnam vā?
analyzed: tat caitanyam tebhyaḥ bhinnam abhinnam vā
yadi bhinnam

original: tadā puruṣaśarīravat tatrāpi bhūtaiḥ saha vartamānam api bhūtavilakṣaṇam ātmakāraṇam anumāpayatīti tadavasthāiva jīvasiddhiḥ. athābhinnaṃ,
analyzed: tadā puruṣa śarīra vat tatra api bhūtaiḥ saha vartamānam api bhūta vilakṣaṇam ātma kāraṇam anumāpayati iti tad avasthā iva jīva siddhiḥ atha abhinnam
tathā sati samasta bhūtānām aikyam prasajati

original: tatsvarūpavat. nijanijacaitanyāvyatirekīṇi bhūtāni tenāyam adoṣa iti cen, na,
analyzed: tad svarūpa vat nija nija caitanya a vyatirekīṇi bhūtāni tena ayam adoṣaḥ iti ced na

original: tatsampādyapuruṣaśarīre 'pi tajjanyapañcacaitanyaprasaṅgāt. pañcāpi sambhūya bṛhatpuruṣacaitanyaṃ bahavas tilā iva tailaghaṭaṃ janayantīti
analyzed: tad sampādya puruṣa śarīre pi tad janya pañca caitanya prasaṅgāt pañca api sambhūya bṛhat puruṣa caitanyam bahavaḥ tilāḥ iva taila ghaṭam janayanti iti

original: tat tarhi puruṣacaitanyaṃ kiṃ teṣām eva saṃyogo yad vā tadutpādyam, anyad eva?
analyzed: tat tarhi puruṣa caitanyam kim teṣām eva saṃyogaḥ yat vā tad utpādyam anyat eva
yadi ādhyaḥ kalpaḥ
tat ayuktam
caitanyānām parasparam miśraṇa abhāvena saṃyoga virodhāt

original: itarathā bahupuruṣacaitanyāni sambhūya bṛhattamacaitanyāntaram ārabheran. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas,
analyzed: itarathā bahu puruṣa caitanyāni sambhūya bṛhattama caitanya antaram ārabheran atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tatrāpi teṣāṃ kim anvayo 'sti nāsti vā?
analyzed: tatra api teṣām kim anvayaḥ sti na asti vā
yadi asti tat ayuktam
prāgvat tad janya caitanya pañca rūpa tā āpatteḥ atha na asti
tat api acāru

original: niranvayotpādasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt. tan na sacetanāni bhūtāni cetanākaraṇe vyāpārabhāñji bhavitum arhanti. nāpi niścetanāni,
analyzed: niranvaya utpādasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt tat na sa cetanāni bhūtāni cetanā karaṇe vyāpāra bhāñji bhavitum arhanti na api niścetanāni
teṣām atyanta vilakṣaṇa tayā caitanya utpāda virodhāt

original: itarathā sikatādayas tailādikaraṇe vyāpriyeran. kiṃ ca,
analyzed: itarathā sikatā ādayaḥ taila ādi karaṇe vyāpriyeran kim ca

original: tatsamudāyamātrasādhyaṃ vā caitanyaṃ syād viśiṣṭatatpariṇāmasādhyaṃ vā. na tāvad ādyā kḷptir,
analyzed: tad samudāya mātra sādhyam vā caitanyam syāt viśiṣṭa tad pariṇāma sādhyam vā na tāvat ādyā kḷptiḥ

original: ilājalānalānilanabhastalamīlane 'pi cetanānupalabdheḥ. dvitīyavikḷptau punaḥ kiṃ tad vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam. kāyākārapariṇāma iti cet,
analyzed: ilā jala anala anila nabhastala mīlane cetanā anupalabdheḥ dvitīya vikḷptau punar kim tat vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam kāya ākāra pariṇāmaḥ iti ced

original: sa tarhi sarvadā kasmān na bhavati?
analyzed: sa tarhi sarvadā kasmāt na bhavati
kutaścid hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti ced

original: tat tarhi hetvantaraṃ bhavāntarāyātajīvacaitanyam ity anumimīmahe,
analyzed: tat tarhi hetu antaram bhava antara āyāta jīva caitanyam iti anumimīmahe
tasyāḥ iva kāya ākāra pariṇāma sādhya caitanya anurūpa upādāna kāraṇa tvāt
tad virahe kāya ākāra pariṇāma sadbhāve pi mṛta avasthāyām tad abhāvāt gamana ādi ceṣṭā anupalabdheḥ
tat na kāya ākāra pariṇāma janyam caitanyam

original: api tu sa eva tajjanya iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na pratyakṣād anyat pramāṇam asti,
analyzed: api tu saḥ eva tad janyaḥ iti yuktam paśyāmaḥ na pratyakṣāt anyat pramāṇam asti
na ca tena para loka gamana āgamana ādikam caitanyasya upalakṣyate

original: tena dṛṣṭāny eva bhūtāni tatkāraṇatayā kalpanīyānīti cen, na,
analyzed: tena dṛṣṭāni eva bhūtāni tad kāraṇatayā kalpanīyāni iti ced na
kevala pratyakṣa pratikṣepeṇa pramāṇa antarāṇām prāk eva prasādhita tvāt

original: tathā ca bhūyāṃsy anumānāni paralokānuyāyijīvasādhakāni pravarteran. tad yathā -- tadaharjātabālakasyādyastanābhilāṣaḥ pūrvābhilāṣapūrvako,
analyzed: tathā ca bhūyāṃsi anumānāni para loka anuyāyi jīva sādhakāni pravarteran tat yathā tad ahar jāta bālakasya ādya stana abhilāṣaḥ pūrva abhilāṣa pūrvakaḥ
bhilāṣa tvāt
dvitīya divasa ādi stana abhilāṣa vat

original: tad idam anumānam ādyastanābhilāṣasyābhilāṣāntarapūrvakatvam anumāpayad arthāpattyā paralokayāyijīvamākṣipati,
analyzed: tat idam anumānam ādya stana abhilāṣasya abhilāṣa antara pūrvaka tvam anumāpayat arthāpattyā para loka yāyi jīvam ākṣipati

original: tajjanmany abhilāṣāntarābhāvāt. evam anyad apy udāhāryam ity āstāṃ tāvat.
analyzed: tad janmani abhilāṣa antara abhāvāt evam anyat api udāhāryam iti āstām tāvat

original: [NAV_31.11] tad ayaṃ svaparaprakāśakaḥ kartā bhoktā nityānityātmako bhūtavilakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tat ayam sva para prakāśakaḥ kartā bhoktā nitya anitya ātmakaḥ bhūta vilakṣaṇaḥ
sākṣāt kṛta katicid nija paryāya anumita anādi ananta kāla bhāvi nija ananta paryāya vivartaḥ pramāṇa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
pāramārthikaḥ jīvaḥ sakala naya pramāṇa vyāpakaḥ pramātā iti sthitam
sāmpratam paryanta ślokena prakaraṇa artham upasaṃharan āha
sarva saṃvyavahartḥṇām prasiddhā api prakīrtitā
pramāṇāni pratyakṣa ādīni
ādi śabdāt naya parigrahaḥ
teṣām vyavasthā pratiniyata lakṣaṇa ādi rūpā maryādā

original: seyam anantaroktasthityā prakīrtiteti saṃsargaḥ. kiṃbhūtety āha:
analyzed: sā iyam anantara ukta sthityā prakīrtitā iti saṃsargaḥ kiṃbhūtā iti āha
ādiḥ prabhavaḥ
nidhanam paryantaḥ

original: na vidyete ādinidhane yasyāsau tathāvidha ātmā svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ sānādinidhanātmikā;
analyzed: na vidyete ādi nidhane yasya asau tathāvidhaḥ ātmā svarūpam yasyāḥ sā an ādi nidhana ātmikā
sarva laukika tīrthika ādi bheda bhinna samasta vyavahāravatām prasiddhā api rūḍhā api
tad aprasiddhau nikhila vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt

original: taducchede ca vicārānutthāne na kasyacit tattvasya pratiṣṭhitiḥ. prakīrtitā saṃśabditāvyutpannavipratipannavyāmohāpohāyeti gamyate;
analyzed: tad ucchede ca vicāra anutthāne na kasyacid tattvasya pratiṣṭhitiḥ prakīrtitā saṃśabdita avyutpanna vipratipanna vyāmoha apohāya iti gamyate
pramāṇa prasiddhe pi arthe prabala āvaraṇa ku darśana vāsanā āditaḥ keṣāñcid anadhyavasāya viparyāsa rūpa vyāmoha sadbhāvāt

original: tadapanodārthaṃ ca sati sāmarthye karuṇāvatāṃ pravṛtter iti.
analyzed: tad apanoda artham ca sati sāmarthye karuṇāvatām pravṛtteḥ iti
syādvāda kesari su bhīṣaṇa nāda bhīteḥ uttrasta lola nayanān prapalāyamānān

original: hetur nayāśritakutīrthimṛgān ananyatrāṇān vihāya jinam eti tam āśrayadhvaṃ // NAV_32.1:1 //
analyzed: hetuḥ naya āśrita kutīrthi mṛgān ananya trāṇān vihāya jinam eti tam āśrayadhvam

original: bhaktir mayā bhagavati prakaṭīkṛteyaṃ tacchāsanāṃśakathanān na matiḥ svakīyā /
analyzed: bhaktiḥ mayā bhagavati prakaṭīkṛtā iyam tad śāsana aṃśa kathanāt na matiḥ svakīyā

original: mohād ato yad iha kiñcid abhūd asādhu tat sādhavaḥ kṛtakṛpā mayi śodhayantu // NAV_32.1:2 //
analyzed: mohāt atas yat iha kiñcid abhūt asādhu tat sādhavaḥ kṛta kṛpāḥ mayi śodhayantu

original: nyāyāvatāravivṛtiṃ vividhāṃ vidhitsoḥ siddhaḥ śubho ya iha puṇyacayas tato me /
analyzed: nyāya avatāra vivṛtim vividhām vidhitsoḥ siddhaḥ śubhaḥ yaḥ iha puṇya cayaḥ tatas me

original: nityaṃ parārthakaraṇodyatam ā bhavāntād bhūyāj jinendramatalampaṭam eva cetaḥ // NAV_32.1:3 //
analyzed: nityam parārtha karaṇa udyatam ā bhava antāt bhūyāt jinendra mata lampaṭam eva cetaḥ
iti nyāyāvatāra vivṛtiḥ samāptā
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya siddhavyākhyānikasya tarka prakaraṇa vṛtteḥ iti
